SA16hvsatssu:4_0: atra vicāryate / (pṛ) nanu bhavatā satyasiddhiśāstraṃ vakṣyata iti jñātmasmābhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4_2: sa ca budo [bhagavān] / kasmāt tasya buddha ityākhyā /

SA16hvsatssu:5_20: yathā kaścit ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣan sadā smarati na vismarati /

SA16hvsatssu:6_1: asukhe ca sukhasaṃjñotpadyate sukhāsukhe ca upekṣāsaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6_2: (pṛ)asukhe upekṣā jāyeta / kathaṃ sukhasaṃjñā jāyeta / (u) subhāvitacittatvāt vākpāruṣyādyasukhadharmeṣu na pratibandhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6_6: tānanye sattvā na śṛṇvanti / tathāgata evāpratihataṃ praviśati vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:7_0: prajñāskandhasampanna iti / dhyānāvaraṇaṃ kleśotpāda iti dvividhāvidyā tathāgatasya sarvathā prahīṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:7_4: anye sattvā steṣu kauśalaṃ na saṃpādayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8_7: prajñāprakarṣāt prakṛṣṭeryāpathaśca bhavati ityādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ prajñāskandhasampannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10_2: yathā kaścit vṛkṣaṃ chettuṃ haste dhṛtakuṭhāraḥ pāryantikaṃ jānānaḥ prajānāti śākhāḥ praśākhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10_3: tathā bhagavānapi saṃyojanaprahāṇajñānasya pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ sarvamavayavaśaḥ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:10_5: yena [te] vimucyante / ataḥ sattvānāṃ sarvavimuktimārge jñānadarśanasampannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11_0: kiñca bhagavān kālaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati yathā timburukabrāhmaṇādinām /
SA16hvsatssu:11_3: yathā bhagavānānandamāmantrya chandakasya yogyaṃ bhāvābhāvavyāvartakaṃ sūtramupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:11_5: kiñcopāyakuśalaḥ sattvamalaṃ hāpayati yathā nandasya kāmaprajihīrṣāyai [dharma]mupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:11_6: sattvānāñca śraddhendriyādiparipākaṃ jñātvā paścāt dharmamupadiśati yathā rāhulasya /
SA16hvsatssu:11_7: kecit sattvāḥ karmavipākāvṛtāḥ na vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:11_9: kecit sattvāḥ kālapakṣye kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti yathā jāyāpatisūtra upadiṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:11_10: kecit sattvāḥ puruṣaviśeṣamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ bhavanti yathā śāriputra aśvajitamapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:11_11: kecit sattvā deśamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā rājā pukkasātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11_12: kecit sattvā satīrthyamapekṣya [SSS_6] kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā gopāla nandaḥ ajitagrāmīṇādīnapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:11_13: kecit sattvā bhagavataḥ tāttvikakāyamapekṣya nirmitakāya ñcāpekṣya kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11_15: kiñca bhagavān vividhān saddharmānupadiya sarvān vimuktyāvaraṇadharmān paribhedayati ato vimuktijñānadarśanasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12_2: ataḥ suvimoko bhavati / bhagavān satvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ kuśalamūla ñca jñātvā kramaśo dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:12_3: bhagavān vimuktiṃ pratyakṣīkṛtya parasyopaśati na parataḥśratvā /
SA16hvsatssu:12_6: tathā jinaśāsanamapi pratipakṣakalāpamukhena sarvān kleśān vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12_7: yathā navasaṃjñādīn mahatyo 'lpā vā saṃyojanā na punaḥ kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12_10: kadācit sukumāravacanaiḥ kadācit kaṭuvacanaiḥ kadācit punaḥ sukumārakaṭuvacanaiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:15_4: asmāt īdṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na tādṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:15_5: ayamācāraḥ akuśalo 'vayaṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ na sukhavipāka iti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:15_6: sthānaṃ nāma bhāvavastu / asthānamabhāvavastu / ādyaṃ balamidaṃ sarvabalānāṃ mūlam /
SA16hvsatssu:16_1: yathā yavādyava eva jāyate na brīhyādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16_2: (u) sthānāsthānabalena karmādīnāṃ jñānāt idaṃ balamatigahanaṃ paramaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ na prāptuṃ śakyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16_3: jātadharmasya hetusamanantarādhipatipratyayān pratyāyayatītyata idaṃ balaṃ praṇītam /
SA16hvsatssu:17_0: (2) yat atitānāgatapratyutpannāni karmāṇi sarvadharmasamādānāni ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:17_1: teṣāṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti vastu prajānāti hetuṃ prajānāti vipākañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:17_5: ato bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ kathanaṃ balaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18_1: kecit kuśalakarmavanto dṛṣṭe duḥkhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ dhṛtvā kleśānanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18_2: kecitpāpakarmāṇaḥ dṛṣṭe sukhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ bhitvā svairaṃ caranti /
SA16hvsatssu:18_3: ataḥ kecit saṃśerate anāgatādhvāpi pratyutpannasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19_1: catvāri dharmasamādānāni pratyutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ āyatyāṃ sukhavipākam,
SA16hvsatssu:19_6: vastu, hetuṃ vipākañca prajānāti / sthānaṃ nāma vedakaḥ / vastu deyapadārthaḥ / heturdānacittam / yathoktaṃ sūtre pūrvañca pramuditacittaḥ dānakāle ca viśuddhacitto dattvā ca yanna vipratisarati /
SA16hvsatssu:19_8: bhagavāneva prajānāti taratamaṃ karma yadi niyatamaniyataṃ vā dṛṣṭavipākam upapadyavipākaṃ tadūrdhvavipākaṃ vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20_0: (3) bhagavān sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśaṃ prajānāti sthitiṃ prajānāti upacayaṃ prajānāti vyavadānañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:20_1: tatra dhyānaṃ nāma catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyasamādhayaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:20_6: samāpattayaścaturdhā vibhaktāḥ saṃkleśataḥ sthitita upacayato vyavadānataśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:21_7: atha śraddhāpratipat dharmapratipat iti dvividho mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:21_13: prājñajanā viśiṣṭendriyā adhimuktita upakṛtā średdhendriyapradhānāśca bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:22_2: tathāgato yathādhimukti pratipattiṃ prajānāti yadutāyaṃ sattvaḥ pañcakāmanāsvadhimuktaḥ bhāvanāmārge bādhimukta ityevaṃ viditvā yathārhaṃ dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:23_1: sattvānāṃ yat dīrghakālamabhyasya abhirocate sa dhātuḥ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:23_3: tathā kuśalasvabhāvā api / kecit sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ pravṛttarāgāḥ kecit dṛṣṭaṃ pratītya pravṛttarāgāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:24_1: imāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipanno naraka utpadyate yāvatsvarge iti ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:25_1: pūrvamuktaṃ mārgaḥ / idānīmuktantu mārgaphalam / pūrvaṃ sāmānyata uktam / idānīṃ vivicyocyate īdṛśakarmaṇā narakaṃ yāti,
SA16hvsatssu:25_3: narakapratitasyāpi pravibhāgo 'sti anena karmaṇā sañjīvanarake patiṣyati,
SA16hvsatssu:25_5: atastathāgataḥ saptamabale sthitaḥ sukṣmaṃ karma prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:26_1: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pūrvamācaritāṃ pratipadaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:26_3: tathāgato 'tītaṃ sarvamupapattisthānaṃ rūpadhātau vā ārupyadhātau vā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:27_0: (9) tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati anāgatādhvani tribhavasantānān trividhāni karmāṇi caturdharmasamādānāni ca jñātvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:31_5: eṣu caturṣu yadi kaścidāgatya yathā dharmaṃ codayet /
SA16hvsatssu:32_4: tathāgato vyākaroti āntarāyikamāntarāyikamārgadharmān yadutākuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalañca /
SA16hvsatssu:33_9: kasmāt / keṣāñcitpuruṣāṇāṃ jñāne satyapi vyākaraṇakauśalābhāvāt parapuruṣāṇāṃ vijayo vaiśāradyam /
SA16hvsatssu:33_15: ya ājanma paritrastaḥ sa paścāt kiñcit jñānaṃ labdhvā viśārado bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:33_16: kiṃ punarbhagavān sudūrakālāt mahodāracittaḥ sarvākārābhisambodhiñca labdhvā bibheṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:33_18: tatra na kaścidasti yaṃ tathāgato na vijitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:34_1: yo vādī vacanakuśalaḥ arthakuśalaśca sa viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:34_6: sarvasūtrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi ca pratividhya praśnavisarjanaṃ paridīpayatīti viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:34_7: kecitpunaḥ kule gotre rūpe śīlabāhuśrutyajñānādiṣu vā vikalā ityataḥ sāvadyaṃ śāstramadhigacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:35_1: sa ca tathāgata eva / yathāvocat asurabrāhmaṇo bhagavantam- yathābhūtadharmavādī durjayo duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35_3: iti / yaḥ punaścaturbhirvāda dharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'pi durjayaḥ duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35_7: devamanuṣyā api taṃ na jetuṃ śaknuvanti ityato viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35_8: yaśca kalyāṇamitramanupasevya vādaṃ karoti sa sukampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35_9: tathāgatastu dīpaṅkarādiṣu apramāṇabuddheṣu pūrvamevābhyastavādadharmā ityato na prakampyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35_15: bhagavānapi vadati astīti / nāstīti vadati loke nāstīti vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:35_16: ato nāsti vivādaḥ / tena saha vivādābhāvāt aprakampyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:36_0: śāstraṃ puna dvividhaṃ tattvaśāstraṃ śaṭhaśāstram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:36_3: ato 'pi na prakampyaḥ / jinaśāsane sucaritapariśuddhatvāt upadeśo 'pi pariśuddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:36_5: tīrthikānāṃ śāstrāṇi sahetvābhāsāni na sahetukāni iti na vijayasamarthāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:36_6: bhagavataḥ sūtrāṇi pariśuddhapravacanārthagatikāni tattvalakṣaṇāvilomakāni na tīrthikīyasamānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:36_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantyāha mā bhikṣavo mama vacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:36_12: prātarvo dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇe mayi sāyaṃ mārga labhedhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:36_15: na pravacanaṃ kuryāt / yatkiñcitpravadannapi avaśyaṃ prakampyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:36_21: bhagavān sattvānāmuttamo mahān iti alpajñānāṃ śāstraṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:36_22: ato viśāradaḥ / tīrthikānāṃ śāstraṃ yāṃ kāñcit dṛṣṭimupādāya pravṛttam /
SA16hvsatssu:36_24: tatsamudayaṃ prajānāti, nirodhaṃ prajānāti, āsvādaṃ prajānāti, ādīnavaṃ prajānāti, nairyāṇikañca prajānāti / tīrthikādayo na kṣayajñānasamarthā iti [mitho] vivadante /
SA16hvsatssu:36_25: tathāgatastu sarvākārajñaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvaparaśāstrāṇāṃ dārako na paraśāstrairdāryo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:36_26: ato viśāradaḥ / ityādayaḥ pratyayā balavaiśāradyapravibhāgārthā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:37_1: kasmāducyante / catvāryeva vaiśāradyāni / (u)yānyuktāni tāni sarvavaiśāradyānāṃ sāmānyavacanāni /
SA16hvsatssu:37_5: sa śrāvakaḥ śāstā kṣayajñānasampanna ityataḥ sarvāṇi vaiśāradyāni sāmānyata uktāni /
SA16hvsatssu:38_0: (pṛ) sattvāḥ kasmāt saṃśerate tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:38_2: tadyathā bhagavān pratyāha- kuto yūyamāgacchatha ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:38_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kaścit nagaraṃ praviśya tannāma nāgarikān pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:38_5: śrotāsya sūtrasya saṃśete tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:38_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha svāgataṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ anena [SSS_14] kāyena mahārthalābhāya mama śāsanamanuvartadhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:38_8: tadā pramuditaḥ syām iti / dveṣikalpamapyasti vacanam / yathoktam- tvaṃ khalu devadatta śavabhūtaḥ kheṭāśano 'si /
SA16hvsatssu:38_10: yathātmānamadhikṛtyāha ahaṃ pariṣadi siṃhakalpo daśabalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaiśca samanvitaḥ mahāpariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:38_13: āha ca devadattam- nāhaṃ dadāmi saṅghaṃ śāriputramaugdalyāyanādibhyo 'pi kiṃ punardāsyāmi tubhyam /
SA16hvsatssu:38_14: iti / alpajñā imāni vacanāni śrutvā vadanti tathāgatasyasravā akṣīṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:39_3: iti / ato 'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate tathāgata āvaraṇadharmānabhijña iti /
SA16hvsatssu:39_5: ato 'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate āryamārgaḥ saṃyojanānāṃ na kṣayakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:40_2: yathā laukikā jānanto 'pi praṣṭāro na duṣyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:40_4: laukikā anāsaṅgacittā api āsaṅgikalpaṃ vadanti īdṛśamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:40_6: kāmā nāntarāyikadharmā iti sati vacane tatra tathāgata upadiśati kāmā vastuta āntarāyikadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:40_7: yasya kāmāścittagatāḥ sa na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:40_8: ato 'vaśyaṃ kāmān pūrvaṃ parityajya paścānmārgaṃ spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:40_9: āpattidharme satyapi [SSS_15] mārgaḥprāpyata iti brūvato 'vaśyaṃ paribhinne 'pyāpattidharme mārgo na prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:40_10: yasya vastuto nāstyāpattiḥ / tasya gurupratyayatvāt bhagavān punaḥkhayamāśrāvayet nāstyāpattidharmo vināśayitum iti /
SA16hvsatssu:43_0: atha sūtra uktaṃ- tathāgatādīnāṃ daśa guṇāḥ yaduta tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavit anuttarapuruṣadaumyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:44_0: tathāgata iti yathābhūtamārgayānena saṃsādhitasamyaksambodhitvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:44_1: yadyadupadiśati sarvaṃ tattvameva bhavati na mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:45_1: yāñca rātriṃ parinirvṛtaḥ / atrāntarāle yat bhāṣate tat satyameva bhavati nānyathā /
SA16hvsatssu:45_3: sarvākārasarvajñajñānena pūrvāparaṃ parīkṣya paścādupadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ satyameva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:45_4: kiñca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smṛtirdṛḍhā bhavati na muṣitā /
SA16hvsatssu:45_5: kecidanumāya yadupadiśaṃti tat kadācit sūtrānuyāyi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:45_7: tairupadiṣṭhaṃ lābhāya vā bhavati hānāya vā /
SA16hvsatssu:45_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anumāturvacanaṃ lābhāya kadācit bhavati hānāya vā kadācit /
SA16hvsatssu:46_0: kālānurūpañcopadiṣṭam / yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān sattvānāṃ cittaprāmodyamadhimukti ñca prajñāya mārgamupadiśati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:46_2: yathoktaṃ kiṃśukaśirṣaka sūtre yo dharma upadeśārhaḥ tamupadiśati saṃkṣepato vistarato vā skandhāyatanādimukhena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:47_0: atha punardharmāvavādo dvividhaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:47_1: tathāgata idaṃ satyadvayaṃ niśrityopadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:47_2: bhagavān nopadiśati yat saṃvṛtisatyaṃ tat paramārthasatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:47_3: na ca yat paramārthasatyaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:47_5: atha tathāgatena yadi vā saṃvriyate yadi vā vivriyate tadubhayamapyaviruddham /

SA16hvsatssu:49_21: bhagavān daśanāmasampannaḥ svātmasampadā parasampadā ca ātmānamupakaroti parāṃścopakarotītyato 'bhivandyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:52_1: kutaḥ / na hi santi tathāgatasya kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni yāni[tathāgato rakṣitu]micchet mā paro drakṣyāt mā ca jñāsīt iti /

SA16hvsatssu:53_0: dharma upadiśyamāne yadi śrotā ekāgracitto bhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:71_0: atha tathāgataḥ svayaṃ svadharmaṃ stauti- mama dharmo nirodho nirvāṇagāmī samyak sambodhijanaka aupanāyika iti /

SA16hvsatssu:75_0: aupanāyika iti / buddhadharmaḥ pūrvamātmanaḥ kalyāṇaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:76_0: buddha dharmaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ- svākhyāto [bhagavatā] sāndṛṣṭikaḥ akālikaḥ aupanāyika ehipaśyakaḥ pratyātmaṃ vedayitavyo vijñaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:77_1: sāndṛṣṭika iti / buddhadharmo dṛṣṭa eva loke vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:77_7: ataḥ sāndṛṣṭikaṃ pūjāsatkāraṃ prāpayan aurdhvavipākaṃ nirvāṇaśca prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:78_0: akālika iti / buddhadharmo na kañcana divasaṃ māsaṃ vatsaraṃ nakṣatraṃ vāpekṣya mārgo bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:78_1: asmin divase māse vatsare va mārgo na bhāvyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:78_2: na brāhmaṇadharmavat vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:78_6: ata āha akālika iti / yathoktaṃ sūtre buddhadharmaḥ svācāraścaryāsthitiniṣādanaśayaneṣvakālika iti /
SA16hvsatssu:79_0: aupanāuyika iti / samyak caryayā sattvān vimuktimupanayatīti aupanāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:80_0: ehipaśyaka iti / baddhadharmaḥ svakāyena sākṣātkartavyo bhaviṣyati na parānuvartanena /
SA16hvsatssu:80_1: yathāvocadbhagavān- mā bhikṣavaḥ kevalaṃ mama pravacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:80_2: svayameva parīkṣadhvam ayaṃ dharma ācāritavyaḥ ayamanācaritavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:80_3: na yathā tīrthikā vadanti svaśiṣyān- praśnaprativacanaṃ mā kurudhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:80_4: yathāvat śucisnātā bhavata, mā malinābhirucikāḥ / badhiramūkavat mama vacanamātramanusarata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:81_2: upavāsādau paramamugdhāḥ śraddadhante vijñaiḥ sukhaṃ na vedyata iti /

SA16hvsatssu:82_0: atha buddhadharma adhyātmamadhigantavyaḥ na dhanādivat svayamadhigamya parasmai pradātavyaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:82_3: iti / nāyaṃ dharmaḥ paragāmī san upalabhyate,
SA16hvsatssu:82_4: tejaḥ saṃkramādivat / pṛthagjanā avidyāparvatapraticchannā na śraddhadhanta imaṃ dharmam /

SA16hvsatssu:165_4: ayamutsargaḥ / srotaāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno 'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:165_5: ayamapavādaḥ / api coktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:165_6: ayamutsargaḥ / yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata [SSS_43] iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:165_7: tadayuktam / atha coktaṃ sūtre- śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:165_8: iti / ayamapavādaḥ / utsargo 'pavādaśca sarvaḥ sayuktiko na dharmalakṣaṇavilomakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:166_1: viniścitam- yathocyate- buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:166_4: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam /
SA16hvsatssu:166_6: tadaviniścitam / satyāṃ tṛṣṇāyāṃ jāyate / tṛṣṇākṣaye nirudhyate / kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- samāhitasya tattvajñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:166_10: idamapi aviniścitam / kadācittu na labhyate / yadāha- ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśajanakam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:167_1: yathocyate- adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:167_5: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā- duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:167_10: āha ca- duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:170_1: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:171_1: yathā bhagavānā ha- ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:171_3: iti / srotaāpanna udayavyayalakṣaṇadvitayadṛṣṭiṃ jānannapi sarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:172_1: yathocyate- annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān- āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:172_5: kārṣāpaṇaṃ nādanīyam / api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:172_7: na vastuto malam / āsaṅgādikleśamalahetutvāt / malamityucyate / kiñcāha- pañca viṣayāḥ kāmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:172_8: na vastutaḥ kāmāḥ / kāmajanakatvāt / kāmā ityucyante / sukhakāraṇaṃ sukhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:172_9: yathā vadanti- upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:172_11: yathā vadanti- mūḍhaiḥ saha saṃvāso duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:174_0: āhuścāsravaheturāsrava iti / yathāha saptāsravasūtram- tatra dvau vastuta āsravau,
SA16hvsatssu:175_1: kārye kāraṇopacāraścāsti / yathā bhagavānāha- mayā pūrvakarmānubhavitavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:179_2: yathoktaṃ sūsre- dvau puruṣau staḥ jño 'jñaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:179_4: yastu kuśalaḥ, sa jña iti / śāstre cāsmin skandhadhātvāyatanādīni samyagvivicyante /
SA16hvsatssu:180_2: yathā vadanti- kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho 'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:180_4: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho 'pi aprākṛta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:180_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe 'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:180_9: ādyaḥ pravrajitaḥ prākṛtaḥ / anantaro gṛhastha āryaḥ / tṛtīyaḥ pravrajitaḥ āryaḥ / caturtho gṛhastha prākṛtaḥ / iti / anena hetunā śraddhendriyādivirahito na saṅghagaṇānāyāmavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:180_11: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:181_0: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:181_6: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:181_7: sa ātmahitāya pratipannaḥ / evaṃ caturdhā / yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno 'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:181_8: tadapi parahitam / tatra buddhānusmṛte rnedaṃ hitamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:181_10: tat parahitam / sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno 'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano 'pi hitamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:181_11: yathoktaṃ sūtre- parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:181_13: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:182_0: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:182_1: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:182_2: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:182_3: kasmāt / dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] /
SA16hvsatssu:182_4: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:182_5: yaktoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ- tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:182_6: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:182_7: tīrṇaḥ pāraṅgata iti / yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:183_0: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:183_3: sa sadā bhavanimagnaḥ / kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:183_5: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:183_7: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:184_1: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:184_2: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:184_4: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:184_6: - uktañca sūtre caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- kecit agambhīratīkṣṇānuyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:184_10: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:184_12: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:184_13: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:185_3: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:185_4: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:186_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vākathya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:186_2: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:186_3: parikalpe na santiṣṭhati / pratipadāyāṃ na santiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:186_4: ayamakathyo bhavati / tadviparītaḥ kathya iti / viduṣāṃ dharme na tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:186_6: so 'syājñatvāt na grāhyaḥ / yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:186_8: hetuprayoge na tiṣṭhati / tīrthikādīnāṃ dvidhā hetuḥ sādhāraṇahetuḥ viśeṣaheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:186_15: vādapaddhatau na tiṣṭhati / yathā ha- mā paruṣavacanamuccāraya /
SA16hvsatssu:186_16: mā tyaja pratijñārtham / yatnenopāyaṃ śikṣaya saṃvillābhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:186_17: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:186_18: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:187_0: akathya iti / ya [ekāṃśa]vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ nai[kāṃśena] vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:187_1: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:187_2: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:187_3: tadviparītaḥ kathyaḥ / ekāṃśa vyākaraṇīyaḥ praśna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:187_4: [tatra] eka eva heturasti / [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:187_9: yathā kaścitpṛcchati / anyaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchaya vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:187_10: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo 'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:187_11: sa dharmaḥ kimekaḥ uta nānā, kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:187_12: nāyamartho vyākaraṇīyaḥ / bhagavacchāsanasya vettā kevalaṃ tat vetti /
SA16hvsatssu:188_0: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:188_1: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko 'pi kuśaladharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:188_3: alpavadya iti / yasya kuśalaṃ bahu akuśalamalpam /
SA16hvsatssu:188_5: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo 'navadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:192_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāri saṅgrahavastūni- dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:192_2: dānam annavastrādīnām / dhanadānena saṃgṛhītāḥ sattvāḥ punarvikampyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:192_7: idamapi prakampyaṃ bhavati / samānārthatā / yathā śoke mode ca [pareṇa] sahaikībhavanam /
SA16hvsatssu:192_8: iyaṃ samānārthatā / idaṃ kadācitprakampyam / yadi kaścit dharmadānapriyavacanārthacaryāsamānārthatābhiḥ sattvān saṅgṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:192_9: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:193_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dharmapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgalapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:193_2: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:193_4: yadvacanantu sūtre 'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:193_8: vinayaśca saṃvaraḥ / tadyathā kaścit saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śāśvatāḥ [SSS_50] sukhāḥ sātmāna iti bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:193_9: sa na kāmādīn prajahāti / anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:193_10: sa kāmādīn prajahāti / anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo 'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:194_0: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:194_1: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:194_3: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:194_4: yo 'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre 'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:194_10: śūnyataiva yathābhūtam / ato yadvijñānapratilabdham, na tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:195_0: uktañca sūtre- catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṃ cakrāṇi śubhavardhakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:195_1: pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satparuṣopāśrayaḥ ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:195_2: iti / pratirūpadeśavāso nāma yat pañcadūṣaṇavivikto madhyadeśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:195_4: pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā nāma yat bādhiryamūkatādyabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:195_5: ātmanaḥ samyak praṇidhānaṃ nāma samyak darśanamidam /
SA16hvsatssu:196_0: asya śāstrasyādhyetā cāsminnevāyuṣi satyaprativedhākhyaṃ mahāsārārthaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:196_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ sāradharmāḥ vacanasāraḥ samādhisāro darśanasāro vimuktisāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:196_2: [SSS_51] vacanasāra iti / sarve saṃskṛtā anityā duḥkhāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:196_3: sarve anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:196_6: imaṃ samādhimupādāya saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ ityādi bhāvanā samyagdarśanaprāpiṇī bhāvanāmayaprajñāparipūraṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:197_1: sa mahāntamarthaṃ labhate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro mahārthadharmāḥ satpuruṣasaṃsevā,
SA16hvsatssu:197_5: śrutasaddharmā san yoniśo manaskāramutpādya anityādinā dharmān samyagbhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:197_6: anayā bhāvanayā dharmānudharmaṃ pratipadyate yadutānāsravaṃ darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:198_1: satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ, tyāgādhiṣṭhānaṃ, upaśamādhiṣṭhānamiti / dharmaśravaṇātprajñā bhavatīti prajñādhiṣṭhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:198_3: śūnyatādarśanena kleśānāṃ viyogaṃ labhata iti tyāgādhiṣṭhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:199_0: kiñca bhagavacchāsanasya samyacchāstraṃ śrutavataścatvāri nirvāṇagāmini kuśalamūlāni aṅkurībhavanti yaduta ūṣmadharmo mūrdhadharmaḥ kṣāntidharmo laukikāgradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:199_1: anityādyākāreṇa pañcaskandhān bhāvayato 'varaṃ mṛdu nirvāṇagāmi kuśalamūlaṃ cittasyoṣmakaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:199_2: ayamūṣmadharma ityucyate / uṣmadharmasaṃvardhitaṃ madhyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ mūrdhadharma ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:200_6: yastathāgatasya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa hānabhāgīyaṃ visaṃyujya trīṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:203_0: atha yastāthāgatadharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa catussatyāni savibhaṅgāni samprajānāti duḥkhasatyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:204_0: santi ca catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:204_3: santi ca catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedeja aupapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:204_7: catvāra āhārāḥ- kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:204_9: sparśāhāraḥ śītoṣṇavātādiḥ / manaḥsañcetanāhāro yat kadācit puruṣāḥ sañcetanāpraṇidhānena jīvati /
SA16hvsatssu:204_10: vijñānāhāraḥ antarābhavikanārakārūpyā nirodhasamāpattipraviṣṭhāḥ satvā adṛṣṭavijñānā api vijñānapratilambhe vartanta ityato vijñānāhārā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:205_1: madhyamapāpāstiryañcaḥ / adhamapāpāḥ pretāḥ / uttamapuṇyā devagatiḥ / madhyamapuṇyā manuṣyagatiḥ / adhamapuṇyā asuragatiḥ / kiñca ṣaṭ [bhūta]prakārāḥ- pṛthivyaptejovāvyākāśavijñānānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:205_2: caturbhirmahābhūtaiḥ parivṛtaṃ vijñānamadhyakamākāśaṃ [SSS_53] puruṣa iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:205_3: ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni ṣaḍindriyāṇi vijñānasaṅgatāni sparśāyatanamityākhyāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:206_0: saptavijñānasthitayaḥ / āsu sthitiṣu viparyayabalāt vijñānaṃ sābhirāmaṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:207_0: aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ- lābho 'lābho yaśo 'yaśo nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:208_0: nava sattvāvāsāḥ / sattvāḥ sarve viṣayabalādeṣu vasanti /
SA16hvsatssu:209_0: sarve ca dharmāḥ pañcadhā vikalpyante- pañca skandhāḥ dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo dvādaśa nidānāni dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:209_3: yat cittaṃ strī puruṣaḥ śatrubandhurityādisaṃjñāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:209_4: sa saṃjñāskandhaḥ / śatrurbandhurmadhyastha iti yat puruṣaṃ vikalpayati tat tisro vedanā janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:209_5: ayaṃ vedanāskandhaḥ / āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu yat trividhāḥ kleśā utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:209_6: sa saṃskāraskandhaḥ / eṣāṃ pravṛttyā kāyopādānānyupādatta iti pañcopādānaskandhā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:210_0: caturbhiḥ pratyayai vijñānamutpadyate yaduta hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyaya ālambanapratyayo [SSS_54] 'dhipatipratyayaśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:210_4: tatra vijñānaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate yat cakṣuḥrūpaṃ yāvanmano dharmān /
SA16hvsatssu:211_1: dvādaśasu parvasu vartitvāt dvādaśa nidānāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:211_2: tatrāvidyā kleśāḥ / saṃskāraḥ karma / imau dvāvupādāya kramaśa utpadyante- vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:211_4: bhavaḥ karma / anāgate 'dhvani kāyopādānasyādyaṃ vijñānaṃ jātirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:211_5: anyat jarāmaraṇam / imāni dvādaśa nidānāni atītānāgatavartamānasandarśanāni kevalamupādanapratyayarūpāṇi anātmakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:212_2: tadvijñānaṃ cakṣurādibhyaḥ ṣoḍhā samutpadyate iti ṣaḍindriyāṇyucyante yat cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvanmanaindriyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:212_7: ebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhya utpadyamānaṃ ṣoḍhā vijñānaṃ jīvitamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:212_8: kasmāt / imāni ṣaḍāyatanānīti ṣaḍvijñānānīti santānapravṛttiṃ labhanto ityato jīvitamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:212_9: ata eṣāṃ jīvitamityākhyā / tatra kimindrim / yaducyate karma / karmahetutayā ṣaḍāyatanaṣaḍvijñānāni santānena pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:212_13: tebhyaḥ pañcendriyebhyaḥ kāmatṛṣṇādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ kāyikavācikakarmāṇi ca prādurbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:213_4: ājñā, ājñātāvī ti / bhāvanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ tānīndriyāṇi jñāna[rūpa]prajñāviśeṣabhūtāni /
SA16hvsatssu:214_0: samudayasatyamiti / karma kleśāḥ / karma karmaskandhe vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:215_1: yat prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittamityeṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:216_0: mārgasatyamiti / yatsaptatriṃśadvodhipakṣikā dharmāḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri pradhānāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni saptabodhyaṅgāni aṣṭāvāryamārgāṅgāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:216_3: smṛtiśca prajñā bhavati / kāyo 'nitya ityādi bhāvanayā tadālambane viharaṇaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānam /
SA16hvsatssu:216_4: iyaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñayā saha kramaśo bhūyo vivṛddhā vedanāṃ vikalpayatīti vedanāsmṛtyupasthānam /
SA16hvsatssu:217_0: catvāri samyak pradhānānīti / utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmādīnavaṃ paśyan tatprahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:217_2: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:217_4: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāya chandaṃ janayati [SSS_56] vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:217_6: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmaṇāṃ vaipulyāya chandaṃ janayati vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:218_5: ayaṃ dvitīya [ṛddhipādaḥ] / yogī sacchandaḥ savīryaśca cittasamādhiṃ prajñāñca bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:219_1: saśraddhaḥ san saṃkleśadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya vyavadānadharmāṇāmadhigamāya ca vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:220_0: aṣṭāvāryamārgāṅgānīti / śrutamayaprajñaḥ śraddadhate pañcaskandhā anityā duḥkhā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:220_1: iyaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ / prajñeyaṃ yadi cintāmayī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:220_2: tadā samyak saṅkalpaḥ / samyak saṅkalpenākuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ karmaṇā bhāvanāyai ca yat vīryamācarati sa samyak vyāyāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:220_3: tataḥ krameṇa pravrajitaḥ śīlamupādāya samyagvācaṃ samyak karmāntaṃ samyagājīvañca trīṇi mārgāṅgānyanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:220_4: asmāt samyak saṃvarātkramaśaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni dhyānasamādhayaśca saṃsidhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:220_12: sā ca prajñā dvividhā audārikī sūkṣmā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:220_13: audārikīti yā śrutamayī cintāmayī ca prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:220_15: sūkṣmeti bhāvanāmayī prajñā yā ūṣmādidharmagatā prajñaptisatpañcaskandhān vidārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:220_16: iyaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ / anayā samyagdṛṣṭayā yaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:221_0: smṛtisambodhyaṅgam- śaikṣaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtipramoṣe kleśā uttiṣṭhantītyataḥ samyak smṛtyupasthānaṃ badhnāti /
SA16hvsatssu:221_1: baddhasmṛtiḥ san pūrvāgamalabdhāṃ samyak dṛṣṭiṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:221_4: iayaṃ prītiḥ / prītyā kāyaḥ praśramyate / iyaṃ praśrabdhiḥ / praśrabdhyā sukhī bhavati / sukhitve cittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:221_7: iyamuttamā caryā / upekṣā ca nonmajjanaṃ nanimajjanaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:221_8: kintu tayościttasamatā / sambodhirnāmāśaikṣajñānam / imāni sapta bhāvayan sambodhiṃ labhata iti sambodhyaṅgamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:222_3: sakṛdāgāmiphalamiti yat imameva mārgaṃ bhāvayan kleśān tanūkṛtya kāmadhātau sakṛdutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:222_6: ya idaṃ tathāgatadharmaśāstramadhyeti sa catvāri satyāni abhisametya catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:226_0: jñeyādidharmaskandha iti yaduta jñeyadharmā vijñeyadharmā rūpadharmā ārūpyadharmāḥ sanidarśanadharmā anidarśanadharmāḥ sapratighadharmā apratighadharmāḥ sāsravadharmā anāsravadharmāḥ saṃskṛta dharmā asaṃskṛtadharmāścittadharmā acittadharmāścaitasikadharmā acaitasikadharmāścittasaṃprayukta dharmāścittaviprayuktadharmāścittasahabhūdharmāścittāsahabhūdharmāścittānucaradharmāścittānanucaradharmā ādhyātmikadharmā bāhyadharmā audārikadharmāḥ sūkṣmadharmā uttamadharmā avaradharmāḥ sannikṛṣṭadharmā viprakṛṣṭadharmā upādānadharmā anupādānadharmā nairyāṇikadharmā anairyāṇikadharmāḥ prākṛtadharmā aprākṛtadharmāḥ samanantaradharmā asamanantaradharmāḥ kramikadharmā akramikadharmā ityevamādayo dvidhā dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:228_0: catuvirdhāśca santi dharmāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktadharmā rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktadharmā ārūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktadharmā apratisaṃyuktadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:228_1: catasraḥ pratipadaḥ duścarā duḥkhapratipat sucarā duḥkhapratipat duścarā sukhapratipat sucarā sukhapratipat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:228_2: catvāra āsvādāḥ- pravrajyāsvādo visaṃyogāsvāda upaśamāsvādaḥ samyaksambodhāsvād iti /
SA16hvsatssu:228_3: catvāraḥ sākṣātkṛtadharmāḥ- kāyasākṣātkṛtadharmāḥ smṛtisākṣātkṛtadharmā indriyasākṣātkṛtadharmāḥ prajñāsākṣātkṛtadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:228_5: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ, catasraḥ śraddhāḥ, catvāri āryagotrāṇi, catvāri duścaritāni ityevamādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:229_1: ṣaḍ bāhyāyatanāni, ṣaḍ jātisvabhāvāḥ, ṣaḍ saumanasyopavicārā ṣaḍ daurmanasyopavicārā ṣaḍupekṣopavicārāḥ ṣaḍ sucaritāni /
SA16hvsatssu:229_2: sapta viśuddhayaḥ / aṣṭa puṇyajanmāni / navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ / daśāryāvāsāḥ / dvādaśa nidānāni / ityevamādayo dharmaskandhā apramāṇā anantā iti nāvasānaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:230_6: sanidarśanadharmā iti yāni rūpāyatanāni sapratidhadharmā iti rūpadharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:230_7: sāsravadharmā iti ya āsravāṇāmutpādakā yathā anarhatāṃ prajñaptidharmeṣu cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:230_14: yathā saṃjñādayaḥ / cittasahabhūdharmā iti ye dharmāścittena sahabhuvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:230_16: cittānucaradharmā iti ye dharmāścitte sati utpadyante nāsati yathā kāyavāgbhyāmakṛtaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:231_11: satyadarśanaheyadharmā iti yat [SSS_60] srotaāpannānāṃ heyā nimittasandarśanāsmimānatajjā dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:231_12: bhāvanāheyadharmā iti yat srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmināṃ heyā animittasandarśanāsmimānatajjā dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_0: kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktadharmā iti ye dharmā vipākalabdhā avīcinarakāt yāvatparanirmitavaśavartino devān /
SA16hvsatssu:232_4: duścarā duḥkhapratipat iti mṛdvindriyasya samādhiṃ labdhvā mārgacāriṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_5: sucarā duḥkhapratipat iti tīkṣṇendriyasya samādhiṃ labdhvā mārgacāriṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_6: duścarā sukhapratipat iti mṛdvindriyasya prajñāṃ labdhvā mārgacāriṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_7: sucarā sukhapratipat iti tīkṣṇendriyasya prajñāṃ labdhvā mārgacāriṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_15: catvāra upādānakāyā iti kaścidātmānaṃ hinasti na parān /
SA16hvsatssu:232_19: catasro garbhāvakrāntaya iti kaścidasamprajānanneva mātuḥ kukṣāvavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:232_29: / catvāraḥ pratyayā iti hetupratyayo yo janakahetuḥ vāsanāheturāśrayahetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:232_30: janakahetu yo dharmo jāyamānasya hetukṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:232_31: yathā vipākātmakaṃ karma / vāsanāhetuḥ kāmarāgavāsanāyāṃ kāmarāgo 'bhivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:232_38: / catasraḥ śraddhā iti / (1) tathāgataśraddhā yat tattvajñānaṃ labdhā tathāgate prasannacitto niścinoti tathāgataḥ sattveṣu śreṣṭha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:232_41: (4) āryāṇāṃ priyaṃ saṃvaraṃ labdhvā adhyāśayenāpi nāhamakuśalāni karomi ahamimaṃ saṃvaramupādāya triṣu ratneṣu ca śraddhāvāniti ca prajānāti iti yadiyaṃ śraddhā saṃvarabalāditi saṃvaraśraddhetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:232_44: iti catvāryāryagotrāṇi // catvāri duścaritānīti / rāgadveṣamohasantrāsairdurgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:233_15: / ṣaḍ jātisvabhāvā iti yat kṛṣṇasvabhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ niṣevate /
SA16hvsatssu:235_0: aṣṭau puṇya sargā iti manuṣyeṣvāḍhya ābrahmalokāt /
SA16hvsatssu:237_0: daśāryāvāsā iti / āryaḥ pudgalaḥ (1) pañcāṅgaviprahīno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:237_1: (2) ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgataḥ / (3) ekārakṣaḥ / (4) caturapāśrayaḥ / (5) praṇunnapratyekasatyaḥ / (6) samavasṛṣṭeṣaṇaḥ / (7) anāvilasaṅkalpaḥ / (8) praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:237_2: (9) suviviktacittaḥ / (10) suvimuktaprajñaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ san kevalo 'sahāyī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:237_5: (2) ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgata iti / yataścakṣurādibhiḥ rūpādi dṛṣṭvā naivā sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan /
SA16hvsatssu:237_6: (3) ekārakṣa iti / smṛtyārakṣeṇa cetasā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:237_8: kecitpunarāhuḥ- caturapāśraya iti ārya [ekaṃ] dharmaṃ parivarjayati /
SA16hvsatssu:237_10: ekaṃ dharmaṃ vinodayati / ekaṃ dharmamadhivāsayati // (5) viśuddhaśīladhāraṇāt tattvalakṣaṇaṃ pratibudhyan praṇunnapratyekasatya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:237_15: īṣaṇātrayaprahāṇaṃ vajropamasamādhiṃ lapsya itīcchayā śaikṣamārgaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:237_17: (7) anāvilasaṅkalpa iti / prahīṇaṣaḍvitarkaḥ viśuddhacittastrīṇi viṣāṇi tanūkṛtya dvitīyaphalaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:237_20: kāmadhātukasaṃyojanāni vihāya catvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viharatītyataḥ praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:237_23: āryāṇāṃ cittameṣu daśasu sthāneṣu āvasatīti āryāvāsaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:237_24: kṛtatathāgatadharmo 'vaśyaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuryādityataḥ kṛtakṛtya iti kathyate /
SA16hvsatssu:237_26: taccitaṃ sarvadharmān vidhūya atyantaśūnyatāpratiṣṭhitamityataḥ kevala ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:238_2: tadviparyayacittamupādāya karmāṇi sañcinotīti avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:238_7: sarvā api vedanā anubhavan prajñaptimāśrayate ityatastatra tṛṣṇāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:238_9: tṛṣṇopādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / sa ca trikāṇḍaḥ / ebhyaḥ karmakleśapratyayebhya aurdhvakālikī jātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:239_0: tatra yaducyate avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti tadatītādhvaprakāśanaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭisamucchedakam /
SA16hvsatssu:239_1: jñāyate hi anādisaṃsāre ājavañjavibhāve karmakleśapratyayebhyaḥ kāyo vedyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:239_9: tatpratyayaṃ phalaṃ yaduta vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:240_0: ya idaṃ samyacchāstraṃ niṣevate sa dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā iti prajñāya na karmāṇi sañcinoti /
SA16hvsatssu:240_3: ata ātmahitaṃ satvahitañca kāmayamānaḥ kramaśastathāgatamārgaṃ prasādhya svadharmamādīpayan paradharmaṃ yo nirākaroti tenedaṃ śāstraṃ niṣevitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:243_0: (pṛ) śāstrārambha uktaṃ bhavatā- niṣevya bhinnavādāṃśceti tathāgatadharmavicārayiṣayā /
SA16hvsatssu:243_1: ke te vibhinnā vādāḥ / (u) tripiṭake santi bahavo vibhinnā vādāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:243_2: puruṣāṇāṃ bhūyasā pramodāya paraṃ vivādaśāstrapravartakairabhihitam- yaduta (1) astyadhvadvayaṃ nāstyadhvadvayam,
SA16hvsatssu:243_3: (2) sarvamasti sarvaṃ nāsti, (3) astyantarā bhavo nāstyantarā bhavaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:243_4: (4) catussatyānāmānupūrveṇa lābhaḥ ekakṣaṇena lābhaḥ (5) asti parihāṇiḥ nāsti parihāṇiḥ (6) anuśayāścittasamprayuktāḥ cittaviprayuktāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:243_6: na prakṛtipariśuddham, (8) upāttavipākaṃ karma kiñcidasti kiñcinnāsti,
SA16hvsatssu:243_8: na saṅghagaṇitaḥ, (10) asti pudgalo nāsti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:244_1: kecidāhuḥ nāstīti / kena pratyayena astīti vadanti kena pratyayena nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:244_2: (u) astīti yaḥ san dharmaḥ tatra cittamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:246_1: kasmāt / yathādhimukti avinīlakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinīlakaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:246_5: sūtre coktam- ahaṃ prajānāmi nādhyātmamasti chandarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:246_6: uktañca sūtre- yathā yo rūpe chandarāgaḥ taṃ prajahīt /
SA16hvsatssu:246_8: yathā ca svapne asadapi mithyā [sat] paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:247_1: ucyate / avidyamāne 'pi jñānaṃ pracaratīti na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:247_2: kasmāt / āśrayālambanātmaka dharmadvayaṃ pratītya hi vijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:247_9: yat na kiñcana vijānāti na tat vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:247_10: vijñānaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānāti vacanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti yāvanmanovijñānaṃ dharmān vijānāti ityetasyābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:247_13: kiñca anālambanaṃ vijñānamastīti vādinastat bhrāntaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:247_16: saṃśayo na syāt / kiñcittu jñātuḥ saṃśaya utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:247_18: tasya jñānaṃ darśanaṃ veti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:248_1: yadyasat, kasya jñānaṃ syāt / uktañca sūtre- cittacaittā ālambamānadharmāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:248_3: natu tatroktam avidyamāno dharma ālambvyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:248_6: uktañca sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:248_9: yasya jñānaṃ na tadasat / yannāsti na tasya jñānam / ato nāstyasadālambanaṃ jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:249_1: yathādhimukti avinīlakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinīlakamiti paśyatīti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:249_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- astyasmin vṛkṣe viśuddhatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:250_2: asati sattve sattvābhāsaṃ paśyantīti māyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:250_4: samādhibalāt tadasallakṣaṇaṃ [SSS_67] bhavati na tu asattadbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:250_9: tatra vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi naivāsti na nāstīti vyapadiśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:250_10: uktañca bhavatā- aṅgulyā nidiśyātmānaṃ candradvayaṃ paśyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:250_13: ahaṃ prajānāmi nādhyātmamasti chandarāga iti yadbhavatoktam /
SA16hvsatssu:250_14: sa pañcanīvaraṇaviruddhāni saptabodhyaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā manaskāraṃ janayati- ahaṃ prajānāmi antaśchandābhāvamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:250_16: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- yat rūpe chandarāgaṃ prahīṇaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:250_17: tadrūpaprahāṇamiti / paramārthaprajñādarśanasya mithyādhimuktiṃ prati virodhitvāt chandarāgaprahāṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:250_19: tatra pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaśrutasmṛtavikalpita bhāvitānyupādāya hi svapnadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:251_0: dūṣaṇam- yat bhavānavocat- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_1: idamayuktam / tathāgataḥ pudgaladūṣaṇayāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_4: asati nāstīti jñānam / yadīdaṃ vastu nāsti / tadvastu nāstīti śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:251_7: [yat]bhavānavocat cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti yāvanmanovijñānaṃ dharmān vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_8: tat vijñānaṃ viṣayamātraṃ vijānāti na vicinoti san vā asan vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_13: saṃśayo na bhavediti / kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti yadi saṃśayaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:251_15: āha ca bhavān- yathoktaṃ sūtre yallokato 'vidyamāna ātmā tasya jñānaṃ darśanaṃ veti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_16: idaṃ sūtraṃ na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam abuddhavacanaṃ tadābhāsaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:251_17: samādhirvā evam / tatsamādhimupasampannena yatkiñcit dṛśyate sarvaṃ sadeva /
SA16hvsatssu:251_19: asti asadālambanaṃ jñānamiti mama vacanaṃ na svato viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:251_21: sarve dharmā ālambyā iti / santi ca cittacaittā anālambamānāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:251_23: ato 'nālambamānā bhavanti / dharmāṇāṃ yatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇairviyuktatvāt cittacaittā nālambamānā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_26: tadvijñānaṃ saddhetukameva / trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_28: na tu sarvatra trīṇi santi / abravīcca bhavān- yasya jñānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:251_29: na tadasadbhavati / yannāsti, na tasya jñānamiti / yadi sadālambanaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_30: tatrāpi samo doṣaḥ / yat bhavānāha- yathā vṛkṣe 'sti viśuddhateti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_31: nedaṃ yujyate / satkāryadoṣāt / yadbhavatoktaṃ [nīla]lakṣaṇagrāhicittaṃ vipulaṃ pariṇamata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_32: tadapi na yuktam / nīlalakṣaṇālpamūlaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:251_33: tadabhūtadarśanam / tathā alpanīlabhāvanayā tu sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati na tadabhūtadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:251_34: bhavān bravīti- māyājālasūtramāha- asti māyā māyāvastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_35: asati sattve sattvābhāsaṃ sattva iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:251_38: āha ca bhavān- samādhibalāttallakṣaṇaṃ bhavati yathā vastutaḥ sadapi rūpaṃ śūnyatayāpohyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_40: tadā viparyayaḥ / alpasya sato 'sattāvacanamapi viparyaya eva /
SA16hvsatssu:251_42: tadapi na yujyate / yathā timiropahatacakṣuṣka ākāśe keśān paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:251_43: te 'vastusantaḥ / āha ca bhavān pañcanīvaraṇaviruddhāni saptabodhyaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā manaskāraṃ janayati ahamasat prajānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_45: kathamekaḥ syāt / bhavān bravīti- paramārthaprajñādarśanasya mithyādhimuktiṃ prati virodhitaiva chandarāgaprahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_47: ata ucyate chandarāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñāya rūpaprahāṇaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_49: yat bhavān kathayati- svapne vastusan dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:251_51: na vastutaḥ patati / ato 'sti asajjñānasya jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:251_52: na tu yatna jñānaṃ pracaratīti sattālakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:254_2: (u) tadapi na yuktam / kasmāt / ayaṃ vādī vadati- skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītaṃ vastu pṛthagjanadharmo na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam /
SA16hvsatssu:254_3: tathā cet tathatādayo 'saṃskṛtadharmā api santaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:254_4: iti kecidvadeyuḥ / vastutastu asantaste / ato jñāyate skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītā dharmā na sallakṣaṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:255_0: (pṛ) yat puruṣasya pratyakṣajñānādinā astyupalabhyamiti śraddhā bhavati tatsallakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:255_1: (u) tadapi na sallakṣaṇam / ayaṃ śraddheyadharmo niyatavikalparūpo noalapabhyavacanaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:255_2: āha ca sūtram- jñānapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vijñānapratiśaraṇena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:255_3: svabhāvalabdhatvāt rūpādayo viṣayā nopalambhanīyā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:256_0: (pṛ) yadi lokasatyato 'sti / tadā punarvaktavyaṃ lokasatyato 'tīto 'nāgataśca kimasti uta nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:256_1: (u) nāsti / kasmāt / ye rūpādayaḥ skandhā vartamānādhvagatāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:256_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpyata iti rūpalakṣaṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:256_5: tathā vedanādayo 'pi / ato jñāyate vartamānamātre santi pañca skandhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:256_6: nādhvadvaye santi / atha yo dharmaḥ kāritravihīnaḥ sa svalakṣaṇavihīnaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:256_7: yadyatīto vahnirna dahati / na sa vahnirityākhyāyate / tathā vijñānamapi, yadyatītaṃ na vijānāti na tadvijñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:256_9: atīto dharmo nirhetukaḥ, so 'stīti na yujyate / atha prākṛtāḥ santo dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:256_10: yathā asti pṛthivī, santi bījasalilādayaḥ pratyayāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:257_0: atha yadyanāgatadharmo 'sti / tadā nityaḥ syāt / anāgatādvartamānaṃ pratyanuprāpteḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:257_2: tadā nānityaḥ syāt / na caitatsambhavati / yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣurvijñānamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:257_5: atha yadyanāgataṃ sat cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati tadā sakāritraṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:257_6: tathātītamapi / na tu vastuto yujyate / ato jñāyate atītānāgatadharmo 'sanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:257_8: na vastuto yujyate / ato nāsti / atha yadi ghaṭādayaḥ padārthāḥ anāgatāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:257_10: dṛśyante tu savyāpārāḥ / ato nāstyanāgataḥ / kiñca bhagavānāhasaṃskṛtadharmā utpādavyayasthityanyathātvai strilakṣaṇā upalabhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:257_11: utpāda iti yo dharmaḥ [SSS_71] pūrvamabhūtvā idānīṃ savyāpāro dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:260_0: (pṛ) vastusadatīmanāgatam / kasmāt / yo dharmo 'sti tatra cittaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:260_3: apicāha- yatkiñcana rūpamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vā atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā [sarva]mabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:260_7: ato 'stīti vaktavyam / dṛṣṭe jñānāt jñānamutpadyate iti paribhāvitatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:260_8: yathā śāleḥ śālirbhavati / ato 'tītamastīti syāt / yadi nāstyatītaṃ, phalaṃ nirhetukaṃ syāt / uktañca sūtre- yadatītaṃ vastusat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:260_10: iti / anāgatālambanaṃ manovijñānaṃ atītaṃ mana āśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:260_11: yadātītaṃ vijñānamasat, kimāśrayet / atītakarmata anāgataṃ phalamiti jñānaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:260_13: tathāgataḥ svayameva vadati- yasya nāstyatītaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpakarma sa puruṣo naiva durgatau patiṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:260_16: smṛtiryadi nāsti atītānāgatayoḥ tadā puruṣo nānusmaretpañcaviṣayān /
SA16hvsatssu:260_17: kasmāt / nahi manovijñānaṃ dṛṣṭe pañca viṣayān prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:260_19: yadyatītamanāgataṃ nāsti, tadā arhan na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhimupasampanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:260_21: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:260_25: tathānyāni trīṇyapi / yadyatītamanāgataṃ nāsti, tadā tathāgato 'san syāt / dīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syādityato na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:263_0: atrocyate / atītamanāgatañca nāsti / bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ sati dharme cittamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:263_2: yaducyate bhavatā- rūpalakṣaṇena rūpasaṃjñayā [atītaṃ] rūpaṃ lakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:263_3: tadapi na yuktam / yadatītamanāgatam, tadrūpaṃ na syāt / rūpaṇābhāvāt / anityalakṣaṇamityapi na vaktavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:263_9: bhavatoktaṃ- yat vastu sat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:263_12: tadā nāstīti jñāyate / bhavānāha- sarvamanātma [SSS_73] bhāvayet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:263_13: yasmātsattvā atītānanāgatān dharmān sātmano manyante tasmāt bhagavānevamavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:263_16: tacca karma phalasya hetuṃ kṛtvā niruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:263_19: tathāgataśāsane asti vā nāsti vā iti sarvamupāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:263_21: natu paramārthataḥ / yathā pratītyāsti sattva ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:263_22: tathātītamanāgatamapi / atītaṃ mana āśrayata itīdamapi upāyāśrayaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:263_24: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam /
SA16hvsatssu:263_26: tathā karmabalamapi / tathāgataḥ prajānāti- karmaniruddhamapi phalasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:263_28: yatharṇapatnasthamakṣaram / tathā pāpakarmāpi / anena kāyena karma kriyate / tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe 'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:264_6: āryajñānabalena hi tathā / asantaṃ dharmamapi vyākurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:264_9: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:264_14: bhavānāha- na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhiṃ labdhavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:264_17: bhavān bravīti- adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:264_20: na tvanusmṛto vartate / bhavānavocat- catvāri samyakpradhānāni nābhyasyediti /
SA16hvsatssu:264_28: uktañca bhavatā- sūdīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:264_30: kasmāt / na hi kālo dravyam / dharmāṇāmutpattivyayasamavāyamātraṃ kālo 'stītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:267_0: śāstramāha- kecidvadanti sarve dharmāḥ santīti / kecidvadanti- sarve dharmā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:268_1: kena kāraṇena nāstīti / (u) astīti / bhagavānāha- sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanāni /
SA16hvsatssu:268_2: sarvamasti [brāhmaṇa] iti / pṛthivyādīni dravyāṇi saṃkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇādikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:269_0: ākāśe [ca] padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:271_2: tadā astītyucyate / yathā dvādaśāyatanāni / bhagavataḥ śāsana upāyatayā sarvamastīti vā sarvaṃ nāstīti vocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:271_3: na tu paramārthataḥ / kasmāt / astīti vyavasthāyāṃ śāśvatāntapātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:274_2: kena kāraṇena nāstīti / (u) astyantarābhavaḥ / āśvalāyanasūtre hi bhagavānāha- yadā pitarau sannipatitau bhavataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:274_5: vatsasūtrañcāha- yasmin samaye sattva imaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipati punaścittotpādanakāyamanupādāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:274_8: uktañcasūtre- vyavakīrṇaṃ karmābhisaṃskṛtya vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:274_10: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro bhavāḥ pūrvakālabhavo maraṇabhavo 'ntarābhava upapattibhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_11: āha ca- saptabhavāḥ- pañcagatayaḥ [SSS_76] karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_12: āha ca- yamarājo 'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_13: iti / tathāgato 'ntarābhavamupādāya sattvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ prajānāti ayaṃ sattvo 'smin upapattisthāna utpadyate sa sattvastasminnupapattisthāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_14: uktañca sūtre- divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_16: iti / laukikā api astyantarābhava iti śraddhadhānā vadantimriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni asmādbhavāt [bhavāntaraṃ] krāmanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:274_18: yadi nāstyantarābhavaḥ, imaṃ kāyaṃ visṛjya parakāyamanupādānasyāntarā vyucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:277_1: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā- āśvalāyanasūtra uktam astyantarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_2: tanna yuktam / kasmāt / yadyāryā na jānanti- ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_3: tadā nāstyantarābhavaḥ / yadyasti kasmānna jānanti / bhavānāha- vatsasūtra uktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_5: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam- anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_6: ata evaṃ prativakti- santyantarābhave pañcaskandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_8: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī /
SA16hvsatssu:277_9: kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:277_10: bhavānāha- vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_11: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:277_12: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:277_15: tadayuktam / āryajñānabalaṃ hi tat / asantamanāgatamapi smṛtyā prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_18: maraṇonmukhaśca cyavamānaḥ / natvantarābhavagataḥ / bhavānāha- sattvo bhavasantatyā asmāllokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_20: bhavānāha- mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:277_22: na taddheturupayujyate / bhavānāha- yadi nāstyantarābhavaḥ antarāvyucchedaḥ syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:278_0: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo 'smiṃlloke mṛtastasmiṃlloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:278_5: yadi na spṛśati, sparśavihīnaḥ / sparśavihīnatvādvedanādayo 'pi na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:278_6: tādṛśaṃ punaḥ kutrāsti / yaḥ sattvo 'ntarābhavarūpamupādatte sa evopapattiṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:278_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:278_8: yadi na kāyamupādatte / tadā nāstyantarābhavaḥ / yadyantarābhave cyutiḥ / upapattireva sā / kutaḥ / pūrvamutpadyannasya paścādavaśyaṃ cyuteḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:278_9: yadi nāsti cyutiḥ / nityo bhavet / karmabalāccopapattiriti kimantarābhavena /
SA16hvsatssu:279_1: ato nāsti yathoktadoṣaḥ / antarābhava utpannasyāpyasya upapattibhavāntarayogo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:280_0: atra dūṣaṇamāha / karmabalādupasaṅkrāmati / kimantarābhavavikalpena / cittaṃ na kutracidupasaṅkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:280_2: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:280_4: na tatra pāde sthitaṃ [SSS_78] vijñānaṃ bhavapratyayaṃ śirasi saṅkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:283_3: (u) anupūrveṇābhisamayaḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:284_0: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:285_0: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti /

SA16hvsatssu:349_1: na yuktamidam / kasmāt / pañcaskandhavyatirikto nityo 'vināśilakṣaṇo 'styātmeti tīrthikāḥ parikalpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:349_6: yadi sattvo nāmamātramiti / yathā mṛṇmayagohanane nāsti pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:349_8: yathā bālakānāṃ nāmamātreṇa vastudānaṃ savipākaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:349_10: vastutastu na yujyate / nāmamātrato 'sadapi astīti vādina āryā mṛṣāvādinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:349_11: satyavādinaḥ khalvāryāḥ / ato jñāyate astyātmeti / [SSS_92] yadyāryāḥ paramārthato nairātmyadarśinaḥ vyavahārato 'styatmeti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:349_14: yadi vyavahārato 'sadapi astīti vadatāṃ punaḥ sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni dvādaśanidānāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityādi vacanaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:349_15: asti paraloka iti vādinamanusṛtya vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:349_17: vadanti ca loke ayutāni vastūni īśvarādutpannani /
SA16hvsatssu:349_19: tatu na sambhavati / ato bhavatodāhṛtaṃ sūtraṃ sarvaṃ sāmānyato dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:350_0: atrocyate / yadbhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ sthapanīyavyākaraṇāt astyātmeti jñāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:350_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / so 'vaktavyadharma iti paścāt nirodhasatyaskandhe vivekṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:350_2: ato nāsti paramārthata ātmā avaktavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:350_5: yathāha bhavatāmāgamaḥ cakṣuṣā dṛśyamānaṃ rūpamupādāyetyato vināśyātmā /
SA16hvsatssu:350_7: tadā na vaktavyaṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:351_1: tadā sūtrairvirucyate / sūtre hyuktam- pañcendriyāṇi nānyopyasya viṣayān pratyanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:351_6: yat cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ na tat rūpamiti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:351_8: sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ bhikṣūnāmantryāha- asatyapyātmani saṃskārāṇāṃ [SSS_93] santānamupādāya jananamaraṇamastīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:351_9: paśyāmi ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānutpadyamānān mriyamāṇāṃśca /
SA16hvsatssu:352_1: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyucyate ātmā na jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:352_4: anyānyapi pāpakarmāṇi na santi ityato bhavatāṃ śāsanameva mithyādarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:353_2: ta eva pañcaskandhāḥ santatyā buddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:353_4: bhavatāṃ śāsane ātmana ekatvāt viśeṣo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:354_1: sūtre bhagavān idaṃ vastu pratiṣidhyāha- nāhaṃ vadāmi kaścidimān pañcaskandhān parityajya tān skandhānupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_2: kintu tatpañcaskandhānāṃ santatyā bhedābhāvādāha- ubhayatna nandatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_5: yadyastyātmā, cittābhinnaḥ syāt / nocyate sattvasaṃkleśāt sattvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti /

SA16hvsatssu:354_8: ataḥ prajñaptyāstyātmā / na paramārthataḥ / bhavatāṃ śāsane cocyate na pañcaskandhā evātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_10: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_11: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:354_12: na ca prajñaptisannāstīti / vastumātraṃ na bhavati / bhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ- tīrthikānāmāśayakhaṇḍanāya bhagavānāha- nāstyātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_13: abhūtasaṃjñayā bhavānevaṃ kalpayati na tathā bhagavadāśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:354_14: vividhā ātmavādāḥ sarve duṣṭāḥ yathā bhavān bravīti- pañcaskandhān vihāya anyo 'styātmeti tīrthikā manyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:354_15: tathā bhavānapi [manyate] / [SSS_94] kasmāt / anityā hi pañcaskandhāḥ / ātmātvavaktavyo yadi nityo 'nityo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:355_0: atha skandhasya santi trayo bhedāḥ- śīlasamādhiprajñāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:355_4: ātmā ca pudgalaḥ / pañcaskandhā na pudgalaḥ / tadā tvayamanyo bhavati / skandhāḥ pañca / ātmātvekaḥ / ityato nātmā skandhāḥ / asti cedātmā / sa ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pañcaskandhebhyo 'nyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:355_5: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:356_0: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:356_1: tathātmāpi syāt / (u) idaṃ sandigdhasamam / kimagniḥ kimindhanamiti / yadi tejodhāturagniḥ anye dhātava indhanam /
SA16hvsatssu:356_3: yadi tejodhāturevendhanam / kathamucyate naikamiti / yadindhanaṃ sa eva tejodhātuḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:356_7: evātmāpi / manuṣyaskandheṣvanya ātmā / devaskandheṣvanya ātmā itīdamātmabahutvam /

SA16hvsatssu:356_12: yadyapi bhavānāha- agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:356_16: ātmā tu na naśyati / asmāt lokāt cyutaḥ paraloka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:356_17: ubhayatra nandiyuktatvāt / yaḥ pañcaskandhānanusṛtya savināśaḥ sotpādaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:356_19: bhavāṃstu abhūtasaṃjñayā imamātmānaṃ vikalpya keṣāṃ hitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:357_1: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:357_3: na sa āyataneṣu bhavati / caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:358_1: bhavatāṃ śāsana ucyate jñeyadharmā yaduta pañcadharmakośāḥ- atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā asaṃskṛtā avaktavyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:358_4: sa caturbhyo dharmebhyo 'nya itīcchanti khalu bhavantaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:358_9: vayantu na tathā iti / tadayuktam / yadbhavānāha- ātmā prajñaptimātramitīdaṃ gāḍhataraṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:358_10: tadapyayuktam / kasmāt / jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:358_12: idamapi tathaiva / yadavādīḥ “sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni” [ityādi] vacanaṃ na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:358_14: yadavocadbhavān lokoktāni sarvāṇi anusartavyāni yadvadanti īśvarādutpannāni na yutāni vastūni ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:358_19: tadidānīṃ prativaktavyam / savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:358_21: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:363_2: (u) satyaṃ nāma catvāri [ārya]satyāni yaduta duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī patipat /
SA16hvsatssu:363_6: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:363_10: kecit saṃkṣipyāvocan / athedānīṃ teṣāmarthaviniścayāya anusaṃkalayya vivakṣāmi /

SA16hvsatssu:368_0: (pṛ) uktaṃ khalu sūtre- yatkiñcana rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:368_2: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:368_4: tatpratyākhyānāyāha catvāri [eva] mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /

SA16hvsatssu:369_0: (pṛ) kasmāt pṛthivyādaya eva rūpaṃ na śabdaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:370_1: tadā nānyavastūnyādadyuḥ / yathā bhittyāvaraṇe na kasyacidavakāśo labhyate /

SA16hvsatssu:370_4: ataḥ śabdādayaḥ sāvaraṇāḥ sapratighā ityato rūpamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:370_5: rūpyata iti rūpalakṣaṇam / yat chidyate bhidyate vihiṃsyata ityādi tat sarvaṃ rūpāśritam /
SA16hvsatssu:374_3: kasmāt / bhagavān tīrthikebhyo 'vocat- catvāri mahābhūtāni iti /

SA16hvsatssu:374_5: kecidvadanti rūpādi vihāyāsti mahābhūtam iti yathā vaiśeṣikādīnām /

SA16hvsatssu:375_0: kiñcāha sūtram- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ iti /

SA16hvsatssu:375_3: sūtre coktaṃ yathā sparśavatī pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:375_4: pṛthivyādisarvāyata nagato 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati rūpaṃ na kaṭhinyādi /

SA16hvsatssu:375_9: na kaṭhinyamātralakṣaṇasya / kiñcāha- pṛthivī abmaṇḍale pratiṣṭhitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:375_11: na kāṭhinyamātrama / kiñcāha- ahamimāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā vidhūmaṃ bhasmasātkariṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:375_12: atra prajñaptisatīṃ pṛthivīṃ dahati na kāṭhinyamātraṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:376_0: kūpopame coktam- āpo dṛśyante ca spṛśyante ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:376_1: yadi sneha evāpaḥ / tadā na dvidhā varteran / kasmāt / bhagavānāha- pañcemānīndriyāṇi [nānāviṣayāṇi] nānyonyasya viṣayaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:376_2: iti / kiñcāha bhagavān- aṣṭaguṇā āpaḥsusaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ mṛdu madhuraṃ śuci adurgandhaṃ pātuḥ prahlādanaṃ paridāhanivāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:376_3: tatra yat susaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ sukumāraṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:376_4: madhuraṃ rasāntargatam / śuci rūpāntargatam / adurgandhaṃ gandhāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:376_8: upādāya dharmāḥ sarve prajñaptisantaḥ na dravyasantaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:377_1: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:378_4: [SSS_101] tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:378_7: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:378_8: ekādicaturgrahāḥ sāvadyāḥ / ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:381_1: kasmāt / abhidharma uktam / khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo 'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:381_3: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:381_5: khakkhaṭādinā ca catvāri mahābhūtāni nirucyante yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sā pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:381_8: snehaḥ snehagatam ityādi / ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:382_0: sūtre cāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa]piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:382_3: māṃsapiṇḍaṃ pṛthivī iti / asmin māṃsapiṇḍe bhagavānāha santi catvāri mahābhūtāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:383_0: yadi kaścit brūyāt catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:383_2: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:383_3: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ snehagata iti so 'pi āpaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:383_5: taptaḥ kāya eva tejaḥ syāt / tanna yujyate / ato na vaktuṃ śakyate kharagataṃ pṛthivī,
SA16hvsatssu:384_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:384_6: tathā ca sūtravirodhaḥ / sūtrasyāvirodhaṃ kāmayānasya bhavataḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni dravyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:385_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sarve hi tīrthikā vadanti catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānakānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:385_3: ato 'navadyam / kiñca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni khakkhaṭādīni caturmahābhūtāni na tu vaiśeṣikāṇāmiva tānyapratyakṣadṛṣṭānyapi /
SA16hvsatssu:386_3: āha ca cittaṃ mahatāṃ dharmāṇāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:386_4: asminnartha uktam khakkhaṭameva svaragataṃ na punardhamāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:387_0: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:387_1: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- upādāyadharmāḥ sarve prajñaptyātmakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:387_2: nedaṃ yujyate / kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:387_4: bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:387_5: evaṃ daśāyatanānyapi / yattu sāśrayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:387_6: na tathā vadāmaḥ / dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:388_0: yadbhavānāha- khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:388_1: khakkhaṭādayaḥ sārthakā yaduta khakkhaṭa lakṣaṇaṃ sandhatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:391_0: atra pratibrūmaḥ / tadayuktam / catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:391_1: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā abhidharma uktaṃ- khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:391_2: ityādi / na tadyujyate / kasmāt / [SSS_104] bhagavān hi svayamāha- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataśca pṛthivī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:392_0: rūpādikaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyata iti bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:392_3: karmopādāya bhavati / iti / kiñcāha- sukhāsaṅgasamudayādrūpasamudaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:392_4: yathā cānando bhikṣuṇīśikṣaṇāya bhaginīmāha- ayaṃ kāyaḥ āhārasambhūtaḥ tṛṣṇāsambhūto mānasambhūto maithunasambhūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:392_5: ato jñāyate rūpādi rna caturmahābhūtasambhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:392_7: tathāpi catvāri mahābhūtāni ca aṃśena hetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:392_10: tathā cakṣurādīnāṃ karmasambhūtatve 'pi catvāri mahābhūtāni aṃśato hetavo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:392_12: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:392_15: asya ke pratyayāḥ / na[nu] karmamātram / yathā ca rūpasantānaḥ vyucchidya punaḥ pratisandhīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:393_3: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:393_4: kecit sakarmakāḥ / kecit sadharmakāḥ / keṣāñcidupapattyāyatanaṃ karmabalamātrāllabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:393_5: na bāhyapratyayamapekṣya / hetupratyayāpekṣī vadet bījamaṅkurādīnāṃ heturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:394_1: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:394_6: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti /
SA16hvsatssu:395_3: pradīpo hi rūpaṃ prakāśa iti dharmadvayasamavāyātmakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:395_4: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:395_7: (u) nānyatra gacchati / idaṃ prakāśarūpaṃ pradīpa eva pratyakṣamupalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:395_9: na tūpalabhyate vastutaḥ / tadrūpaṃ na pradīpādanyaditi jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:396_1: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:396_3: (u) na yujyate / cakṣurvijñānasya pūrvacittaṃ hetuḥ cakṣūrūpaṃ pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:396_4: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:396_5: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:396_6: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:397_2: yathā sāleśśālirbhavati, yavādyavaḥ / evaṃ pṛthivītaḥ pṛthivī bhavati nābādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:398_2: śṛṅgakūṭe tṛṇaṃ prarohati / (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:398_3: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:398_4: tasmāducyate rūpādibhyo [SSS_106] rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:398_5: ato nābadhāraṇaṃ bhavati rūpādayaścaturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:399_0: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:399_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / niyataiḥ khakkhāṭādilakṣaṇaiḥ catvāraḥ saṅghātā vibhaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:399_2: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:399_6: kimiti / yadi snehena utpattisvabhāvenāpi sukumārasūkṣmaślakṣṇāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:399_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:399_10: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:399_14: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:399_17: anyadapyevam / khakkhaṭalakṣaṇasaṅghāte khakkhaṭasya bāhulyāt dvidhāsti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:399_23: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:400_4: vyavahārabhaṅgayā abhāvāt / idañca mithyāśāstraṃ syāt / kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:400_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi kāye 'smin nakhalomakeśādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:400_12: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:400_13: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram,
SA16hvsatssu:400_16: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:400_17: kasmāt, rūpādīni dravyāṇi / cakṣurādīni prajñaptitaḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:400_18: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram /
SA16hvsatssu:400_19: ṣaḍdhātu sūtre ca bhagavānāha- keśalomanakhādīni pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:400_20: hastipadopamasūtre coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:401_1: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha- yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:401_2: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:401_5: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:401_6: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:401_8: [sā] prajñaptirapi nāsti / asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:402_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / vāyorlaghutvaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na laghugatadharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:402_2: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:402_4: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:402_7: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:402_11: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:402_12: utpadyamānasya pravibhāgāt / yathā vadanti ākāśaṃ sarvagāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:403_1: tadayuktam / yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:403_2: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:403_12: kiñcinnisneham / kiñcinnirūṣma / kiñcinnirīraṇam / ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni nāvinirbhāgavartīni /
SA16hvsatssu:404_6: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:404_8: kathamudbhavet / (u) tathā cet vāyau kadācidgandho 'stīti gandho vāyugataḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:404_10: natvidaṃ yujyate / na hi mahābhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ rūpamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:404_11: yathā snehāt sneho bhavati / tathā rūpādrūpaṃ bhavati / yadi [tāni] avinirbhāgavartīni /
SA16hvsatssu:404_12: tadā satkāryaṃ syāt / yathā kanyāyāṃ putraḥ anne 'medhyādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:404_13: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ satkāryam / yadyapi nāsti payasi dadhi / tathāpi dadhi payasa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:404_14: evaṃ kiṃ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpena yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni sahajātāni apṛthagbhāgavartīnīti /
SA16hvsatssu:407_0: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ- na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato 'navadyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:407_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:407_2: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:407_3: tathā no cet na brūyāt / laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto 'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:407_4: ata upadeśaṃ karoti / nopadiśati hastādi / yadi khakkhaṭādibhiścatvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:408_0: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:408_3: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:408_4: kasmāt / yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:408_6: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:408_7: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:408_8: vastutastu na tathā / kasmācchabde pṛthivīti na vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:408_9: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:408_13: vastutastu na tathā / tasmādrūpādayaścatvāro dharmā [eva] pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:408_15: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:408_16: vṛkṣeṣu vanamiti saṃjñā / bhikṣuṣu saṅgha iti saṃjñā / evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:409_1: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:409_2: nedaṃ sūtraṃ yuktam / yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:409_3: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam /
SA16hvsatssu:409_4: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ na bhavet / asti cettasyārtho 'nyathayitavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:409_5: yadavādīḥ- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhautiko rūpaprasādaḥ cakṣuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:409_6: tadayuktam / caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ samavāyaḥ prajñaptau cakṣurityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:409_8: tadrūpaprasādaścakṣuḥ / yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:409_9: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:409_10: yena vartate sa āśrayaḥ / yasmin dharme tiṣṭhati so 'dhiṣṭhātā /
SA16hvsatssu:409_12: nedaṃ yujyate / na khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ kevalaṃ dhatte /
SA16hvsatssu:412_0: (pṛ) yadāha bhavān- khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:412_1: nedaṃ yujyate / kasmāt / khakkhaṭadharma eva nāsti / kiṃ punaḥ prajñaptisatī pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:412_2: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:412_8: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:412_16: ato nāsti khakkhaṭatā / anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:415_1: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) /
SA16hvsatssu:415_3: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:415_5: na tadyujyate / mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā /
SA16hvsatssu:415_7: ityato nāsti doṣaḥ / yo dharma upalabhyate / sa evāstītyucyate / yadapyuktaṃ- nahyekasmin dharme sparśadvayamastīti (3) /
SA16hvsatssu:415_8: tadayuktam / upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti /
SA16hvsatssu:415_9: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4) tannayujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:415_13: yadyanyonyāpekṣaṇānnāsti / tadā rasa eva na syāt / (pṛ) asitopalāyāṃ dvividho 'sti rasaḥ madhuraḥ kaṭuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:416_1: tadayuktam / na hi cakṣuṣā jñeyā khakkhaṭatā /
SA16hvsatssu:416_2: sparśapūrvakamanumīyate / yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:416_3: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:417_2: kasmāt / vikalpacittasyotpādakatvāt / yadi nāsti khakkhaṭatā / tadā kiṃ vikalpyeta / khakkhaṭaḥ [sva]cittasya pratyayaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:420_2: āpo ghanībhūtāḥ karakāḥ / kimidaṃ suvarṇaṃ khakkhaṭatvāt pārthivam /
SA16hvsatssu:420_3: kiṃ vā dravatvādāpyam / (u) asti pratyekaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:420_4: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:420_7: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati /
SA16hvsatssu:420_8: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:421_0: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:421_3: kiṃ pāramārthikaṃ tattvam / (u) dravasnehasyandanāni [SSS_114] apāṃ nāmāntarāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:421_5: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:421_8: ato dravaḥ syandaḥ / snehasyandau cāpāṃ lakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:422_8: sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt / nānyatra prāptirasti / anyatra prāptirhi samudīraṇamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:422_10: (u) karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:422_13: kasmāt / anyonyamapekṣya satvāt / yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru /
SA16hvsatssu:422_19: etadādyapi na syāt / na tu tadyujyate / ato 'nyonyāpekṣikatvaṃ na samyagdhetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:423_1: kintu atulyamasti / atulyaṃ vastu yathā dṛtimadhyagato vāyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:423_5: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:423_6: tattu na yujyate / ato bhavaduktaṃ na laghulakṣaṇama /
SA16hvsatssu:423_7: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:423_8: rūpādaya eva dharmāḥ [SSS_115] kecit tulyasvabhāvā utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:423_9: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:423_11: evaṃ gurulakṣaṇamapi / ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:424_2: (u) satyamevam / rūpādīn vihāya nāsti pṛthag laghutvam /
SA16hvsatssu:424_4: (pṛ) maivam / gurulaghutvavikalpo 'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:424_5: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:424_6: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi /
SA16hvsatssu:424_12: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:424_13: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo 'spṛṣṭo 'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti /
