SA16hvsatssu:424_14: tathā gururlaghurapi / kasmāt / vividhebhyaḥ sparśebhyo vividhāḥ kāyavijñaptayo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:424_22: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā mūrchā unmādaḥ pakṣavāyujṛmbhaṇabubhukṣāparitarṣaṇaparitarpaṇasukhāsukhalolupatājaḍatādayaḥ sparśāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:425_4: yathā khakkhaṭākhakkhaṭatvādayo rūpādisaṅghātavartino 'pi [SSS_116] cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā jñātuṃ śakyante /
SA16hvsatssu:425_5: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:426_0: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā /
SA16hvsatssu:426_3: vastutastu na tathā / rūpādīnāṃ prāthamika utpādaḥ pratnamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:426_14: vāyau laghutvamātramasti / na tūṣma / ato laghumātreṇākhyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:426_16: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:426_17: sa vāyurityucyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- laghusamudīraṇalakṣaṇo vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:426_18: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:427_1: yadi / laghudravyam / kathaṃ tathā kuryāt / (u) vāyuḥ sthūlaḥ san baliṣṭho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:428_1: (u) nāsti niyamaḥ / yathā pṛthivyāṃ santi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:428_2: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:428_4: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:429_0: (pṛ) vāyoḥ sparśaḥ kīdṛśaḥ / (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:429_3: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:429_5: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:429_6: kiṃ paramārthikam / [SSS_117] (u) nāsti yaḥ śītaḥ sa vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:429_7: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:430_2: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:430_3: natvidaṃ yujyate / na hi vayaṃ vadāmaḥ satkāryam /
SA16hvsatssu:430_4: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:433_3: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:433_4: kasmāt / khakkhaṭādivikalpamātraṃ, na punaranyadasti cakṣuḥ / bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha /
SA16hvsatssu:433_5: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe 'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:433_9: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:434_1: bhagavān pratyāha- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:434_5: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:434_10: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:434_11: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:435_3: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:435_4: kasmāt / bhagavān prāha- cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato 'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:435_6: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:435_7: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti /
SA16hvsatssu:435_10: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:435_11: yadyasti pṛthak cakṣuḥ, vikalpyeta / vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:437_2: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante /
SA16hvsatssu:438_2: tathedamapi / (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam /
SA16hvsatssu:438_3: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva /
SA16hvsatssu:438_8: indriyāṇi ca prajñaptayaḥ / na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:442_3: kasmātkiñcidrūpaṃ paśyati / kiñcinna paśyati / (u) sarvaṃ karmajam / karmajacākṣuṣacaturmahābhūtabalaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati tathānyānyapīndriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:442_4: (pṛ) yadi karmajam / kasmānnaikendriyeṇa sarvān viṣayān jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:442_9: (pṛ) yadīdaṃ karmabalam / indriyāṇāṃ kāpekṣā / karmajaṃ vijñānamātraṃ sarvaviṣayān gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:442_10: (u) maivam / pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:442_12: na badhiraḥ śṛṇoti / pratyakṣadṛṣṭe vastuni nirarthikā pratyayatā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:442_13: naitaddūṣaṇaṃ bhavati / dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:442_14: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:442_16: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:443_0: (pṛ) kasmānna tathā cittam / yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:443_3: vaktavyaśca pratyayaḥ / (u) niyatānāṃ pañcaviṣayāṇāṃ niyatāni pañcavijñānāni santi /
SA16hvsatssu:443_4: naivaṃ cittasya / cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:444_5: kasmāt / lakṣaṇaviśeṣāt / manovijñānameva jānāti asti nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:444_6: rūpiṇa āśrayo bhavati / arūpamapi tiṣṭhatīti ārūpyadhātāvapi nirāśrayaṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:444_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:444_9: asya ka āśrayaḥ / nāsti tu puruṣāṇāmiva bhittyādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:447_1: kiṃ paramārthikam / (u) na [tebhyo jātāni] / kasmāt / ākāśasyābhāvāt / idañca dīpitameva / tasmānna pañcabhūtebhyo jātāni /
SA16hvsatssu:448_2: yathokta sūtre- paṭaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:448_3: annaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate / annaṃ datvā balaṃ labhate / yānaṃ datvā sukhaṃ labhate / pradīpaṃ datvā cakṣurlabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:448_10: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:448_17: śabdaścākāśa[gataḥ] / evanyānyānyapi / ata indriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:449_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / kiñciddarśanaṃ saphalaṃ vinā karmasārūpyahetoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:449_2: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:449_6: na bāhyākāśādīnapekṣeran / vastutastu bāhyānapekṣante / ato 'hetuḥ / āpaścakṣuṣa upakurvanti / yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:449_7: tadā abbahulaṃ syāt / tejaśca cakṣurvināśayati yathā sūryaprabhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:449_8: yadīme svaprakṛtayaḥ, nātmānaṃ vighaṭayeyuḥ / ato jñāyate na tejo[bahulam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:449_10: ato na taijasaṃ cakṣuḥ / candrikāyāñca rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:449_14: kiñcidanapekṣyāpi paśyati / yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:449_15: īdṛśī cakṣuṣo dharmatā / ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti /
SA16hvsatssu:450_4: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:450_5: ato na tejobahulam / tejaḥ prajvalat sadoṣmalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:451_0: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:451_1: tad dūṣitameva / niṣprabhatvāccakṣuṣaḥ / yaduktaṃ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:451_4: yadi sūryo mriyate / sūryendriyaṃ sūryaśca kutra punaḥ pratigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:451_5: ato 'yuktam / upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:451_6: tata upari sūryābhāvāt / ākāśamakriyaṃ sat apratiśaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:452_2: nedaṃ yuktam / nirupayogahetutvāt / śabda ākāśagata ityādirapi evaṃ [vācyaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:452_3: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:453_2: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:453_3: kiṃ pāramārthikam / (u) uktapūrvaṃ mayā nāsti niyama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:454_4: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:454_5: na tu yujyate vastutaḥ / dravyaṃ nāstīti indriyaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:457_0: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:457_1: (u) nendriyaṃ vijānāti / kasmāt / yadīndriyaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:457_3: vastutastu na vijānāti / ato vijñānaṃ vijānāti / bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:457_4: tadayuktam / na kaściddharmo 'nyaṃ dharmamapekṣya kiñcitkartuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:457_5: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti / kā vijñānasyāpekṣā / yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:458_0: (pṛ) prakāśanamindriyakarma / vijñāpanaṃ vijñaptikarma / (u) nāyaṃ viveko [yuktaḥ] / katamat prakāśanam / bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:458_3: yathā pradīpaḥ / tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:458_4: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:458_7: kiñcendriyaṃ na vijānāti / yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśayannapi na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:458_9: ato vijñānamātraṃ vijānāti / nendriyāṇi / sati vijñāne jñānaṃ nāsati / yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:459_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:459_1: tathā śrotrādīnyapi / ato jñāyate cakṣūrūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:459_3: kenendriyatvam / uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:459_5: yadi cakṣurna paśyati / tadā jinaurasā na kiñcana paśyeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:459_6: [SSS_125] nedaṃ saṃbhavati / ata indriyāṇi niyamena viṣayān gṛhṇanti /
SA16hvsatssu:459_7: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:460_0: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:460_1: ataścakṣurna paśyati / cakṣuṣā dvārībhūtena tatrasthaṃ vijñānaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:460_3: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti /
SA16hvsatssu:460_6: ato na mano vijānāti / manovijñānantu vijānāti / sūtre bhagavānāha- cakṣuḥ priyarūpāṇi kāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:460_8: ato na vastutaḥ kāmyati / tadvijñānameva kāmyati / kiñcāha bhagavān- cakṣurvijñeyāni rupāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:460_9: vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti / na cakṣuḥ / kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:460_11: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:460_12: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati /
SA16hvsatssu:460_14: tathā bhagavānapyanuvadati / nahi tathāgato lokaiḥ saha vivaditumabhilaṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:460_15: yathā mṛgāramātā ityādi / ato jñātavyaṃ vyavahārānuvartanādbhagavānāha cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_1: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_2: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_3: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_5: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_6: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_7: kadācidakāśaṃ paśyati / kadācinmadhyaṃ paśyati [SSS_126] yat dvāramadhyaṃ [tat] paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_9: sa dahati iti / kadācidvadanti tṛṇendhanaṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:461_10: gopurīṣaṃ dahati / tailaṃ dahati / dhṛtaṃ dahati / tejo dahati / sūryo dahati iti / vastutastu agnireva hahati / anyāni dahatīti prajñaptyā vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:461_15: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_16: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_17: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_18: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_20: kāraṇe kāryopacāraḥ / yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_22: suvarṇa māyuḥ / tṛṇāni gopaśava iti / idaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_23: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_24: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_26: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate /
SA16hvsatssu:461_27: yathā daṇḍī brāhmaṇa iti / cakṣuścākṣuṣavijñānaṃ sādhayatītyatastatra cakṣurvijñānakarmocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:461_28: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_29: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_30: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:461_31: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_32: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:461_33: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:461_35: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:462_2: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:462_6: tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:462_7: tadā kena [teṣā]matiśayaḥ / (u) indriyairvijñānaṃ viśeṣyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:462_12: tathā vijñānānyapi / āśrayato vyavahāro viśeṣyate na pratyayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:462_13: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:462_21: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:462_24: indriyamasādhāraṇam / eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:462_26: viṣayastu naivam / indriyaṃ hetuḥ viṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:462_27: kasmāt / indriyabhedāt vijñānaṃ viśeṣyate na viṣayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:463_0: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:463_1: idaṃ saṃvṛtitaḥ / laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:464_2: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:465_1: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti /
SA16hvsatssu:465_2: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:465_3: ata āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:466_0: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:466_1: idaṃ pratyuktam / indriyasyāvijñātṛtvāt / na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:469_1: tatprasādhitam / idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt /
SA16hvsatssu:469_6: yadi cakṣūrūpaṃ prāpnoti / tadā nāntarākāśālokau syātām /
SA16hvsatssu:469_8: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:470_0: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:470_4: kasmāt / dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:471_2: kasmāt / asti cakṣuṣi raśmiḥ / ayaṃ raśmī rūpadarśanāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:471_4: cakṣuśca tejaḥsamutpannam / tejasaḥ saraśmitvāt yadyaprāpya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:471_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:471_9: yadyaprāpnoti / kathaṃ sannipātaḥ / pañcendriyāṇi sapratighāni / viṣayeṣu pratihanyanta iti sapratighāni /
SA16hvsatssu:471_10: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam /
SA16hvsatssu:471_14: na vijānanti vastutaḥ / bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:472_1: kasmāt / viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:472_3: mandamapi śabdaṃ śṛṇuyāt / na tu śṛṇoti / ato jñāyate prāpya śṛṇotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:472_4: śabdo dūrato 'pi śrūyate / yadyaprāpya śrūyate / āvaraṇe satyapi śrūyeta / dūrataḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ śabdo na pratyāyayati /
SA16hvsatssu:472_6: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:472_7: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:472_9: na pratikūlavāyau / ato 'pi prāpya śrūyate / śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyate / aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:472_10: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:472_11: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:472_13: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:473_6: ato na gacchati / śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:473_7: yadi saraśmi, tadindriyam / naivaṃ śaknuyāt / ato jñāyate śrotrendriyaṃ nīraśmikamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:473_9: yadi saraśmikam, nāndhakāre vijānīyāt / saraśmikamindriyañca diśamapekṣya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:473_10: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:473_11: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:474_0: vadanti ca mano gacchatīti / ataḥ prāpya viṣayaṃ vijānāti / yathoktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:475_3: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:477_1: kasmāt / yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:477_2: yadi raśmirgarcchati / kasmāt saṃśayo bhavet / atisannikṛṣṭañca cakṣurna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:477_5: yadi raśmistatra gacchati / kasmāt sthūlaṃ paśyati na sūkṣmaṃ [SSS_131] vivecayati /
SA16hvsatssu:477_6: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:477_9: tādṛśavibhāgo na syāt / kasmāt / gandharasasparśeṣu nāyaṃ vibhāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:477_13: kutra gacchati / yadi sannikṛṣṭarūpaṃ viprakṛṣṭarūpañca ekadā yugapatpaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:477_14: na tathā gamanadharmaḥ / ato nayanaraśmirna gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:477_15: yadi sa gacchati / madhye mārgaṃ rūpāṇi paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:477_16: vastutastu na paśyati / ato jñāyate na gacchatīti / raśmirgacchatīti raśmiḥ kāyabdahirgato nendriyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:477_19: sapakṣābhāve nāsti hetuḥ / tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:478_3: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:478_5: yena na dṛśyante / (u) yadīyaṃ raśmirdivāniśamubhayatna nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:478_6: tadāsyā atyantānupalabdhiḥ / (pṛ) biḍālasṛgālamūṣikādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ rātriñcarāṇāṃ nāyano raśmirupalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:478_9: nāyaṃ raśmiḥ / yathā ca rātriñcarā jantavo 'ndhakāre paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:478_10: manuṣyāśca na paśyanti / tathā ca teṣāmeva raśmiḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:479_1: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyediti / yat rūpaṃ jñānasya [SSS_132] gocaraṃ tat dṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:479_3: viṣaya ābhāsagato bhavati / tadā sa dṛśyo bhavati / iti / (pṛ) ko nāmābhāsagataḥ / (u) yadā rūpacakṣuṣoḥ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:479_4: sa ābhāsagataḥ / (pṛ) yadi cakṣurna prāpnoti kaḥ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:479_5: (u) samānamidam, yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:479_6: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma /
SA16hvsatssu:479_8: tat paśyati / yadābhāsagataṃ na bhavati na tatpaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:479_13: na hīdaṃ yujyate / yadi raśmimastatra gatvā paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:479_14: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram /
SA16hvsatssu:479_15: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:479_16: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:480_3: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:480_4: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:480_5: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:480_11: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:480_12: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:481_1: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:481_4: yat jāgaraṇopahataṃ [SSS_133] cakṣuḥ tat kampitavṛkṣādirūpaṃ prāyaḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:481_5: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:482_0: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:482_2: (u) ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_3: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_4: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_5: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:482_6: tadyathā samāhitacitta(sya) manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:482_7: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:482_13: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_14: ananubhūtaṃ na smaranti / āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_15: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti /
SA16hvsatssu:482_16: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:482_17: tathā anityaṃ duḥkhamapi / balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:483_1: (u) vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:483_6: tadanupahataṃ nāma / evamādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sattvo viṣayān vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:483_7: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:484_6: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:484_8: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:484_9: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:487_0: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:487_2: tadayuktam / kasmāt / yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:487_3: evaṃ mamāpi syāt / śabdo 'prāpyāpi so 'lpīyāniti na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:487_4: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma /
SA16hvsatssu:487_5: evaṃ mamāpi / śrotramaprāpyāpi [SSS_135] śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:487_6: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:487_7: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:488_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:488_3: tadā śabdo 'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:488_4: vastutastu śrūyate / ato jñāyate śabdo 'prāpya śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:489_0: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:489_1: na yuktamidam / śabdadharmo yat sākalyena śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:489_2: na tathā rūpadharmaḥ / padārthāḥ salakṣaṇavilakṣaṇā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:489_5: kenedaṃ jñāyate / tadyathā puruṣaḥ ghaṇṭānādaśuśrūṣayā karṇena ghaṇṭāmupeti /
SA16hvsatssu:490_3: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:490_9: vastutastu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate śabdo noccarito gacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:490_14: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:490_15: na vastuta idaṃ yujyate / ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:490_18: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:490_21: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:490_22: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:490_23: yadi śabda āgacchati / tadā divyaśrotraṃ niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:490_27: svayameva śrotraṃ vidhyāt / tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:490_28: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām /
SA16hvsatssu:491_1: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:491_6: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:491_7: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak,
SA16hvsatssu:491_9: na sa viruddho nāma / yadi naikasthānikaḥ / tadā pūrvaśabde niruddhe 'nantaraśabdaḥ svayamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:491_15: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so] 'pi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:491_17: tathā gandharasasparśā api / evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:492_1: yathā vadanti śabdo guṇo 'pi [SSS_137] karmaṇā tulyo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:492_4: evaṃ śabdo 'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati /
SA16hvsatssu:492_7: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:492_12: na śabdaḥ / karmanirodhācca na kāraṇadravyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:492_13: kasmāt / pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:492_14: evaṃ śabdo 'pi / pūrvaśabde niruddhe 'nantaraṃ śabdaḥ svayamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:492_17: tadā śabdo 'kṣaṇikaḥ syāt / kasmāt / śabdotpattikāla prathamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:493_1: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:493_3: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:493_9: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:493_10: vastutastu na dvayavatī / ato 'yuktam / yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:493_12: sa tu hetumanuvartate / idañca śabdāntaramakhaṇṭāśabdaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:494_7: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:494_8: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:494_9: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:495_1: tadapi na yuktam / kasmāt / na hi hastavibhāgācchabda utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:495_2: saṃyogāttu śabdo bhavati / khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:495_3: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:495_6: ataḥ saṃyogānnotpadyate / kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:498_0: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān- gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:498_1: tadapyayuktam / kasmāt / yathā śabdo dūrācchrūyate / tathā gandho viprakṛṣṭadeśastho 'pi ghrātuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:498_2: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:498_6: (u) maivam / yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:498_7: na tu dṛśyate / ato jñāyate na gacchantīti / (pṛ) kusumāvayavarūpamatisūkṣmatvāt na dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:498_11: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:498_13: yadi kusumaṃ dahyate / tadgandho vardhate / rūpaṃ paraṃ nirudhyate / ato na kusumāvayavo gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:498_14: yadi gandha kusumāvayavaḥ, alpaṃ ghrātavyaḥ syāt / na tathā vastutaḥ / yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti, kusumamapacīyamānaṃ syāt / natvapacīyate vastutaḥ / kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusumaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam /
SA16hvsatssu:498_16: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:498_17: (u) yadi sadāpacīyate / kusumavevāsatsyāt / kiṃ punarapacīyamānaṃ na budhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:498_18: yadi kusumaṃ sadāpacīyate / tadā [tadgandhasya] āghrāṇaṃ nopalabhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:499_3: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:499_5: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate /
SA16hvsatssu:499_6: ato nāsti taddoṣaḥ / kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathā jighranti tile gandhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:499_7: na tu kusumāvayavagandham / kusumena vāsitatvāt / yadyayaṃ kusumāvayavīyaḥ / kiṃ vāsayati / tilam / ato jñāyate 'yaṃ gandho na kusumāvayavartīti /
SA16hvsatssu:499_8: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:499_9: yaḥ tilavartī, na sa kṣīyate / sa kusumagandhaśca tailamātre vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:499_10: na tu kalke / ato na kusumāvayavīyaḥ / sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:499_11: na tu kusume / ato na kusumāvayavīyaḥ / (pṛ) yadi na kusumāvayavīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:499_12: ayaṃ kasya gandhaḥ / (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:501_3: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
SA16hvsatssu:501_4: na tu pṛthivyavayavā iti / yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram- trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:501_5: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vānāgantukā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:501_7: tadā vāyavīyāḥ / bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:501_8: na tau vāyavīyau / iti / evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo 'stīti so 'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:501_11: ādau tu na dṛśyata iti / kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:501_12: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:502_0: yat bhavatāṃ matam- yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:502_1: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:502_2: apsu uṣṇaliṅgavat / tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadapāmuṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ tattejoyogādevāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:502_5: yadyādau dṛṣṭam / tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:503_1: tadayuktam, kasmāt / nirvāte keṣṭhe durādgandho jighryate /
SA16hvsatssu:503_3: yathā pārijātataroḥ / ato jñāyate na vāyau gandhāntaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:503_6: yatra vāyurasti / tatra gandhavāyurutpadyate / yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:504_0: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:504_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / rūpasāmyābhāvāt / yadyaprāpya jighryate / tadā rūpeṇa samaṃ sadaprāpya jighryeta /
SA16hvsatssu:504_3: prāptau tu jighryate / ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:507_6: na tu vartate vastutaḥ / ato jñāyate nāgacchatīti / (pṛ) sūryo yadyapi astamitaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:507_7: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:507_9: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:508_7: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:508_9: yathā vā yavā gvāmauṣṇyādi / tat sarvaṃ sparśavadarūpam / tasmāttejaḥ kiñcitsarūpaṃ kiñcidarūpamiti śraddhātavyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:511_0: yadavādīḥ- manaḥsañcaratīti / ṣadayuktam / kasmāt / manaḥpratikṣaṇamutpannavināśi vāyuvat karmavadvā /
SA16hvsatssu:511_2: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet /
SA16hvsatssu:511_3: utājñātvā gacchet / tadubhayamayuktan / yadi pūrvameva jñātavat kiṃ gamanena /
SA16hvsatssu:511_4: yadyajñātavat, kimarthaṃ gamanam / yadi cittaṃ cakṣuṣi vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:511_5: kathaṃ karṇaṃ prāpnoti / yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:511_9: evamindriyāntare 'pi / ato na mano gacchati / yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān /
SA16hvsatssu:511_10: ato na mano gacchati / yadi [mano]dharmo gacchati, pūrvasaṃnnikṛṣṭaṃ paścādviprakṛṣṭaṃ [gacchet] /
SA16hvsatssu:511_12: ato jñāyate na gacchatīti / yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:511_13: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:511_14: na tathā manaḥ / yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya]pijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:512_2: vastatastu santi tāni / ato jñāyate na gacchatīti / cittasyālambanaṃ nirvāṇaṃ cittaṃ yadi prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:512_4: tattu na yuktam / punarāvṛttinissaraṇa[lakṣaṇa]masaskṛtaṃ saṃskṛte praviśatīdamapyayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:512_7: tatkāyo mṛto bhavet / na punarujjīvet / ato na gacchati / cittamanāgataṃ smaradanāgataṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:512_11: ato jñāyate na gacchatīti, rāgacittānmukhe rūpāntaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:512_12: tathā dveṣādibhyo 'pi / yadi cittaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:513_2: tā vedanā stistraḥ- duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:513_4: tadā tā vedanā na syuḥ / ato na gacchati / cittañca kāyaniśritam / yathoktaṃ sūtre- nāmarūpāśritaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:513_8: kāyo nirvijñānaḥ syāt / ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:514_1: (u) maivam / svapne śukraskhalanādi ceṣṭitāni sarvāṇi kāyagatāni /
SA16hvsatssu:514_3: na tu vastuto gacchati / svapne ca kriyāḥ sarvāstā mithyā /
SA16hvsatssu:514_4: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:514_6: ataḥ mano 'pi na gacchati / cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:514_7: na dharmāntaraṃ carati / yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:514_9: anyā diśaśca prāpnoti / idañca paścādṛddhikhaṇḍanavarge vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:517_8: natvindriyāṇi tāni / (pṛ) akṣitārakā dvividhā sendriyā nirindriyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:517_10: anindriyatārakā tu vartate / (u) nendriyatārakā draṣṭrī / ato na cakṣurādibhirupalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:517_12: yadi tat sanidarśanam / tadā vibhajyeta iyamakṣitārakā sendriyā iyamanindriyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_0: (pṛ) yadyuktaṃ sūtre- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādāḥ pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_4: bhagavān kāṃkṣāvataḥ svaśiṣyān pratyāha- karmajāni pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_5: ata ucyate rūpīti / tīrthikā vadanti- pañcendriyāṇi ahaṅkārajātāni ahaṅkāraścārūpīti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_8: ato bhagavānāha- indriyāṇi rūpīṇi rūpādīnupādāya siddhānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_9: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:518_10: ata āha- anidarśanānīti / nāpi śrotrādīnāṃ tadupalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:518_12: ata āha- sapratighānīti / viṣayān pratihantīti [SSS_145] kṛtvā /
SA16hvsatssu:518_15: tīrthikā vadanti- saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi]dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo 'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:518_16: ato bhagavānāha- eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:519_6: kasmāt / dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ / hastena vastugrahaṇavadekameva vastu gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:519_11: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:519_15: kāyasyāntareva varteta / kāyasyāntarvartitvānmanoyuktamapi na bāhyaviṣayān paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:519_16: vastutastu paśyati / ato 'pratiniyatam / dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:520_1: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:520_3: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:520_4: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:520_5: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam /
SA16hvsatssu:520_11: ātmānamupādāya caitanyam / nendriyāṇyupādāya / indriyaṃ mautikam / mahābhūtamacetanamityata indriyamapyacetanam /
SA16hvsatssu:520_12: ghaṭaḥ paramāṇuhetukaḥ / yathā paramāṇuracetanaḥ / ghaṭo 'pyacetanaḥ / sa viṣayāntaraṃ na jānātītyato 'cetanamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:521_4: yadavādīrekamindriyamiti / nedaṃ yujyate / ekaṃ cakṣuḥ kiñcitpaśyati dvitīyaṃ cakṣuranyatpaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:521_9: kiṃ dvitīyaṃ cakṣuḥ karoti / (u) nāsikā [vivarasya] bhedānnaikaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:521_12: tannirastapūrvam / ātmā na prayojayati / [SSS_147] ādityaprakāśenābhibhūta ityapi dūṣitapūrvam /
SA16hvsatssu:521_13: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:521_15: tadā sannikarṣo na bhavet / svarūpato bailakṣaṇyāt / yathā vṛkṣasaṃyogo nigūḍho 'pi tadavasāne dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:521_19: tadayuktam / karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi /
SA16hvsatssu:522_0: (pṛ) indriyāṇi niyatāni / kasmāt / tāni ca bhautikāni / catvāri mahābhūtāni niyatānīti indriyamapi niyatam /
SA16hvsatssu:522_6: yadyaniyatam / mitho bhāvyatā na syāt / manovat syāt / ato jñāyate niyatamiti / lauki kāstārakādiṣu niyatān dharmān vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:522_7: na mana ādivat [aniyatān] / ato niyatāni / indriyañca purovartinaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:523_1: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- indriyāṇi bhautikāni niyatānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:523_9: ayamapi manasa eva niyamaḥ / indriyasyājñatvāt / tadanye sarve manobalaviśeṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:523_11: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:523_13: tathā rūpāṇyapi paśyati / ataścakṣurādīni sarvāṇi mithyālambanāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:523_15: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:526_2: idamāyatanaṃ jñātavyamiti / (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ karma parimāṇañca [SSS_149] rūpāyatanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:526_8: ato jñāyate nānyaditi / (pṛ) pūrvaṃ rūpabuddhirbhavati paścātsaṃsthānabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:526_9: kasmāt / kṛṣṇāvadātavartulaparimaṇḍalabuddhayo na yugapadbhavanti (u) hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:527_0: (pṛ) atītaṃ kāyikaṃ karma / yadi nāstyatītaṃ / na tadāsti kāyikaṃ karma / (u) saṃvṛtisaṃjñāyāsti kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:527_1: na paramārthataḥ / (pṛ) yadi paramārthato nāsti kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:527_4: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:530_5: rūpādibhyaścānyathā jātaḥ / kasmāt / rūpādīni sahajātāni kramaśo mūlāṅkurakrameṇa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:530_6: śabdastu na tathā bhavati / śabdaśca padārthāllabdhanāmakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:530_8: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:530_13: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:531_1: sammarde śabda udeti / mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:531_2: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:531_3: kasmāt / cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu nāṅgulidvayasammardaśśabdajanaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:531_4: (pṛ) tatra śabda utpadyate / saukṣmyānna jñāyate / (u) notpadyate [tatra śabdaḥ] yāvatsūkṣmaśabdasyāpyaśravaṇāt /
SA16hvsatssu:531_5: yo vadati asti śabda iti / tasya pratyakṣe śraddhā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:531_7: saukṣmyānna jighryate / asti tejasi rasaḥ / santi vāyāvākāśe ca rūpādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:531_8: na santi vastutaḥ / ato na sarvaḥ sammardaḥ śabdajanakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:532_0: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:532_8: gṛhīte ca saha śāmyati / kampitabhājanaśabdo 'pyevamiti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:533_3: ato na [sa ākāśaguṇaḥ] / hetulakṣaṇatvācca / hetulakṣaṇañca- yo dharmo yasmādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:533_4: sa [tabhya] hetuḥ / evaṃ kāraṇamahābhūteṣu satsu śabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:533_5: asatsu na śabdaḥ / yathā tejasi satyauṣṇyaṃ nāsati /
SA16hvsatssu:533_7: mahābhūtajaḥ śabdo 'pyevam / yathākāśauṣṇyayoḥ sattā / [SSS_151] ākāśe vartamāne 'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:533_8: tadā śabdo 'pi / yathākāśabhāve śabdabhāvaḥ / ākāśe vartamāne 'pi śabdaḥ kadācidasti kadācinnāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:533_9: ato jñāyate 'kāraṇamiti / śabda ākāśaguṇa itīdaṃ na śraddheyam /
SA16hvsatssu:533_10: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:533_11: nāpyanumānam / tatra kenānumānaṃ bhavet / sūtragranthe ca bahūni viruddhāni /
SA16hvsatssu:538_3: (u) nāyamāgantuko gandhaḥ / kasmāt / pūrvamanyasmin dravye 'nāghrāto 'yaṃ gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:538_5: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:538_7: ato 'hetuḥ / kāṃsyādīnāmasati nirgandhasamaye na vaktavyamāgantuka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_10: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_11: [SSS_152] vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_12: yo dharmo yasya vastuno 'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_13: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:538_15: tadā ko doṣaḥ / yathā vadanti- asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_16: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:538_18: tathā jale 'pi gandho 'sti / na tatrāsti niyamaheturyajjalegandho nāstīti vaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:539_1: kasmāt / bhavatā pratijñātam “vyavasthitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gandha” iti /
SA16hvsatssu:539_5: āha ca “tejasa uṣṇatā” iti / kāṃsyādīnāṃ taijasatve 'pi noṣṇatā /
SA16hvsatssu:539_6: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:539_10: tadapyayuktam / kasmāt / uṣṇatāniyamābhāvāt / aulukyā vadanti- tejasa uṣṇatā vyavasthiteti /
SA16hvsatssu:539_12: na tu sparśe / (u) ghṛtaṃ kāryataḥ śītamiti āpyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:539_14: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate /
SA16hvsatssu:539_20: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram /
SA16hvsatssu:539_21: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:539_22: tāni ca tejaso viruddhāni / kasmāt / [SSS_153] agnisaṃyoge 'pacayāt /
SA16hvsatssu:539_23: yadi taijasāni, agnisaṃyoge vivardheta / na tu vivardhate / ato na taijasadravyāṇi / asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ- gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:542_2: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:542_3: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti /
SA16hvsatssu:542_5: ato jñātavyam - padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:543_1: kathamidam / ṣaḍiti nātisīmā / kasmāt / kadācidvayo rasayoḥ samavāyaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:543_5: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:546_0: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ gauravaṃ sammūrchanaṃ [SSS_154] sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:547_0: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- trayaḥ sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:547_3: (pṛ) aulūkyā vadanti- pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītasparśastathā vāyorapi sparśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:547_5: kathamidam / [tādṛśa]niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam- yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti /
SA16hvsatssu:547_6: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:548_3: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:548_9: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:548_10: tadā na pāko bhavet / yadi vinaṣṭaḥ / tadā sa eva sparśaḥ sparśāntaramutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:548_17: [tadā] paro 'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:548_18: tattu nopalabhyate / yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti /
SA16hvsatssu:548_19: evañca na pākavat syāt / kasmāt / anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:548_22: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo 'parāvṛtta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:548_23: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:549_0: vaiśeṣikā vadanti- pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:549_1: bhiṣajastu vadanti- yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:549_7: yathāpogniṃ nirvāpayanti / agnirāpaḥ paripācayati / nādravyaṃ paripācayati tejobalam /
SA16hvsatssu:552_4: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_5: tathā vīryādayo 'pi / yathā caikasyā anāsravaprajñāyā duḥkhabhāvanā,
SA16hvsatssu:552_6: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_7: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:552_10: kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_11: yadyasti pṛthak caitasikam / caitasikāccittaṃ vimucyata iti brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:552_12: api coktaṃ sūtre- yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_15: api coktaṃ sūtre- cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_16: iti / kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuścatvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viśuddhākopyacitto [SSS_157] bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:552_17: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_21: iti / api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:552_22: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:552_27: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_3: tadā samprayogo na syāt / asti tu samprayogaḥ / ato jñāyate santi caitasikadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_4: yadbhavatāṃ mataṃ- cittamanyena cittena samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_5: tadayuktam / kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_8: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di]prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:555_9: ato [SSS_158] jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_12: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:555_15: iti / yadi na santi caitasikāḥ / tadā na syuḥ pañcaskandhāḥ / na tu tatsambhavati / tayośca dvayorutpattirbhidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:555_16: dvābhyāṃ cittamutpadyate / tribhiścaitasikāḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:555_18: sparśapratyayā vedanā iti / āha ca- nāmarūpasamudayādvijñānasamudayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:555_22: naivaṃ cittaṃ bhavati / tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:555_24: na vijñānapratiśaraṇam / yadi jñānameva vijñānam / kathamidaṃ pratiśaraṇavacanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:556_0: bhagavān svayamāha- ye cittajāścittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:556_2: na caitasikā itīmamartham / paro 'pi vadet- caitasikāḥ santi na cittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:556_6: yathāpaḥ snehayanti / tejaḥ paridahati / evaṃ vedanādīnāṃ kāritrabhedāt jñāyate vibhinnalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:556_12: iti / yadi cittamātramasti / tadā saṃkleśo vyavadānañca nirhetukaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:556_13: puruṣasyāvidyayā [SSS_159] saṃkleśaḥ prajñayā vyavadānamiti na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:559_0: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:559_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sūtre cittalakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak caitasikalakṣaṇañca pṛthagucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:559_7: tadayuktam / uktamanyasmin sūtre- avidyāvisaṃyogātprajñā vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:559_11: na caitasikān / ato bhagavānekadeśamāha / sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:559_12: yathāha sūtram- ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam /
SA16hvsatssu:559_16: tadapyayuktam / yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika[dharma] ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:560_3: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:560_5: tadapyayuktam / tasmin sūtra uktaṃ bāhyalakṣaṇaṃ caitasikameva /
SA16hvsatssu:560_7: ayuktamidamapi / sparśo hi vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:563_0: atra brūmaḥ / yadavādīḥ samprayogātsanti caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:563_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmekacaratvaṃ paścātsavistaraṃ vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:563_2: ataḥ samprayogo nāsti / anena cittamidamekacaramityādyapi pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:563_8: ato na santi / yadabravīḥ āśrayāśrāyibhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:563_11: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:563_13: tadayuktam / mama [mate] cittaviśeṣā eva vedanāsaṃjñādaya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:563_18: yaścittamātraṃ bravīti / tasyāyameva nyāyaḥ / kasmāt / sa hi bravīti- pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:563_20: tat pūrvameva dūṣitam / samprayogasyābhāvāt / yadabravīḥ- jñānapratiśaraṇaṃ na [SSS_161] vijñānapratiśaraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:563_21: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:564_0: yadāha bhavān- bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:564_4: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:564_6: evaṃ [yasya] yuktirnāsti / [tasya] uktāpi anukteva / na tena heturvaktavyaḥ / vakṣyāmaśca cittacaitāsikāḥ saṃjñārthā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:565_1: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:565_2: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:565_3: na vaktavyamidaṃ vastutaḥ / ato 'hetuḥ / yaduktaṃ bhavatā kāritrabhedāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:565_5: tadanena pratyuktam / kasmāt / mama cittaviśeṣatvādeva kāritraṃ bhidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:565_6: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:568_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:568_3: saṃjñā ityādyapi / yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:568_9: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo 'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā /
SA16hvsatssu:568_15: ato jñāyate avidyāto 'pi cittameva vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:568_18: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:568_20: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:569_3: ataścittamātramuktamiti / laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo '[pi] vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:569_7: vacanasyāsya kāraṇamasti / bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:569_9: iti / ato 'hetuḥ / yadavocaḥ- yaduktaṃ nāmalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva caitasikamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:569_16: vacanamidaṃ bahudhā duṣṭam / dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve 'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya /
SA16hvsatssu:569_17: itīdṛśā doṣāḥ santi / ato jñāyate cittamātramasti /
SA16hvsatssu:572_0: nāsti samprayogaḥ / kasmāt / caitasikadharmāṇāmabhāvāt kena cittaṃ samprayujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:572_3: vijñānaṃ saṃjñādīnāṃ hetuḥ / naiṣāṃ dharmāṇāmaikakālyaṃ yaugapadyaṃ vāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:572_4: ato nāsti samprayogaḥ gambhīre pratītyasamutpāda[sūtre]bhagavānāha- asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:572_5: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni /
SA16hvsatssu:572_7: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:572_8: tadayuktam / na hi rūpaṃ pratyeti / anālambanatvāt / cittacaitasikānāmālambanamasti pratītiścāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:572_14: sa tu na sambhavati / ato naikasmin kṣaṇe vedanādayo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_2: ato naikakālikāni / (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:573_3: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_4: sūtre coktam- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_8: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle /
SA16hvsatssu:573_10: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_13: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_15: kasmāt / yaścakṣurvijñeye priyāpriyanimittaṃ sāmyanimittañca na gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_16: tasya [SSS_164] nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:573_17: vikalpābhāvāt / kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_20: tacca paścādvakṣyate / ato jñāyate pañcavijñānāmapi vitarko nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_21: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:573_23: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:573_25: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:573_26: tadā vitarkakālaḥ / asatyāṃ vijñāpanecchāyāṃ kathamasti vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:574_3: ato 'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:574_4: kasmāt / na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:574_5: nāpi vedanādivikalpaḥ / kena tatra vikalpyate / pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam /
SA16hvsatssu:574_9: audārakasūkṣmayorvirodhāt / ghaṇṭābhighātavat / ādyaśabdo vitarka [kalpaḥ] / antyaśabdo vicāra [kalpaḥ] / sa dārṣṭāntiko 'pyevam / yadi pañcavijñāneṣu vitarkavicārau staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:574_10: tayoḥ karma vaktavyam / na vaktuṃ vastutaḥ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:574_12: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām /
SA16hvsatssu:574_15: kasmāt / sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:575_2: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
SA16hvsatssu:575_3: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:575_6: tasya dharmo vardhate / yo 'nabhirataḥ tasya dharmo hīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:575_9: tadā dharmo vyāmohaḥ syāt / kasmāt / ekasminneva hi citte 'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhāśraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:575_10: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:575_11: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte /
SA16hvsatssu:575_12: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_1: “yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:576_6: prītyā cittaṃ praśrabhyati / praśrabdhyā cittaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_8: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti” iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_13: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_17: tuṣṭasya cittaṃ prīṇāti / prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ praśrabhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:576_21: tattvavinnirvidyate / nirviṇṇo vimucyate / iti / ato jñāyate caitasikāḥ kramikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_23: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:576_37: tatra moho 'vidyaiva / mūḍhasya yā prārthanā sā tṛṣṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:576_41: tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā / paryeṣaṇāṃ pratītya lābhaḥ / lābhaṃ pratītya viniścayaḥ / viniścayaṃ pratītya chandarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:576_45: mātsaryaṃ pratītya ārakṣā / ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_50: iti / uktañca sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:576_52: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:576_53: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:579_0: (pṛ) asti samprayogaḥ / kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:579_1: vijñānacittaṃ tamāśrayate / tena samprayuktatvāt / tathā saṃjñāskandhādayo 'pi /
SA16hvsatssu:579_3: puruṣasūtra uktam- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:579_6: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:579_7: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:579_8: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam /
SA16hvsatssu:579_10: bhavānāha- pratyutpanne na santi pañcaskandhāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:579_12: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:580_0: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:580_1: api coktaṃ sūtre- sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti /
SA16hvsatssu:580_4: yadi vijñānasamprayuktam / [SSS_168] kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:580_7: āha ca- sattvānāṃ cittaṃ dīrgharātraṃ rāgadveṣādisaṃkliṣṭamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:580_8: yadi samprayogo nāsti / kiṃ saṃkleśayati cittam / caitasikāśca prakṛtito dandhā anyonyāśrayamavalambante naḍakalāpavat /
SA16hvsatssu:580_9: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:580_10: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:580_12: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:580_15: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:580_18: ] kāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:580_19: [tatkasya hetoḥ / līnaṃ cittaṃ tadebhirdharmaiḥ] susamuddhāpyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:580_20: iti / ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_0: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_2: na vibhajanti vedaneyamidaṃ vijñānaṃ niśrayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_4: te cittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvā avibhajanto vyavahāramātrāsaṅgāttathā [SSS_169] vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_6: yadavocaḥ- sarvān skandhān pratītya puruṣo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_7: tatra pañcaskandhānāṃ santatiṃ pratītya puruṣa ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ skandhānāṃ vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:583_8: yathā loke vadanti- sukhī duḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_10: tathā skandhā api / yabdravīṣi- indriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_14: snehaviyuktaṃ duḥkhamiti / bhavatāṃ [mate] rūpaṃ viprayuktamapi saṃvṛttyā samprayuktamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:583_15: jñānaśraddhe apyevam / śraddhā yā anityatādi śraddadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:583_19: tadayuktam / loke hi kiñcidvastu alpaviruddhamapi sahacaramityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:583_21: yathā ca vadanti rājā mānthātā smṛtimātreṇa svargamāruroheti /
SA16hvsatssu:583_22: tannaiva yujyate / pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti- vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
SA16hvsatssu:583_23: saṃjñānantarajā vedanā, vedanānantarajā cetanā, cetanā[nantarajāḥ] saumanasyadaurmanasyādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:584_4: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:584_6: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā /
SA16hvsatssu:584_7: kenedaṃ jñāyate / tasminneva hi sūtra uktam- vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:584_8: iti / yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:584_12: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:584_15: māstu yathārutagrahaṇamiti / śraddhayoghaṃ tarati iti yathā vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:585_1: tadayuktma / pūrvaṃ hi cittaṃ vijānāti / atha saṃjñādayo bhavanti / uktaṃ hi sūtre- vedanādayaścittaniśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:585_4: tadanyasūtraviruddham // yadi samaṃ prayogaḥ, kasmāt caitasikāścittaniśritāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:585_6: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:585_7: tadā sidhyedasmadarthaḥ / nahi citta utpadyamāne caitasikadharmāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:585_8: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate 'smi samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:585_9: neyaṃ mārganītiḥ / yadi cittaṃ prāk pariśuddhaṃ rāgādibhirāgantukairdūṣitam /
SA16hvsatssu:585_10: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:586_2: rāgādibhiḥ kiṃ kriyate / yathoktam- citta- saṃkleśāt sattvāḥ sakliśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:586_4: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:586_6: yadi sattvā asamprayojyāḥ / rāgādayo 'pi asamprayojyāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:586_11: tadvimuktamityucyate / idameva yuktam / yathābhratuṣārādayaścandrasūryābhyāmasamprayuktā api pidhānaṃ kurvantīti [pravādaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:587_1: saṃkleśacitte tu naivam / ato nāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ / (u) āvaraṇasāmyādayaṃ siddha ityato 'navadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:587_3: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:587_6: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:588_2: natvekasminneva kṣaṇe / yathāha śāriputraḥ saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu ahaṃ svatantravihārī /
SA16hvsatssu:588_4: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:588_13: na sa mārganayaḥ / kasmāt / nahyekadā bahavo dharmā bhāvayituṃ śakyante /
SA16hvsatssu:591_0: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:591_6: na tathā śrotravijñānam / trayāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānaviṣayāṇāṃ prāptyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:591_8: ato jñāyate naikamiti / yadvijñānaṃ nityamityevaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:591_20: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:591_25: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:591_26: yat prakṛtito 'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:591_27: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati /
SA16hvsatssu:591_30: ato naikaṃ bhavet / sukhaduḥkhādivedanānāṃ vibhāgavaśācca cittamapi naikam /
SA16hvsatssu:591_31: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:591_32: yadi cittamekam, ekameva vijñānaṃ sarvaviṣayān gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:591_35: yadi cittamekam / kasya pratibandhānna sarvaviṣayān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:592_4: asirnātmānaṃ chinatti / aṅgulirnātmānaṃ spṛśati / ataścittaṃ naikam / yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam- yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:592_5: tā muktvānyāṃ gṛhṇāti / evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:592_6: iti / yadi cittamekam / ṣaḍvijñānakāyā iti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:592_8: yat citta- [mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate 'nyannirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:592_10: taccittaṃ santatyā vartate / na pratikṣaṇaṃ chidyate / yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:595_0: kaściccodayati- cittamekam / kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- cittamidaṃ dīrgharātraṃ kāmādibhirupakliṣṭamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:595_1: yadi cittaṃ nānā, na sadopakliṣṭaṃ syāt / ratnahārasūtra uktam- yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:595_2: dhyānasūtre coktam- prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:597_0: ato jñāyate cittamekaṃ cañcalamitastato dhāvatīti / saṃyuktapiṭake ca bhikṣurāha-
SA16hvsatssu:598_3: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathā purā /
SA16hvsatssu:599_0: ato jñāyate- cittamekaṃ pañcendriyadvāreṣu kāyakuṭikāyāṃ paribhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:599_1: saiva tatprakṛtiḥ / ata āha “mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā” /
SA16hvsatssu:601_2: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:601_3: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:601_5: ato jñāyate cittamekamiti / cittamekaṃ sat sañcinoti [vāsanām] /
SA16hvsatssu:601_9: yasya cittaṃ bahu / na tasya sattbalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:601_12: ato jñāyate / cittamekamātmanā paśyati ātmanā vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:604_1: na yuktamidam / kasmāt / yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:604_2: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:604_3: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_4: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:604_6: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_7: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_8: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_9: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_10: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_11: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_12: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_15: yathā sa eva puruṣo 'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:604_18: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:604_20: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:605_0: yadavādīḥ- ekameva vijñānaṃ na ṣaḍvivaṣayān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:605_1: naikaṃ cittamiti / tadayuktam / mama tu indriyapravibhāgādvijñānaṃ pravibhajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:605_2: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:605_5: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:605_6: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati /
SA16hvsatssu:605_9: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkāparāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:605_12: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam /
SA16hvsatssu:605_13: kasmāt / yadi cittamanyat, tadā anyatkaroti, anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:608_0: atrocyate / yadabravīḥ- cittamekaṃ kāmādinā ciramupakliṣṭam iti / tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:609_2: adyatananadyeva pūrvanadī / [adya] rājasabhāpradīpa eva hyastanapradīpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:609_10: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:610_1: yadi cittaṃ nityamekam / kaḥ sañcayenopakāraḥ / yadi cittaṃ bahu / tadā adharamadhyottamakramasantatyotpadyamānatvādasti sañcayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:610_3: yadi cittamekam / tadeva nityaṃ bhavet / yannityam / sa evātmā syāt / kasmāt / idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko 'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:610_9: kasmāt / brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo 'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:611_0: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- dakṣiṇena dṛṣṭvā vāmena vijānīyāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:611_4: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya]jñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:614_1: tadayuktama / kasmāt / samyak pratyāyakātmakaṃ hi cittam,
SA16hvsatssu:614_3: kathaṃ cittamekaṃ bhavati / yathā ghaṭaṃ dhatte hastakarma /
SA16hvsatssu:614_10: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam /
SA16hvsatssu:615_0: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:615_1: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:615_5: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:616_2: yadi vijñānamekam / indriyaṃ kiṃ karoti / [yat] pradīpaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena kalpayasi /
SA16hvsatssu:616_3: nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yuktaḥ / yathā aprakāśitasya prakāśanaṃ karoti pradīpaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:616_5: ato nātmānaṃ prakāśayati / pradīpenāndhakāre vinaṣṭe [viṣayeṣu] cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:616_7: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:617_1: ato nāsti sa doṣaḥ / yadi cittamekaṃ nityam / tadāsti karma nāsti vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:617_2: kasmāt / sākṣāccittaṃ tadāśrita ñca karma bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:617_3: yadi cittamekam / kaḥ karmavipākaḥ / tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:617_5: antadvayapātāpatteḥ / saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:620_3: kasmāt / rūpādīnāṃ pratyāyanāt / yat kṣaṇikaṃ na tat pratyāyayet /
SA16hvsatssu:620_4: ato nāsthāyi bhavati / yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:620_5: kasmāt / yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:620_6: kaḥ punarvādaḥ / kṣaṇikaṃ pratyāyayatīti / vastutastu pratyāyayati / ato jñāyate vijñānāni na kṣaṇikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:620_7: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna[mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:621_1: tadapi na yuktam / yadyaikaikaṃ cittaṃ nādhyavasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:621_2: santāno 'pi nādhyavasyet / yathaikasminnandhe rūpamapaśyati bahavo 'pi na paśyeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:621_6: tatsantānastu adhyavasyati / iti / idamapyayuktam / ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:621_9: vastutastu pratyāyayati / ato jñāyate 'kṣaṇikamiti / yadi cittaṃ kṣaṇikamiti / atītānāgatādikarmāṇi niṣprayojanāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:624_0: atra pratibrūmaḥ / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- cittaṃ pratyāyakamityato 'kṣaṇikamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:624_2: na sthāyibalāt / tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam /
SA16hvsatssu:624_3: kasmāt / pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:624_6: yannīlaṃ pratyāyayati / na tadeva pītaṃ pratyāyayati /
SA16hvsatssu:624_8: nīlapratyāyanakālo 'nyaḥ / anīlapratyāyanakālaścānyaḥ / naiko dharmo dvayoḥ kālayoḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:624_9: dharmaḥ kālasamanvitaḥ / kālaśca dharmasamanvitaḥ / graho dvividhaḥ adhyavasāyātmakaḥ anadhyavasāyatmaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:624_13: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:626_2: ato 'sthāyīti jñāyate / puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:626_3: ato vijñānamasthāyi / yadi vijñānaṃ kiñcitkālaṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:626_12: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:626_13: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:626_15: tattu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate kṣaṇikamiti / vikalpādyanekapratyayagrahaṇāt kṣaṇikamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:629_7: vyajanavāyuḥ kāyaṃ spṛśati / cetanā ca samīkarotyapaśabdam /
SA16hvsatssu:630_2: tattu na sambhavati / katha[mekena] vijñānena mūlaśākhāpatrapuṣpāṇi [SSS_181] sarvāṇi jñāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:630_3: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:630_5: na tu [yat] nīlajñānam / tadeva pītajñānam / ato jñāyate ekakālaṃ yugapadutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:630_6: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:630_9: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:630_10: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:633_0: atrocyate / yaducyate bhavatā- bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:633_3: rūpamābhāsagataṃ bhavati / vijñānotpādako manaskāraśca yadi na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:633_5: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:633_7: cittasyaikaikaśa utpatteḥ / na hi pṛthivīnarakādivipāka ekakālaṃ vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:633_9: tadā yugapadvedanā syāt / na vastutaḥ sambhavati / ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:633_14: kaḥ pratibandho 'sti / tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:633_16: na tu tatsambhavati / ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:633_21: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān /
SA16hvsatssu:634_0: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:634_1: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:634_2: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:634_3: na tu tadyujyante vastutaḥ / ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:634_4: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:634_5: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:634_6: natvidaṃ yujyate / ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:634_7: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:634_9: evaṃ yāvanmanasyapi / tathā ca [tāni] sarvān dharmān vijānīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:634_10: na tu tadyujyate / ato vijñānāni naikakālikānīti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:635_3: īdṛśī dharmatā syāt / tathā bhavatāme kasyātmana ekaṃ manaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:635_4: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:635_6: na kāṇḍādyutpādya aṅkuraḥ / evaṃ cittasambandhī dharmaścittakrameṇotpadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:638_1: kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:638_2: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:639_0: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:639_3: ataḥ saṃjñā duṣṭā / duṣṭatvāt bhagavānāha- saṃjñā prahātavyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:639_4: yathoktam- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:640_1: kasmāt / tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:640_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:640_8: iti / ato jñāyate na prajñaptisaddharmagrahaṇamātrā saṃjñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:641_3: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:643_0: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:643_3: yathoktam- āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:643_5: na tu saṃjñā / saptatriṃśadāryamārgāṅgeṣu noktā saṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:643_7: uktañca sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:643_9: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:643_12: anukramasūtre coktam- viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:643_17: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:644_0: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:644_1: kasmāt / yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:644_2: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:644_3: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā [SSS_185] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:644_4: tathāpi sā prajñaivepi / nyāyato bhavati / āha ca- avidyā sarvakleśānāṃ mūlam /
SA16hvsatssu:644_6: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_2: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_6: kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathoktam- siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:645_7: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_10: atra cīvarādirnimittam / kiñcāha- bhagavān- īdṛśaṃ nimittaṃ khyāpayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_13: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_16: tat samādhinimittam / cyavanadharmiṇo devaputrasya pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_17: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_21: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi [SSS_186] dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:645_22: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:646_1: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:646_2: yadyālambanaṃ nimittam / kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:646_4: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:646_5: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:646_8: na tasya doṣo 'sti / nirvāṇañcāsaddharmaḥ / ato na duṣaṇakṛt syāt / yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:649_0: (pṛ) vedanā katamā / (u) sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:649_1: (pṛ) sukhā katamā / duḥkhā katamā / aduḥkhāsukhā ca katamā / (u) kāyacittayorvikāso sukhetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:649_2: tayoreva hrāse duḥkhā / ubhayalakṣaṇayo viruddhā aduḥkhāsukhā /
SA16hvsatssu:649_6: (u) tadālambanamaniyatam / na tu vedanā / kasmāt / yathaika evāgniḥ kasyāñcidṛtau sukhamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:650_3: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:650_4: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:650_5: na tu sukhakaraḥ / ato jñāyate sukhavedanāpi nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:650_7: na tu paramārthataḥ / uṣṇasparśapriyasya kasyacit hitakaro 'pi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:650_10: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:651_1: tanna yuktam / kasmāt / sūtre bhagavānāha- tisro vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:651_6: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:651_7: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham /
SA16hvsatssu:651_8: niruddhe duḥkham / duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:651_9: niruddhe sukham / aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:651_10: sukhā vedanā puṇyavipākaḥ / duḥkhā vedanā ca pāpavipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:651_13: na tadyuktaṃ vastutaḥ / kāmadhātāvapi sukhā vedanāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:651_14: yadi nāsti paramārthataḥ sā, rūpārūpyadhātū na [sukha]vedanāvantau syātām /
SA16hvsatssu:651_15: na tu yujyate vastutaḥ / kiñcāha- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:651_16: yadi nāsti sukhā vedanā, kutra rāgo 'nuśayīta / na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:652_3: na tūcyate vastuta / jñātavyaṃ duḥkhaviśeṣasyaiva sukhanimittavyavahāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:652_4: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:652_6: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:652_10: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:652_13: kasmāt / na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam /
SA16hvsatssu:652_14: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:652_16: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:652_17: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam /
SA16hvsatssu:655_0: sarvā vedanā duḥkham / kasmāt / cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:655_1: kenedaṃ jñāyate / annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu /
SA16hvsatssu:655_2: ato duḥkhahetavaḥ / hastavyathādiduḥkhaṃ lakṣaṇato nidarśayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:655_6: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:655_7: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā /
SA16hvsatssu:655_8: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:655_10: paścādbhavati vidveṣaḥ / ato jñāyate mithyāsaṃjñānusmaraṇena sukhasaṃjñotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:655_13: na sukhaṃ bhavati / vairāgye sati tadālambanaṃ tyajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:655_15: kasmāt tyajyate / yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti /
