SA16hvsatssu:656_4: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti /
SA16hvsatssu:656_5: nocyeta viparyāsa iti / yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:656_6: evaṃ sukhamapi / ubhayorviparyastatvāt / janānāṃ kaṭuke duḥkhe sukhacittamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:656_9: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:656_12: iti / yadyasti niyataṃ sukham / sukhaṃ duḥkhato na draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:656_14: ato bhagavānāha- yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:657_1: yadi vastuto 'sti sukham / kathaṃ duḥkhasatyasaṅgṛhītaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:657_2: duḥkhameva vastuto 'sti / sukhalakṣaṇantu mṛṣā / kenedaṃ jñāyate / duḥkhacittabhāvanayā hi sarvasaṃyojanāni prajahajāti /
SA16hvsatssu:657_3: natu sukhacittabhāvanayā / ato jñāyate sarvaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:657_5: dveṣyavat / dveṣyo dvividhaḥ- ekaḥ duḥkhameva karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:657_6: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti /
SA16hvsatssu:657_7: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:657_12: prārthanā tu duḥkham / na paśyāmaḥ kamapi lokamaprārthayamānam /
SA16hvsatssu:657_13: ataḥ sukhavihīnaṃ jānīmaḥ / sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:658_2: [ato] bandhanaṃ duḥkham / sarve 'pi padārthāḥ kramaśaḥ kutsanīyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:658_6: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:658_9: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:658_10: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:659_1: kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:659_2: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:659_7: yadyasti vastutaḥ sukham / kathaṃ sukhādbhraṣṭāḥ pramodyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:662_8: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt [SSS_191] duḥkhaṃ [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:662_14: sukhañca duḥkhasya dvāram / sukharāgāt tribhyo viṣebhyaḥ sambhavantyakuśalakarmāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:662_22: duḥkheṣu ca pātayati / yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:662_26: tadāpadasvatibahulāḥ / ato duḥkhato draṣṭavyam / sukhavedanā ca kleśānāmutpattisthānam /
SA16hvsatssu:662_31: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:663_6: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva /
SA16hvsatssu:663_7: idamapi duḥkham / sukha vedanā atandrīhetuḥ / kasmāt / sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:663_15: kasmāt / sattvāḥ saṃsāre sukhādhyavasānena nirvāṇaṃ nābhilaṣanti /
SA16hvsatssu:663_19: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe /
SA16hvsatssu:663_22: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā /
SA16hvsatssu:663_24: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā /
SA16hvsatssu:664_5: kasmāt / loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:667_1: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:667_2: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:667_6: na paryeṣate / tasmin samaye aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:668_4: (u) puruṣo 'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:668_9: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:668_12: kathamāha nāstīti / puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:668_13: priyātsaumanasyaṃ bhavati / dvepyāddaurmanasyam / udāsīnādupekṣā / ato jñāyate saṃjñābhedādimāstisro vedanā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:668_22: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:668_23: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:668_24: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_2: kasmāt / ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_4: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_6: ato jñāyate sarve 'pi cittopavicārā [SSS_194] nāvedanā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_7: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_8: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:669_9: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_11: duḥkhahetutvāt / ato jñāyate ālambanamindriyāṇi ca duḥkhajanakānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:669_12: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:670_1: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:670_2: duḥkhaduḥkhantu duḥkhameva / itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:671_1: (u) duḥkhameva / kasmāt / anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:671_6: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:671_8: akṣigatarajovat / prākṛtā ajñā duḥkhaṃ sukhato manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:671_12: kasmāt / te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:671_13: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:672_2: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:672_5: īdṛśaṃ pūrvavat vaktavyam / imeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kāyagateṣu santi [SSS_195] hitādayo viśeṣā ityato vedanetyākhyāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:672_10: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:672_11: kasmāt / tasmin samaye hi kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:673_6: kasmāt / puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:673_7: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:673_10: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā /
SA16hvsatssu:673_12: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:673_18: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete /
SA16hvsatssu:674_2: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam /
SA16hvsatssu:674_7: avidyayā anubhavajñānam / (u) puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:674_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:674_10: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:674_13: (u) sūtramidaṃ svayamāha- vedanānāṃ samudayāstagamādīnavādīn yathābhūtamaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:674_17: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam- aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:674_25: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:674_27: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:677_0: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:677_1: sa evaṃ prajānāti- utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:677_5: (u) sūtrasyāsya puruṣo [SSS_197] vedayata ityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanaṃ ityadoṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:677_6: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato 'pyanavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:677_10: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:678_0: (pṛ) yadvedayati sā vedanā / vedyata iti vā vedanā / yadā vedayatīti tadā vedanā sukhādibhinnā /
SA16hvsatssu:678_1: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:678_2: yadi vedyata iti vedanā / kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:678_7: ato vedayatīti vedanā bhavati (pṛ) na sattvānāṃ vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:678_9: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram /
SA16hvsatssu:678_10: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:679_2: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:679_3: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:679_6: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:680_3: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:680_4: ato bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:680_5: (pṛ) katamā kāyikī vedanā / (u) pañcendriyāṇyupādāyotpadyamānā vedanā kāyikī vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:680_6: ṣaṣṭhamindriyamupādāyotpadyamānā vedanā caitasikī (pṛ) āsāṃ katamā sāmiṣā katamā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:680_10: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:680_11: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:680_13: kāma eva āmiṣaḥ / naiṣkramyameva nirāmiṣatā / (u) pūrvaṃ sāmānyata uktamāmiṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:680_15: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:680_17: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:681_0: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā /
SA16hvsatssu:681_1: kiṃ nāstyupekṣā vedanā / (u) daurmanasyaṃ saumanasyañcāvaśyaṃ saṃjñāvikalpenotpannam /
SA16hvsatssu:681_5: kasmātsukhamasti na prītiḥ / (u) susraṃ sarvakāyacittaṃ gahanamāpūrayatīti sukhamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:681_7: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:682_4: kasmāt / sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:682_6: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:682_9: na tadekaputramṛtitulyam / saṃsāre ca duḥkhā vedanā bahulā /
SA16hvsatssu:682_10: na tathā sukhā vedanā / kasmāt / bahavaḥ sattvāḥ [SSS_199] tisṛṣu durgatiṣūpapannā devamanuṣyebhyo nikṛṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:682_13: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:682_14: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:683_1: kasmāt / atrāsti mohānuśayaḥ / sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ mohaḥ / sā ca vedanā sūkṣmā / tatra kleśānāṃ jñānasya duranubhāvatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:683_3: sukhaduḥkhe cāgantuke / sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā /
SA16hvsatssu:683_4: na tathānye dve / vedaneyaṃ cirajīvinī / tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:683_5: sā ca nirvāṇavirodhinī / kasmāt / tatra hyutpadyate śāntalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:683_9: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:686_3: anyāni trīṇi cittagatāni / yathācittalābhaṃ yāvadbhavāgraṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:686_6: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:686_7: iti / ato bhavaduktamayuktam / (u) [SSS_200] bhavaduktasūtreṇa duḥkhendriyaṃ prathamadhyāne vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:687_0: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:687_3: kenedaṃ jñāyate / caturṣu dhyāneṣūcyante catvāri iryāpathāni /
SA16hvsatssu:687_4: yatrāstīryāpatham / tatra sarvaṃ duḥkhaḥ syāt / rūpadhātau ca santi cakṣuḥ śrotrakāyavijñānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:687_5: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:687_9: kaśca rūpāṇāmādīnavaḥ / yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:687_10: astyādīnavacittam / ato 'sti sukhaṃ duḥkham / yogī dhyānasamādhiṣu rajyate copekṣate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:688_2: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:688_3: śalyamiti duḥkhamityarthaḥ / ato jñāyate duḥkhamiti / sarve 'pi pañcaskandhā duḥkhaṃ vihiṃsanaduḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:688_7: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:688_11: āha ca sūtram- atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā [SSS_201] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:688_12: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha- dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:688_15: api coktaṃ sūtre- tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:688_17: kasmānnāsti duḥkham / ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- sarve kleśā akuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:689_0: uktañca sūtre- rūpārāmā [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyāḥ rūparatā rūpasamuditāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:689_2: iti / evaṃ yāvadvijñāne 'pi / ato jñāyate sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāmasti daurmanasyaṃ saumanasyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:689_5: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:689_6: hānau ca na daurmanasyam / yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo 'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:689_7: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:690_0: bhagavān svayamāha- daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:690_3: na tat jñānapratyayatathā / yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:690_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:691_2: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:691_4: yadi [te] duḥkhopavicāriṇaḥ [SSS_202] na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:691_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:691_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:691_8: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_3: yadyupekṣyate ko doṣaḥ / tatra ca sukhavihāraḥ śānto 'nāsaṅgarūpaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:692_5: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_6: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:692_7: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_11: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_13: yathā vadanti- yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so 'viśuddhābha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_15: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:692_16: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:693_1: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:693_2: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:693_4: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:697_0: sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:698_4: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:698_9: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:698_10: vipacyate bhagavān / bhagavānāha- evamevāśrutavān pṛthagjano nityaṃ ṣaṭsparśairāhanyate /
SA16hvsatssu:698_12: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:698_15: aṅgāraḥ kasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ / āyatibhavāya cetayata ityasya /
SA16hvsatssu:698_16: āyatibhavaścāṅgārakalpaḥ / sadā duḥkhānāṃ janakatvāt / kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- asmīti [bhikṣava] iñjitam /
SA16hvsatssu:698_18: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:698_21: kiñcāha- yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:698_22: no bhagavan iti / kāmaprārthanayākuśalaṃ karotīti tadarthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:698_23: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:698_24: tatra cetanā mānasaṃ karma / cetayitvā karma kāyikaṃ vācikam /
SA16hvsatssu:698_25: cetayitveti prārthayitvā / upālisūtre uktam- nighaṇṭo nāthaputraḥ śītodakapratikṣipta uṣṇodakapratisevī /
SA16hvsatssu:699_2: kasmāt / sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam- aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:699_3: mahānidānasūtra uktam- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:699_4: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:699_5: āha ca- yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:699_6: api cāha- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:699_7: paryeṣaṇameva tṛṣṇā / tasmāt prārthanā cetanātmiketi bhavatāṃ matamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:699_9: tadayuktam / kasmāt upālisūtra uktam- asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:699_12: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:700_2: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha- ahamanāgate 'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:700_4: tadā nānāsravā cetanā syāt / cetanā ca tṛṣṇāhetuḥ / yathoktaṃsūtre- manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:700_8: kasmāt / abhisaṃskarotīti saṃskāra iti lakṣaṇāt cetanetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:700_12: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sā hi tṛṣṇākāryaṃ tṛṣṇāṅgañca /
SA16hvsatssu:700_13: na tṛṣṇāhetuḥ / kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:700_16: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:701_0: codayati / yadi hetvavasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇā phalāvasthāyāṃ cetanā /
SA16hvsatssu:701_2: kasmāt / yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so 'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:701_3: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā /
SA16hvsatssu:701_6: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā /
SA16hvsatssu:701_7: ato rāgāt jāyate prārthanā / prārthanaiva cetanā ato rāgaścetanāhetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:702_6: paścāt karmaṇi pravṛttiḥ / (pṛ) cetanā manaso 'nyā utānanyā /
SA16hvsatssu:703_0: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:704_0: prasannamanasāpyevam / ato jñāyate mana eva cetaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:704_1: yadi cetanā na manaḥ / kiṃ mānasaṃ karma bhavet / mānasaṃ karma yanmana ālambana upavicarati /
SA16hvsatssu:704_2: ataścetanā mana eva / sāmānyalakṣaṇato manaupavicāraścetanetyuktāpi sā bāhulyena kuśalākaśaladharmagatetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:704_4: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:704_6: tadā prārthanā / yadāyatibhavaṃ prārthayate / tadā praṇidhānam / ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_3: yadi nāsti sa dharmaḥ / ko hetuḥ syāt / ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_4: ṣaṭ ṣaṭkasūtra uktaṃ- ṣaṭa sparśakāyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_7: na punaḥ pṛthak vaktavyaṃ sa [SSS_207] prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_8: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_10: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:708_15: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo 'nyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:708_20: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:709_0: atra brūmaḥ / prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:709_4: idameva yuktam / na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo 'yaṃ dvividha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:709_7: ata udāhṛtasūtramahetuḥ / yadi sparśo bhidyate jalatejovat /
SA16hvsatssu:709_8: tadā kāritramapi bhidyeta / na tu dṛśyate pratyekaṃ kāritrabhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:709_9: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:710_0: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:710_5: na sparśapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ / yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:710_6: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:710_8: ato 'hetuḥ / vedanādyakālīnā tṛṣṇānantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:710_10: tallakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:710_12: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:710_16: bhagavān sūcīlomaṃ yakṣamāha- tava [SSS_208] saṃsparśaḥ pāpaka iti kāyamapanayāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:710_17: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:710_18: tathā sparśāhāramapyāhuḥ / pāṇisparśa iti ca vadanti / ataḥ sarvatra kāyavijñānavijñeye vastuni sparśasaṃjñocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:711_3: yaducyate caitasikaṃ, tatsparśalakṣaṇaviruddham / kasmāt / bhagavānāha- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:711_4: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:711_5: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:711_6: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:715_0: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na /
SA16hvsatssu:715_4: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:715_7: yathā rūpādhyavasāyaḥ / kadāciddharmasvarūpata utpadyate yathā kalpāvasāne dhyānam /
SA16hvsatssu:715_14: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:715_19: tathā nīlādāvapi / saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam /
SA16hvsatssu:715_22: kadācitkramaśa utpadyate / yathā avaraṃ pratītya madhyamamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:716_5: ata evamāha- kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre 'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:716_11: nātmamanoyogāpekṣiṇaḥ / yathā bāhyavastūni aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpaphalāni kramikāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:717_2: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:717_6: [SSS_210] ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:720_1: kasmāt / sūtramāha kāmacchanda iti / kāmān chandayatīti kāmacchandaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:720_4: kiñcāha- yadi bhikṣavo mama śāsane tīvracchandā [vartadhve] /
SA16hvsatssu:720_5: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:720_7: tattīvracchanda ityucyate / ṛddhipāde coktam- chandasamādhiḥ vīryasamādhiḥ cittasamādhirmīmāṃsāsamādhiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:720_9: ayaṃ vīryasahakāriṇā prajñāsamādhiṃ sañcinotītyebhyaścaturbhyo 'bhilaṣitamṛddhyaṅgamiti nāmabhāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:720_10: āha ca- tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:720_11: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:720_13: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:721_1: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan /
SA16hvsatssu:721_2: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:721_3: abhūt pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato 'smi /
SA16hvsatssu:721_4: yato virāgeṇa samāgato 'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:725_4: kasmāt / bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam /
SA16hvsatssu:725_11: ata āha- sattvānāṃ yathādhātu santānamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:728_4: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:730_0: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:730_2: sā[pi] śraddhetyucyate / pūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā paścātkāyena sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:730_3: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti,
SA16hvsatssu:730_4: cittañca prasīdati / sā śraddhā caturṣu avetyaprasādeṣvantargatā /
SA16hvsatssu:730_5: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:731_3: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:731_4: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:731_6: neyaṃ śraddhā bhavati / (u) nāyamāśrāddhyadharmaḥ / śraddhā ca prasādalakṣaṇā / akuśalā śraddhāpi prasādalakṣaṇaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:731_7: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:731_8: na ca tadyujyate vastutaḥ / tatastridhaiva vibhaktā / yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:734_2: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:734_4: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:734_5: anyo 'kuśalaḥ / yogī yo 'kuśalānāmādīnave kuśalānāmaniśaṃse ca śraddhadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:734_6: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo 'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya /
SA16hvsatssu:734_9: sarvahitānāṃ mūlaṃ karoti / tadvyavasāyasahakāratayā manaskārādayo dharmā mahāphalaprāpakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:737_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:738_2: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre smṛtiṃ sarvārthikāṃ [vadāmī]ti /
SA16hvsatssu:738_7: na tu tryadhvā bhavati / yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:738_8: tadā smṛtirubhayatrānugā / sā sarvatragetyucyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni tryadhvālambanānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:738_9: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:738_10: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:739_1: (u) smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva]mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:739_2: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:739_3: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:739_10: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:739_12: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:739_16: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:742_0: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:742_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:742_6: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:742_12: ato 'pratyakṣavastuno 'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:742_14: ayaṃ tridhājñātaḥ / mithyāvitarko viparītamanaskāraḥ yadanitye nityamityādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:742_15: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:742_18: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:743_2: kathamidam / (u) maivam / kasmāt / uktaṃ khalu bhavadbhirghaṇṭātāḍanadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:743_3: ādyaśabda[samo] vitarkaḥ / anyaśabda[samo] vicāraḥ / taraṅgadṛṣṭāntaśca [uktaḥ] / ya audārikaḥ [tatsamo] vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:746_0: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:748_1: na yuktamidam / kasmāt / lobhābhāvo 'bhāvadharmaḥ / kathamabhāvo dharmasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:749_1: avyākṛtamūlamiti / kecidvadanti- catvāryavyākṛtamūlāni- tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭiḥ mānamavidyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:749_2: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:749_3: naitadbhagavatoktam / avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:750_0: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:751_2: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:754_1: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:755_0: prāptiriti / sattvānāṃ kṛte dharmāṇāṃ samanvāgamaḥ prāptiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:755_7: kathamidam / (u) sarveṣāṃ samanvāgamaḥ / kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:755_8: tasya tadvidyamānameva / tat dvayaṃ tatkāyamanupatati rūpānupāticchāyāvat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:755_9: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva /
SA16hvsatssu:756_2: anāgato 'vidyamāna iti / pratyutpannaśca na sadā kuśalacittavattve [SSS_219] kṣamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:757_1: tatkathamidam / (u) na samanvāgatāḥ / kasmāt / akṛtābhyāgamāt / ato 'nāgatāsamanvāgamaḥ prāptirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:758_1: kasmāt / na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:758_4: sa ca nāsti dharmāntaram / nirvāṇavat / jīvitendriyamiti / karmapratyayaḥ pañcaskandhasantāno jīvitamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:758_8: santanyamānatvaṃ sthitiḥ / sthitipariṇāmo 'nyathātvam / na santi pṛthakjātivyayādayo dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:758_9: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā [SSS_220] utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:758_12: na tatroktaṃ jātirastīti / ato nāsti jātirityanavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:759_0: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:759_4: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ.
SA16hvsatssu:759_5: ...... [sā jātiḥ] iti / ataḥ pratyutpannādhvani skandhānāmādyalābho jātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:759_7: āha ca- skandhānāṃ jīrṇatā bhugnatā jareti /
SA16hvsatssu:760_0: nāmakāya iti / vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:761_4: tīrthikānāṃ hi sūtreṣūktaṃ- anyo ghaṭo 'nyat ghaṭatvam /
SA16hvsatssu:761_7: tadayuktam / kasmāt / tattvaṃ tatsvabhāvaḥ / yadi bravīṣi pṛthagjanatvamanyaditi /
SA16hvsatssu:761_9: rūpatvāpekṣitvāt / tattu na yujyate / ato gabhīramananuvicintya vavīṣi- asti pṛthagjanatvaṃ pṛthagiti /
SA16hvsatssu:766_0: śāstramāha- duḥkhasatyaṃ parisamāpya samudayasatyamidānīṃ vakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:766_3: kāyena kṛtaṃ karma kāyikam / tat trividhaṃ akuśalaṃ prāṇātipātādi /
SA16hvsatssu:767_2: kāyena kṛtatvāt / (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:767_3: hetuphalayorbhedāt / (pṛ) na syātkāyikaṃ karma / kasmāt / kāyaspandanakṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:767_5: (u) idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne 'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:767_6: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:767_7: anyatrotpadyamānatvāt / na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:767_10: ato na kāya eva karma / (pṛ) puṇyapāpasamudayo 'vijñaptiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:767_11: kāyavijñaptiḥ katham / (u) kāye 'nyatrotpadyamāne kriyamāṇā vijñaptiḥ kāyavijñaptirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:767_13: kāyastu na tathā / ato na kāyavijñaptiḥ syāt / (u) cittabalāt kāye 'nyatrotpadyamāne karma samudeti /
SA16hvsatssu:767_14: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:767_15: tathā vācikakarmāpi / na tu tat sākṣācchabdavyavahāra[rūpam] /
SA16hvsatssu:767_16: [SSS_223] cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:767_17: evaṃ mānasaṃ karmāpi / ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:768_2: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:768_3: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:769_2: kiṃ [tasya] lakṣaṇam / (u) tadavijñaptireva / (pṛ) kiṃ kevalamasti kāyikavācikāvijñaptireva na mānasikāvijñaptiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:769_3: (u) maivam / kasmāt / nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:769_4: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma- cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme]ti /
SA16hvsatssu:769_5: cetanā mānasaṃ karma / cetayitvā [karma] trividham- cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:772_0: (pṛ) ko 'vijñaptidharmaḥ / (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle 'pi yannityaṃ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:773_3: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:774_7: yadi viratirabhāvadharmaḥ / kathaṃ hetuḥ syāt / (pṛ) na viratyā svarga utpadyate,
SA16hvsatssu:774_8: kintu kuśalacittena / (u) maivam / uktaṃ hi sūtre- vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:774_12: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:774_13: śīlaṃ dhruvamiti coktam / yadi nāstyavijñaptiḥ / kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate,
SA16hvsatssu:774_14: śīlaṃ dhruvamiti ca / na ca vijñaptiḥ prāṇātipātakriyaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:774_20: manaśca na śīlasaṃvaraḥ / kasmāt / yadi kaścidakuśalāvyākṛtacittasthaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:774_21: yadi vācittaḥ / so 'pi śīladhārītyucyate / ato jñāyate tasmin samaye 'styavijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:775_1: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:775_6: [SSS_225] (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:775_8: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:775_10: ko doṣaḥ / (u) rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāḥ pañca dharmā na puṇyapāpasvabhāvāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:776_11: (u) dvitīyacittādutpadyate / yat kuśalākuśalānugāmi cittaṃ prabalaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:776_12: tat ciraṃ tiṣṭhati / yaccittaṃ durbalaṃ na tacciraṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:779_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:779_1: katamo hetuḥ ahetuśca / (u) jñānapūrvakaṃ kṛtaṃ [karma] hetukṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:779_2: tadviparītamahetukṛtam / (pṛ) [tarhi] yadahetukṛtaṃ na tat karma bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:779_3: (u) astīdaṃ karma / kintu yaccittahetukṛtaṃ karma tatsavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:779_9: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:779_10: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:780_2: kṛtānupacitamiti- yathā hananādikarma kṛtvā paścāccittaṃ paritapati /
SA16hvsatssu:780_5: tat kṛtānupacitam / upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:780_6: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:780_7: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:780_8: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:780_10: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:780_11: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:781_0: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:781_3: lavaṇapalavarge bhagavānāha- ekatyaḥ(śca) puruṣo [bhāvitakāyo] [SSS_227] narakavedanīyaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:781_5: iti / (pṛ) yadi gurupāpakaṃ karma alpamātrakaṃ [dṛṣṭadharma]vedanīyaṃ prajñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:781_6: kasmānnātyantaṃ kṣayameti / (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo 'nuśayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:781_11: na tasyākuśalaṃ karmodeti / yathā buddhānāṃ sarvajñānāṃ puruṣāṇām /
SA16hvsatssu:781_12: nānyeṣāmevaṃ sāmarthyam / ato 'kuśalakarma labhante / ato 'rhan bhāvitatattvajñāno 'pi pūrvakarmavaśādakuśalavipākaṃ vedayate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:782_1: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:782_8: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā /
SA16hvsatssu:782_14: kasmādatyantaṃ na kṣīyante / (u) na te pāpadharmāstasmin samaye 'tyantaṃ kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:782_17: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:785_10: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:786_1: kimanyadapyasti / (u) anyadapyasti karma / nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:786_2: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:786_3: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:787_5: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām
SA16hvsatssu:787_6: yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:788_1: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:791_1: kiṃ tanmahārthakaṃ karma / (u) yena karmaṇā anuttarasamyaksambodhimadhigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:791_10: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:792_6: [SSS_230] tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:793_0: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:793_2: sā prahāṇādutkarṣati / kasmāt / yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo 'tiricyate na prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:795_1: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:796_3: (pṛ) tadvacana mayuktam / yathoktaṃ sūtre srotaāpannaśatasatkāro naikasakṛdāgāmisatkārakalpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:796_4: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:796_5: iti / ato vītarāgasya dānaṃ bahupuṇyāni prāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:796_7: na srotaāpannaḥ / kasmāducyata utkṛṣṭa iti / (u) tatsūtraṃ neyārthakam / kenedaṃ jñāyate / tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:796_8: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete /
SA16hvsatssu:796_10: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:797_7: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:800_1: kiṃ kuśalaṃ karma / (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:800_2: (pṛ) kiṃ priyam / (u) pareṣāṃ yat sukhaprāpakaṃ tat priyam /
SA16hvsatssu:800_5: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:800_6: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:800_9: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:800_11: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:800_13: na tvaihikamalpasukham / yat pretyāmutra mahāduḥkhaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:801_1: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:801_2: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam /
SA16hvsatssu:801_7: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:801_11: tat sarvathāpuṇyahetuḥ / kathaṃ puṇyaṃ labheran / (pṛ) kecit prāṇihiṃsayā bahū nāmupakurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:801_12: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:802_4: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:802_5: hiṃsāṃ kurvan yaśo labhate / yaśaḥ puruṣasya kāmyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:802_9: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:802_10: yathāha gāthā- mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:803_1: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat // iti
SA16hvsatssu:804_2: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:804_3: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:804_10: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:804_11: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:804_13: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:804_16: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:804_20: kathaṃ tasya pāpaṃ bhavati / yathā sūnakādayaḥ / paśupālānāṃ gavājadāne 'pi pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:805_0: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā prāṇivadhenābhīpsitalābhādasti puṇyaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:805_10: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:805_11: na ca tathā sarve sattvāḥ / [ataḥ] prāṇivadhenopabhogyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:805_12: yathā loka āhuḥ- ayaṃ puruṣo 'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:806_0: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:806_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sūtramidamanena mithyāpralāpena mūḍhān protsāhayati sauryamutpādayitum /
SA16hvsatssu:806_2: kenedaṃ jñāyate / avaśyaṃ puṇyādhīnaṃ puṇyamutpadyate pāpādhīnaṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:806_4: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:806_6: sa gṛhyadharmasamaḥ / yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:806_7: tathā kṣatriyasyāpi / sa rājadharmo 'pi hetunā pāpaprāpakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:806_8: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:806_10: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:806_11: yaḥ puruṣajīvitamapaharati / tasya pāpamasti / yathā kaścinmātāpitṛpālanāya paradhanamapaharati /
SA16hvsatssu:807_3: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:807_4: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto 'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti /
SA16hvsatssu:807_7: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:807_10: tadā taṃ hanyāt / kasmāt / ahamuttamaḥ, nānāprāyaścittaistatpāpaṃ nirharāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:807_11: yadi tena tulyaguṇaḥ / tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam /
SA16hvsatssu:807_13: yadi dhanasvāmī guṇādhikaḥ / tadā svakāyaṃ tyajet / tatra pāpasyāpanodyatvāt / evaṃ vivekaḥ / corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:808_0: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:808_1: taddūṣitacarameva / kasmāt / yadi purata āgato guṇādhikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:808_2: tadā svakāyaṃ tyajet / yadi nāsti pāpamiti / kasmāttathā bhavet / yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:808_4: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:809_6: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:809_7: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:809_8: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:809_9: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:809_11: ime kleśā mithyāviparyāsāḥ / mithyāviparyastacittotpāda eva pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:809_13: tena saṃsāro 'navasthaḥ / tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:809_14: yadīdaṃ na pāpam / kasya dharmasya viparītaṃ puṇyamityucyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:809_15: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:810_0: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte /
SA16hvsatssu:810_1: prāṇadānena pāpamiti / tadayuktam / kasmāt / avaśyaṃ cittabalena puṇyapratyayena puṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:810_2: na tu cittamātreṇa / yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:810_3: tena kiṃ puṇyaṃ labhyeta / pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:810_11: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:811_1: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:811_4: na tu tisṛṣu gatiṣu, iti jñātavyaṃ tatra pāpaṃ tīvraduḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:811_10: tataḥ punaḥ kṣayo 'bhūt / yāvaddaśavarṣeṣu manuṣyeṣu dhṛtatailasitopalāśālicolayavādayaḥ sarve 'pi tirohitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:811_12: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:812_0: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam /
SA16hvsatssu:812_1: prāṇātipātaviratitvāt / saṃkṣipyedamucyate sattvānāṃ sarvāṇi sukhopakaraṇāni prāṇātipātaviratisamutpannānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:812_4: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti /
SA16hvsatssu:813_2: (u) te na sujanāḥ / sujanaḥ sadā parasya hitārthī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:813_8: ato jñāyate 'kuśalamiti / (pṛ) vimuktilābhī anyadapi vikālabhojanādi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:813_9: idamapyakuśalaṃ bhavet / (u) idaṃ pāpaheturiti sujanāḥ pariharantyapi /
SA16hvsatssu:813_10: yo dharmo 'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:813_12: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato 'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:813_16: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:813_17: yaḥ prāṇātipātavirataḥ sa bahūnāṃ [SSS_237] janānāṃ priyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:814_1: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:814_3: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:814_7: sa kathaṃ priyo bhavet / akuśalacārī ātmana evāpriyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:814_8: kaḥ punarvādo 'nyeṣām / ato jñāyate prāṇihiṃsākuśaladharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:814_9: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:814_12: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:814_13: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:814_14: rājaśāsanaviruddhatvādeṣām / yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:814_15: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:814_16: yo vadhānācarati / tasya maraṇakāle cittaṃ paritapati /
SA16hvsatssu:814_17: ato jñāyate 'kuśalamiti / vadhādyācaraṇāt na janānāṃ śraddheyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:814_20: kaḥ punarvādo 'nyajanaiḥ / hiṃsādyācārī caṇḍālasūnakavyādhādivat sajjanaiḥ dūrataḥ parityajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:814_22: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:814_24: yadi nākuśalam / kasmāt guṇāya viratiṃ sampratyeṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:814_25: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:814_27: yadi hiṃsādayo nākuśalāḥ / ko dharmaḥ punarakuśalaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:815_1: tadā dehapoṣaṇaṃ na syāt / kasmāt / na hyasti ahiṃsāsambhavakālaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:815_2: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:815_8: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:815_9: evaṃ steyādāvapi / (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:815_10: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne 'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:815_11: tathā vedhanādirapi syāt / jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:815_12: (u) nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yuktaḥ / viṣeṇa kāyahiṃsanānmaraṇam / [SSS_238] puṇyantu cittagatam /
SA16hvsatssu:815_13: kimatra dṛṣṭānto bhavet / vahnivedhanādirapi prabodhe 'sati na duḥkhajanakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:815_14: ato na sa dṛṣṭānto yujyate / asati vijñāne na khedaṃ budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:815_15: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:815_16: sati tu citte sidhyati / sa dṛṣṭāntastathā syāt / hetau sati pāpam / asati tu nāsti / karmaṇāṃ cittabalātpuṇyapāpavibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:815_20: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:815_22: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:816_1: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:816_2: tadā na vimucyeta / pāpiṣṭhānāṃ mokṣābhāvāt / yadi hetovasatyapi puṇyapāpamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:816_4: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:816_6: tattu na yujyate / hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:816_7: yadi vinā cittaṃ karmāsti / tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:816_9: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:816_11: dvitīyaḥ steyaharaṇāya / tṛtīyo bhāvaśamanāya / [teṣāṃ] kāyakarmaṇi samāne 'pi kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtavibhāgaścittagata iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:816_14: taduttaravipākamityādi / yadi cittena vinā puṇyapāpaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:816_15: kathamayaṃ vibhāgo bhavet / yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:816_16: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:816_18: tattu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate na cittavyatiriktaṃ puṇyapāpamastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:817_0: tīrthikā vadanti- upavāsasthaṇḍilaśayanaśalākāvedhādibhirjalapatanadahanapraveśa [SSS_239] bhṛgupatanādibhiśca duḥkhapratyayaiḥ puṇyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:817_1: tatra prājñā dūṣayanti / tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:817_3: pataṅgā dahanapraviṣṭāḥ / mīnanakrā jalāvasathāḥ / ajavarāhāśvādayaḥ sadā purīṣakṣetraśāyinaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:817_4: te 'pi puṇyaṃ labheran / te pratibrūvanti / avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena /
SA16hvsatssu:817_9: nārakādīnāmapi puṇyaṃ syāt / ityevaṃ doṣo 'sti / [iti] / yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:817_10: tadā sujano na syāt / kasmāt / caturṣu iryāpatheṣu sadā sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:817_11: tattu na sambhavati / hetāvasati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:817_12: sujanmakṣetrañca na labhet / sadā pāpakattvāt / vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:818_3: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi /
SA16hvsatssu:818_4: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:818_6: tena svarga utpadyeran iti / puṇyacittena hananātpuṇyamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:818_7: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:818_13: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:818_14: kena sa pāpaṃ labheta / yaḥ sahetu anyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:818_16: sa puṇyaṃ labheta / kasyacidannaṃ prayacchati / anne cājīrṇe puruṣo mriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:818_17: tata pāpaṃ prāpnuyāt / yadi vinā hetuṃ puṇyapāpe staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:818_21: pṛṣṭhatāḍanādirapyevam / ato jñāyate karmāṇi cittādhīnāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:818_24: yaḥ [SSS_240] prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam /
SA16hvsatssu:818_25: kasmāt / na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:818_26: ato nāsti rūpāsaṅgadoṣaḥ / tathā śabdādāvapi / yadyanutpannamithyāsaṃjño 'pi pāpavān /
SA16hvsatssu:818_28: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:819_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / yaḥ svakāyaṃ paripālayanpuṇyaṃ karmācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:819_7: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:819_11: na tasya bhavetpāpam / anabhimukhīkṛtya durvacasā paranindane na bhavetpāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:819_13: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:819_14: kiṃ punarhīyate / na sa pāpabhāk syāt / kaścidātmānaṃ nindati / kaścidātmānaṃ hanti / kaścitsvayaṃ mithyācarati / kaścicca pāpaṃ labhate / ataḥ kuśalākuśalalakṣaṇaṃ na parānugrahānanugrahamātreṇa bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:820_5: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:820_11: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:820_14: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan,
SA16hvsatssu:820_15: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:820_17: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:820_18: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:820_19: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:820_20: tathedamapi / yadbravīṣi vandanādayo na parānugrāhakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:820_21: tadayuktam / kasmāt / vandanādibhiḥ parasya nānāhitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:820_23: ayameva [parā]nugrahaḥ / tenānye 'pi janāḥ satkāraśikṣānanusarantaḥ puṇyaguṇaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:820_30: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:820_32: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:820_34: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:820_37: tathā śikṣayatha yūyam / na siṃhena śvādaya upasevyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:821_0: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:821_2: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:821_3: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:821_4: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:821_5: na mahāsamudramudvelayati / na ca mahāgnirdahati / nāpi caṇḍavāta utplāvayati / idaṃ sarvaṃ karuṇāvipākabalam /
SA16hvsatssu:821_6: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi sarve lokāḥ karuṇācittamācaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:821_10: yaccaityadhanamapaharati / tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:821_11: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:822_2: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet /
SA16hvsatssu:822_3: ataḥ pāpaṃ labhate / yaduktaṃ duṣṭacitta[mātra]mutpādya kāyavākkarmākurvato na bhavetpāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:822_5: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:822_7: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:822_9: tadayuktama / yadi svadehaṃ duḥkhayan pāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:822_11: kasmāt / janā hi caturṣviryāpatheṣu svadehaṃ duḥkhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:822_12: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:822_14: na hyetadyujyate / ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:822_15: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:823_0: avyākṛtaṃ karmeti / yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:823_2: (u) tatkarma nirucyate / yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:823_6: idantu durbalam / yathā pūtibījaṃ nāṅkuraṃ prarohayati /
SA16hvsatssu:823_8: avyākṛtantvavipākam / (pṛ) tatra na priya nāpriyopādānaṃ tadavyākṛtavipākamastu /
SA16hvsatssu:823_9: ko doṣaḥ / (u) bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:826_0: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:826_4: aparaṃ tadasaṅgṛhītam / yathā kaśādaṇḍādhātabandhanasvadāragamanādayaḥ akuśalakarmapathapūrvottaraduṣkarmāṇi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:826_7: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:826_8: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:826_9: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:826_13: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:826_16: tasyāpi dvaividhyam / yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati /
SA16hvsatssu:827_5: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:827_7: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:828_0: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:828_3: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:828_4: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā [SSS_244] vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:828_6: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:831_5: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam /
SA16hvsatssu:832_3: kecit vācāpi gṛhṇanti / anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:833_1: teṣāṃ ko bhedaḥ / (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:833_6: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni /
SA16hvsatssu:834_1: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:834_4: nāsti ca kāyavākkarma / (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ- sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:834_7: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:834_11: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:834_12: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:834_14: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_1: kānīmāni / (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:837_4: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:837_8: ato na yujyate / (u) sarve ca kāmadhātukadharmāḥ kāmadhātukakarmavipākā eva /
SA16hvsatssu:837_9: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_10: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:837_11: yadi sarvaṃ karmavipākaḥ / kaḥ punaḥ prayāse guṇaḥ / yasya [SSS_246] kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_13: tadayuktam / tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_15: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:837_22: yathā brīhibhyo brīhayaḥ / evaṃ vipākādvipākotpattau ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:837_24: sarpādināṃ kopaḥ, tatsarvaṃ pūrvakarmavipāka iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:838_4: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:838_6: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:838_13: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:838_14: ato nāsti vimukterdoṣaḥ / kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:838_15: yadi nāsti karmamūlaṃ, kathamutpadyeta / dharmāṇāmutpāde 'sti pratiniyatamaṅgam /
SA16hvsatssu:838_17: yadi nāsti karmamūlaṃ, kathamevaṃ pratiniyatavibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:839_0: (pṛ) dharmā hetumātrajāḥ / yathā māṣānmāṣa utpadyate / [evaṃ sati] ko doṣaḥ / (u) tadapi karmamūlakam / māṣakarmapratyayalābhānmāṣānmāṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:839_1: kenedaṃ jñāyate / purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta /
SA16hvsatssu:839_2: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:839_5: sarvasattvānāṃ sādhāraṇakarmavipāko yaduta [SSS_247] caṅkramaṇāsthānakarmapratyayalābhāt kṣityādayo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:839_6: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:839_8: saṃskṛto 'nāsravaḥ katham / (u) so 'pi karmamūlakaḥ / kasmāt / sarvaṃ pūrvādhvagatadānaśīlādivalādhīnam /
SA16hvsatssu:839_11: tattu na sambhavati / uktaṃ hi sūtre- asti aprasaṃyuktā vedeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:840_2: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:840_6: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ nākuśalā / (pṛ) tatra mithyādṛṣṭiravyākṛtā natvakuśalā /
SA16hvsatssu:840_7: (u) nāvyākṛtā / kenaitat jñāyate / uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:840_9: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:840_12: lakṣaṇasāmyāt / yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam /
SA16hvsatssu:840_13: asmāllokāduttārayāma iti / idaṃ manovāgakuśalaṃ rūpadhātau samutpannam /
SA16hvsatssu:840_14: anye 'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:840_21: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:841_7: iti / (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:841_9: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:841_10: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:842_0: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:842_1: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:842_2: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:842_4: kasmānna kucalaṃ cittam / sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti /
SA16hvsatssu:842_6: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:842_7: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:842_9: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti /
SA16hvsatssu:845_2: kimidam / yadetatkāyābhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma etatkāya eva [SSS_249] vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:845_7: (u) sthānadvaye vedyate / samanantarāntarābhavikaṃ karma upapadyavipākasthāne vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:845_10: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca /
SA16hvsatssu:845_14: kasmāt / tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:845_21: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:845_22: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra /
SA16hvsatssu:846_1: (u) kecidāhuḥ- vyādhyarthakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharma eva vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:846_2: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:846_4: yathā pañcānantaryādīni / yadartha guru ca tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:846_5: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma /
SA16hvsatssu:846_6: kecidāhuḥ- trividhakarmaṇāmeṣāṃ yathāpraṇidhānaṃ vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:846_8: tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam / yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:846_12: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:846_13: (u) na / krameṇaiva vedyate / yathā bījātkrameṇāṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:847_1: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u) te sacetanāścet karmopacinvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:847_3: (pṛ) yo 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:847_7: tatkarma kasmānnopacinoti / (u) yasmāt sattvacittaḥ tasmāt karmāṇyupacinoti /
SA16hvsatssu:847_10: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:847_11: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:848_1: (u) nopacinvanti / kasmāt / sūtre hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:849_1: (u) sarvatra triṣvapi dhātuṣu (pṛ) aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:849_2: (u) asti / yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:850_1: tasya ka upakāro bhavati / (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:850_2: kasmāt / paśyāmaḥ khalu kecidakuśalacāriṇo 'pi prabhūtaṃ sukhamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:850_3: kuśalacāriṇo duḥkham / udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:851_0: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:851_1: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:851_2: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:851_3: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:852_2: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:852_4: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:855_6: yadi vedanā bhavati / tadā sukhavipākaṃ vedayate / na duḥkhavipākam ityādi / tathānyat dvayamapi / (pṛ) tāni karmāṇi rūpavipākaprāpakānyapi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:855_9: vedanaiva vastuto vipākaḥ / rūpādi tu tatsādhanam / vedanāpratyayeṣu vedaneti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:855_11: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti /
SA16hvsatssu:855_12: yathā cānnaṃ dhanam ityādi / (pṛ) kāmadhātumārabhya yāvattṛtīyadhyānaṃ kimaduḥkhāsukhavedanāvipāko labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:857_1: yadi daurmanasyaṃ vipākaḥ / tadā laghuḥ syāt vipākaḥ / ato na vipākaḥ / daurmanasyaṃ vitarāgāṇāṃ vyāvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:857_4: ucyate / daurmanasyaṃ saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata ityato na vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:857_7: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:857_10: kasmāt / taddhi mūḍhānāṃ vidyate / na tu jñāninām / ato duḥśśodhaṃ paramasantāpakarañca /
SA16hvsatssu:859_0: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati /
SA16hvsatssu:859_1: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:859_8: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga]duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:859_10: mūḍhā nityadaurmanasyāḥ / kasmāt / te hi priyavirahavipriyasamāgamaprārthitālabhādimattvāt nityadaurmanasyapīḍitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:860_1: dvitīyaṃ daurmanasyāt / tadā priyavastu praṇaśyati tadā saumanasyajaṃ [daurmanasyam] /
SA16hvsatssu:860_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān [SSS_253] prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti /
SA16hvsatssu:860_3: uktañca- devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:860_4: iti / idaṃ saumanasyādutpannam / daurmanasyādutpannamiti yat vipriyavastusamutpannam /
SA16hvsatssu:860_8: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:861_0: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:861_2: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:861_3: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:865_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trīṇyāvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:865_1: kānīmāni / (u) karmāṇi kleśā vipākāśca vimuktimārgamāvṛṇvantīti āvaraṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:865_2: (pṛ) kimityāvṛṇvanti / (u) dānaśīlakuśalābhyāsastriṣu bhaveṣu parivartayatīti sa mārgamāvṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:865_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade 'vatarati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:865_5: idaṃ karmāvaraṇam / yat kasyacitkleśā ghanāstīvrāścittagatāḥ tat kleśāvaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:865_6: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:865_7: tadapi kleśāvaraṇam / yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:866_1: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:866_2: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:866_4: ataḥ parivrājako na dadyāt / nūtnakarmaṇā mārgapratibandhāt /
SA16hvsatssu:866_5: (u) na yuktamidam / nānyakṛtasya puṇyaṃ pāpamātmano bhāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:866_8: yadi nāsti sattvaḥ / kasya vadhaḥ syāt / tathā ca mṛtena pāpinā bhāvyam /
SA16hvsatssu:866_12: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:866_13: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:866_14: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:866_15: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:866_16: na tat vastuto yujyate / ataḥ pratyayānāṃ na syātpuṇyapāpavattā /
SA16hvsatssu:867_5: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām /
SA16hvsatssu:867_7: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān /
SA16hvsatssu:867_9: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:867_10: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:867_18: tat śīlavato bhāgaḥ syāt / ataḥ puṇyārthī punaḥ prāṇinaṃ hanyāt,
SA16hvsatssu:868_7: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:868_8: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:868_9: nāpi prayaccheyuḥ / idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:868_10: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:868_11: [SSS_255] yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:868_12: yadi putraḥ pāpaṃ karoti / tadā pitarau bhāginau syātām /
SA16hvsatssu:868_13: tadā na putramutpādayetām / vaidyaścikitsamāno 'pi pāpabhāk syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:868_16: tadā devaḥ pāpabhāk syāt / duṣṭasattvānāṃ poṣaṇaparitrāṇakaratvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:868_17: annadātāpi pāpabhāg syāt / bhokturannamajīrṇaṃ kadācinmaraṇāya bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:868_18: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:868_19: tathā ca dātā, tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:869_0: (pṛ) nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:869_1: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:869_2: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:869_6: bandhye 'lpam / evaṃ puṇyakṣetrasya sāravattve dānavipāko mahān /
SA16hvsatssu:869_7: vandhye puṇyamalpam / na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:869_8: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:869_10: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:870_1: avaśyaṃ kāmāsaktam / ataḥ pravrajito na dānamācaret [tasya] /
SA16hvsatssu:870_2: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:870_3: na vastutastatsambhavati / ato dānamapi nopekṣyam / tribhavānāṃ kṛte kebalaṃ nācaret /
SA16hvsatssu:870_4: nirvāṇāya paramācaret / kintu kleśānakuśalakarmāṇi ca varjayet /
SA16hvsatssu:870_5: kasmāt / tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:870_7: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:871_3: (pṛ) kiṃ nivartyaṃ bhavati / (u) sarvaṃ hāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA16hvsatssu:874_6: kāni tāni / (u) asti karma kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:874_7: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:874_8: anyatra ca savyābādhye 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:874_10: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:874_12: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:875_0: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:875_1: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:875_8: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca /
SA16hvsatssu:875_9: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:875_10: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati /
SA16hvsatssu:875_12: gurutaraṃ vā tāḍayati / tena na bhavati sukhāntaramapi /
SA16hvsatssu:876_0: śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karmeti / yaḥ kaścidekāntataḥ kuśalānyupacinoti /
SA16hvsatssu:876_2: nānyattadatiśete / na kṛṣṇavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayataḥ śuklavipākasya prasaṅgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:876_7: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:877_1: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:877_3: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:877_5: kathamayamarthaḥ syāt / (u) bhagavān svayamavocadeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:877_9: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:877_10: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:877_11: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:877_14: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:877_15: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:877_18: mitho virodhāt / na saptadaśaśaikṣacetanāmātraṃ caturthaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:878_3: asmādatiśayitamaśuklasya, tadanapekṣatvāt / yathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ suviśuddhātikrāntadevamānuṣacakṣuḥ sampat /
SA16hvsatssu:878_8: tattvaduṣṭam / nirvāṇañca na śuklam / atastatkarmāśuklamiti vācyam /
SA16hvsatssu:878_11: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:881_1: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:881_2: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:881_3: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:881_7: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:881_10: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:882_1: tadā narake patati / yadi dve trīṇi vā karoti / tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:882_5: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:882_8: nedaṃ pūrvavat / yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:882_9: idamapi gurutaram / (pṛ) yaḥ prākṛtajanabhedyaḥ, nāyamāryaḥ / [tadbhedaḥ] kimiti gurutaraṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:883_3: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:886_2: kathamidam / (u) samāttabahvalpatvavaśātsaṃvaraṃ labhate nāvaśyaṃ pañcamātrāṇi gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:887_6: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:890_5: (pṛ) kānīmāni / (u) narakavedanīyavipākaṃ karmeti [SSS_260] yathā ṣaṭpādābhidharme lokaprajñaptau vistṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:890_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:891_2: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_3: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_9: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_12: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / āryeṣu yo 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_13: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / akuśalaṃ karma kurvato 'kuśalaṃ karmopacīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:891_14: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_15: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / yo vidveṣavyāpādacittena pāpakaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_16: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / yo ghanārthaṃ [pāpaṃ] karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_17: sa vipākāntaraṃ vedayate / mithyādṛṣṭicittenākuśalaṃ karma kurvato narakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_20: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_22: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_26: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_30: ajñānādakāryaṃ kuryāt / kāryañca na kuryāt / avācyaṃ vadet / vācyañca na vadet / ananusmaraṇīyamanusmaret / anusmaraṇīyañca [SSS_261] nānusmaret /
SA16hvsatssu:891_33: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:891_34: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:891_35: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / yathādhamarṇo na rājānaṃ śaraṇīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_40: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_42: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:891_43: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_51: gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_52: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:891_53: tasya narakaṃ bhavati / yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_56: yathā rāṣṭrapālā bahavo vijñāḥ pūrṇādivadakuśalamithyācāramācarantonyānyapi bahūn śikṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_57: yacca kṛtaṃ karma bhūyasā sattvānāṃ byābādhāya bhavati yathā vanadāhādi /
SA16hvsatssu:891_58: bahūnāṃ śāsanaṃ yena adharme te patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:891_59: yathā kedāravyādhādayaḥ / yo 'kuśalakarmaṇā jīvati yathā corāmātyasūnikavyādhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:892_1: karoti sa tathātmānaṃ yathainaṃ icchanti dviṣaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:893_0: avastu kupyati / anena kopena yatpāpaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:893_1: tannarakāya bhavati / yastu savastu kupyasti / tatkṛtaṃ pāpaṃ na tādṛśaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:893_2: yo dveṣeṇa karma karoti / asya gurusaṃyojanatvānnarakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:893_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ pāpīyānapi sunigraha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:893_5: yat hetupratyayaiḥ pāpaṃ karma karoti tadaṇīyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:893_6: yaḥ pramādāya vyutsṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtamaśubhaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:893_7: yo vijñaiḥ paripālito bhavati sa deveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:893_11: [SSS_262] śāriputraprabhāsvaramāhātmyamavalokyācintayat ayaṃ mahātmā na hantavya iti viśuddhacittena saptakṛtvaḥ śāriputramūrdhvamadho vyavālokayat /
SA16hvsatssu:893_15: yathā cāṅgulimālaḥ pāpakaṃ karma bahukṛtvā mātara[mapi]hantumaicchat /
SA16hvsatssu:893_16: bhagavān tatkuśalābhijñatvāt tasya vimuktiṃ prāpayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:893_19: evamādayaḥ puruṣāḥ akuśalakarmakā api na narake patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:893_20: ata uktaṃ yaḥ pramādāya vyusṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma narakāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:894_3: yaḥ kuśalaṃ kartumagaṇayan mriyamāṇo durutpādakuśalacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:894_6: sa pūrvākuśalahetukaṃ mithyādṛṣṭi pratyayañca narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:894_10: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāvocat- yān sattvān paśyatha kāyikamithyācārān vācikamithyācārān mānasikamithyācārān tān jānīta narakaprekṣakāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:895_3: sa tataḥ tiryakṣu patati / anuśayasaṃyojanautkaṭyācca tiryakṣu patati /
SA16hvsatssu:895_15: yathā kaścitkarmavipākamajñātvā śraddhayā ca nānāvākkarma tathā karoti yathā vadanti ayaṃ puruṣo markaṭavadaticapala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:896_2: śvabukkavadbhāṣate / ajavarāhavaddhāvati / gardabhavacchabdāyate / uṣṭravat yāti / hastivadātmānamunnamayati / mattabalīvardavadaśubhayati /
