SA16hvsatssu:896_3: caṭakavadyabhati / viḍālavatsārajyati / śṛgālavadvañcayati / kṛṣṇorabhravajjaḍo bhavati / govat droṇabahulo bhavati / evamādyakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karma kṛtvā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:896_6: yo nāgagaruḍādīnāṃ śaktibalaṃ śrutvā praṇidadhāti sa tatrotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:896_7: uktañca sūtre- yo nibiḍasthāne mriyamāṇaḥ praṇidadhāti vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:896_8: sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate / yaḥ paritarṣito mriyate sa jalārthitayā jaleṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:897_0: vyomāhāt laghu karmāṇi kurvan vyāmiśrakuśalatvāt makṣikālīkṣākṛmikīṭādiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:897_1: yaḥ parānupadiśan asaddharme pātayati so 'vidvatpada utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:897_2: andho jāyate / mṛtvā ca śave kṛmirbhavati / vyāmiśrakarmācaraṇācca tiryakṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:898_4: kasmātsa pāpabhāgbhavati / (u) ayaṃ kadaryo yadi kaścidyācanāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:898_6: sa kṛpaṇaḥ yācanāṃ kurvati kasmiṃścit nāstīti vadan anṛtavāditvātpreteṣu patati /
SA16hvsatssu:898_9: ataḥ preteṣu patati / kadaryo 'yaṃ dānacāriṇaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dānapatiṃ dvipyati /
SA16hvsatssu:898_11: cirādārabhya kadaryacittavāsanayā na svayaṃ dadāti paramapi niṣedhati /
SA16hvsatssu:898_12: yatkiñcidasti vihāre saṅghadravyaṃ yajñe ca brāhmaṇadravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:898_13: [SSS_264] tat kaścit svayaṃ kevalamabhilaṣati na parasya dātumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:898_14: ataḥ preteṣu patati / yaḥ parasyānnapānamapaharati nāśayati vā /
SA16hvsatssu:898_16: yo dānapuṇyavigataḥ sa tadupapattyāyatane vipākālābhī tato yācakādhikṣepakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ tatraivānubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:898_17: ayaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārditaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdayacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:899_13: mṛṣāvāde sadā paribhāṣyate / paiśunye kulapāṃsulaḥ / pāruṣye sadā paruṣaśabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:899_17: mithyādṛṣṭau mohabahulaḥ / māne 'varajanmā / ātmana unmāne kharvaḥ / īrṣyāyāmate[ja]svī / mātsarye dāridryapīḍitaḥ / dveṣe virūpī bhavati / parapīḍāyāṃ vyādhibahulaḥ / vyāmiśracittena dāne 'madhurarasābhilāṣī /
SA16hvsatssu:899_18: akāladāne na yatheṣṭabhāk / paścāttāpavimatau paryantabhūmau jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:900_3: te manuṣyeṣūtpadyante / yaḥ pitroḥ pūjyānāñca satkāre svabhiruciko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:900_5: so 'pi manuṣyeṣūtpadyate / manuṣyeṣu ca yo viśuddhakarmapratyayaḥ sa uttara[kuruṣū]tpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:900_7: sa uttarāsūtpadyate / yaḥ śuklakarma samyagācaran parānapīḍayitvā dhanamādatte dānāya nābhiṣvaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:900_8: svayañca śīlamācaran na pūrvāparaparivāreṣu śīlaṃ bhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:900_9: sa uttarakuruṣūtpadyate / tataḥ kiñcidūnakuśalo godānīya utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:901_3: manuṣyeṣūktavat praṇidhānahetunā ca viśrutadeveṣu sukhavedanāpratyayaṃ kṛtakuśalakarmakāḥ sarve tatra janmagatiṃ praṇidadhati /
SA16hvsatssu:901_4: yathoktaṃ- aṣṭapuṇyasargasthāne yaḥ karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu viharati sa utpadyate brahmaloke yāvadbhavāgram /
SA16hvsatssu:901_8: yasya samyak prahīṇāni sa viśuddhataraprabho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:901_12: sa ārūpyasthāna utpadyate / evamādi devavipākaṃ karmākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:902_1: idaṃ karma narakeṣu preteṣu tiryakṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:902_2: (pṛ) anyāsu catasṛṣu gatiṣu kuśalakarmavipāko vedayituṃ śakyate /

SA16hvsatssu:931_0: navavidhaṃ karma- kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma trividhaṃ vijñaptiravijñaptirnavijñapti nāvijñaptiriti /

SA16hvsatssu:946_8: yadi rāgo madhyamo 'varo vā na sa karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:946_9: rāgo 'yamadhimātraḥ paramadhirajya saṃpīḍecchayā sopāyaḥ kāyikavācikakarmotpādakatvāt rāgerṣyā karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:946_10: pratighamohāvapi tathā / yadi moha eva sarvakleśātmaka ucyata iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:947_1: (u) asti [sa]mohaviśeṣaḥ / kasmāt / na hi sarvo moho 'kuśalaḥ / yo moho mithyādṛṣṭipravṛttāvadhipatiḥ so 'kuśalaḥ karmapathaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:947_3: yadi [vā] kaściddhanalābhāyākuśalaṃ karma karoti tadyathā suvarṇakārṣāpaṇāya prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:947_4: dveṣeṇa vā [akuśalaṃ karma karoti] tadyathā amitraṃ coraṃ vā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:947_5: atha vā na dhanalābhāya na dveṣeṇa,
SA16hvsatssu:947_6: api tu mohabalenaiva parāparāvijñānāt prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:947_7: (pṛ) catvāro durgatipratyayāḥ sūtra uktā [SSS_277] rāgato dveṣato bhayato mohataśca durgatiṣu patantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:947_9: (u) bhayaṃ mohasaṅgṛhītam / yaducyate bhayata iti tanmohata eva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:947_10: kasmāt / na jñānī yāvadāyurvināśapratyayamapi akuśalaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:948_0: yat kleśavivṛddhiḥ kāyikavācikarmotpādayati sa kālo 'kuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:948_3: (u) mana eva karma / tatra caratīti karmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:948_5: ādyasaptake paścāccarati / trīṇi karmapathāḥ na karma / sapta karmāṇi karma ca panthāśca /
SA16hvsatssu:948_10: nāpi paropadravakṛta / paropadravakṛditi svīkāre 'pi na surāpānaṃ tadbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:949_5: (pṛ) āryāḥ kimakuśalaṃ karma kuvanti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:949_8: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- śaikṣā anyān śapamānā āhuḥ samucchinnavṛṣaṇo bhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:949_10: ayaṃ kṣīṇāsrava puruṣaḥ prahīṇakleśamūlaḥ cittameva notpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:949_11: kiṃ puna śapeta iti / śaikṣasya śāpavacanamapi tathaiva syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:949_13: kathaṃ kuryurakuśalam / na ca te durgatau patanti / yadyakuśalamutpādayanti / pateyurapi / yadyāryā ihādhvani akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā durgatau na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:949_15: (u) āryāṇāṃ manasi tattvajñāne samutpanne sarve 'kuśalakarmapathā mandā bhavanti yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:950_1: trīṇi ca viṣāṇi dvividhāni- durgatiprāpakāṇi tadaprāpakāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:950_7: te ca tīkṣṇaprajñāvidyā akuśalaṃ karma kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:950_9: teṣāṃ santi bahava upāyāḥ / kadācid buddhān smṛtvā kadācitkaruṇāṃ smṛtvā kuśalakarmahetubhi[rvā] akuśalebhyo vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:950_12: yathā gauḥ svāminaṃ yāti / vihaga ākāśaṃ niśrayate / dīrgharātraṃ kuśaladharmāṇāmabhyāsānna durgatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:950_13: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nityaṃ kāyena śīlaṃ cittena prajñāmabhyasyati sa narakavedanīyaṃ karmābhimukhībhūya laghu vedayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:951_1: gurukarmāṇi sarvāṇi na kiñcidupayanti ca // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:952_2: āryāṇāṃ kuśalaṃ karma sudūragāmi khadira vṛkṣamūlavat /
SA16hvsatssu:952_4: alpamakuśalaṃ bahukuśaleṣu vartamānaṃ na balavat yathā gaṅgāyāṃ kṣiptamekapalalavaṇaṃ na vikārayati tadrasam /
SA16hvsatssu:952_9: yathāryāḥ satyapi pāpe na narakaṃ praviśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:952_10: yathā vyāghraśārdūlajāśvavarāhānāṃ(ṇāṃ) saha vivadamānānāṃ baliṣṭho jayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:952_16: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅka iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:952_19: śākhāniveśitavṛttaghaṭavat / dvividhasaṃyojanasamanvāgamāddhi durgatau patito yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:952_21: te sadā kuśalakarmavipākaṃ samādadata ityato [SSS_279] durgatikakarmāṇi nāvakāśaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:952_22: yathā pūrvaṃ ṣaṭkarmavarge pratipāditaṃ naraka[vedanīyaṃ] karmalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:955_3: viratirnāma karmapathaḥ / sāvijñaptireva / (pṛ) vandanādīni puṇyāni anye karmapathāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:955_5: (u) viratiprādhānyāt / imāni daśa karmāṇi dānādibhya utkṛṣṭāni /
SA16hvsatssu:955_6: kasmāt / dānādinā labdhaḥ puṇyavipāko na śīladhāraṇasya [tulā]marhati /
SA16hvsatssu:958_3: yadi manuṣyeṣūtpadyate / alpāyu rvindate / yāvadevaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / akuśakarmapratyayaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:958_5: sattvānāṃ vidyamānāḥ sarvā akuśalaparābhavahānipīḍā akuśalaiḥ [karmabhi]reva bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:958_7: yathā sainikavyādhādayo nānena karmaṇā bahumānaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:958_8: coravadhapratyayaṃ dhanabhānaṃ labhata iti yat bhavata āśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:958_19: akuśalacārī tamasastamaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pravṛttimārgatritayānna niryāṇaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:958_25: kiñcākuśalacārī svakāyaṃ kāmayannapi na vastutaḥ svātmānaṃ kāmayate /
SA16hvsatssu:958_28: puruṣo 'yaṃ kāyasaṅgataḥ tadyathāmitracoreṇa [saṅgataḥ] svātmana eva duḥkhakārakatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:958_30: kiṃ punaḥ paraḥ / akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:958_33: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:958_34: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati /
SA16hvsatssu:958_38: asukharato mūḍhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ / akuśalacāriṇo duḥkhaṃ gāḍhaśocanīyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:958_41: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:958_43: sarvamakuśalaṃ mohotthitam / ato vidvān nānusmaret / uktañca sūtre- pramādaḥ śatruvatkuśaladharmān hanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:958_44: ato nānusmaret / kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:958_45: ato na kurvīta / paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:961_0: triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ- kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma,
SA16hvsatssu:961_1: vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:961_3: na mānasaṃ karmeti / kasmāt / kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:961_6: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_11: na tu prayacchati / na tasyāsti dānapuṇyam / nāpi praṇidhānamātreṇa vastu pariniṣpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:961_13: na tu dadāti / tasya nāsti saṅghadānapuṇyam /
SA16hvsatssu:961_14: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:961_18: kasmānnāstyāpattiḥ / yadi cittamutpādayituḥ puṇyaṃ labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:961_19: tadā puṇyaṃ sulabhaṃ syāt / ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:961_20: tathā cedakṣīṇapuṇyaḥ syāt / yathā kaścid vṛthā cittamātramutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_21: nātyantaṃ vyāpriyate / [tadā] kasya kṣayaḥ / dhanaṃ parimitamityataḥ puṇya[mapi] kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:961_23: apakaroti vā / yathā tarṣito bubhukṣitaḥ sattvaḥ pānamāhāramabhilaṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_25: cittaṃ laghu calaṃ durdamamityato 'kuśalākaraṇaṃ na kiñcit /
SA16hvsatssu:961_26: tadā gurvī hāniṃ vinderan / ye puṇyacikīrṣayā kuśalacittamutpādayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:961_27: te mahālābhamevāpnuyuḥ / idantu atyantaṃ duṣṭam / yadi mānasaṃ karma mahattaram,
SA16hvsatssu:961_32: uktañca sūtre- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma audārikam /
SA16hvsatssu:961_33: ataḥ pūrvaṃ prajahyāt / audārikakleśaprahāṇāccittaṃ samādhīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:961_38: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:961_39: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_40: yatpūrvamuktaṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ [SSS_282] prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate yaduta sattvasattā,
SA16hvsatssu:961_41: sattvasattājñānaṃ, jighatsācittaṃ tajjīvitoccheda iti caturbhirvastubhiḥ pāpaṃ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_43: yathā cāha bhagavān- yo bālaka ājanma karuṇāmabhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:961_44: sa kimakuśalaṃ karmotpādayituṃ śankoti akuśalaṃ karma cetayate vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:961_45: ato jñāyate kāyikaṃ karmaivotpādayati na mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:962_0: atrocyate / yat bhavānāha- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na mānasam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:963_0: cittaṃ dharmasya vai mūlaṃ cittaṃ prabhuśca kiṅkaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:963_1: śubhāśubhaṃ tatsmarati vacanaṃ caraṇañca tat // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:964_3: vinā cittaṃ nāsti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:964_4: sūtre vacanācca vijñaptikarma kṛtvā niyamena vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:964_7: karuṇā ca mānasaṃ karma / sūtramāha- karuṇācittaṃ vipākaprāpakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:964_8: yathāha sūtram- purāhaṃ saptavarṣāṇi karuṇāsamudācaraṇānneemaṃ lokaṃ saptamahākalpān pratinivartāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:964_13: yathā kuśalacārī āyuṣo 'nte mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayan narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:964_17: āha- yo lokottarāṃ samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati sa varṣaśatasahasyāṇi saṃsāre saṃsarannapi na durgatau patati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:964_19: yathoktamupālisūtre- tīrthiko maharṣiḥ [āgatya vadet] ekena manodaṇḍena nālandaṃ bhasmīkaromīti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:964_22: yathoktaṃ [SSS_283] sūtre- yo 'yamatra mṛtaḥ sa eva narakaṃ praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:964_29: yanmanasā kāyaṃ vācañca niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā carati tatkāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:964_31: na tu vinā mānasaṃ karma kāyikasya vācikasya vā vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:964_32: ato jñāyate mānasaṃ karma gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikam /
SA16hvsatssu:965_0: yadbhavatoktaṃ kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt yathā pañcānantaryāṇi kāyaṃ vāca[ñcopādāya] kriyanta ityato gurutarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:965_1: tanna yujyate / yasmāt cetanā gurvī vastu ca guru tasmātkarma guru /
SA16hvsatssu:965_2: na kāyavacasī guruṇī iti / cittanaiyatyātkarma niyamena satyam /
SA16hvsatssu:965_3: yathā cittabalamātreṇa saddharmapadaṃ praviśati tathā cittabalenaiva cānantaryapāpaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:966_0: uktaṃ bhavatā kāye vāk ca karma vastu niṣpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:966_1: tanna yuktam / karmasamāpanaṃ niṣpattiḥ / parasyāyurapaharan prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:966_4: na kāyavacasī / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vṛthācittotpādamātreṇa nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:966_5: tadayuktam / yathoktaṃ sūtre- dṛḍhacittamutpādya tadaiva deveṣūtpadyate narake vādhaḥ patati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:966_7: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- nāpi praṇidhānamātreṇa vastu sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:966_11: yathāha bhagavān- santi vividhāni pāpāni kāyikavācikamānasapāpānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:966_13: asaṃyojanamātraṃ śīlam, durdharatvāt / audārikaṃ pāpaṃ śīladhāraṇena vārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:967_0: yaduktaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ pāpañca sulabhaṃ syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:967_1: tadayuktam / cittabalasya tanutvāt janāḥ sulabhaṃ tyaktvā durlabhaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:967_2: yathā karuṇācittādi, tatpuṇyamatimātrabahulam / na tu dānaṃ [tathā] / sattvā avarajñānabalāḥ karuṇādi mānasaṃ karma carituṃ na samarthā ityato [SSS_284] dānādi kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:967_5: tatpratibrūmaḥ / sa yadi bodhibalayuktaḥ tadā akṣīṇaṃ kuśaladharmaṃ labhetaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:967_6: yaduktaṃ mānasaṃ karma na kasyacidupakaroti apakaroti vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:967_7: tanna yujyate / kāyikavācikarmāṇi mānasakarmaṇāhṛtānīti na pradhānāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:967_11: yathā kalpādau taṇḍulāni svayamutpadyante puruṣāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuḥkāle prāpte tatsarvaṃ nābhūta /
SA16hvsatssu:967_21: kadācitkaruṇāmātreṇa / karuṇāvihāriṇaḥ sattvā yadi kāyaṃ spṛśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:967_23: sarvathā nivṛtiṃ labhante / jñātavyaṃ karuṇāpuṇyaṃ dānādibhya uttamamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:968_5: yadi mano na viśuddham / śīlamapi na viśuddhyati / yathedaṃ saptābrahmacaryasūtra uktam /
SA16hvsatssu:968_7: yathāha sūtrama- śīlavrataḥ prāṇihitaṃ mano 'nuyāyi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:968_8: yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā iti / śīlaviśuddhau ca cittaṃ praśāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:968_10: ataḥ pūrvaṃ prajahātīti / tadayuktam / sūkṣmakuśalena mahāvipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:968_14: tasya śīlamapi aviśuddham / puṇyapāpayorbhede labdhe saṃyojanaśīladharmayorbhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:968_15: yaduktaṃ tvayā- utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma kāyavāgbhyāṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:968_16: tat sāmānyataḥ pratyuktaṃ yaduta kāyikavācikakarmadharmabhede mānasakarmadharmabhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:968_17: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ vijñāpayitrā sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:968_18: yathā caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ siddhaṃ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ na mānasakarma vinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:968_19: laukikāḥ satvā vadanti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmākuśalaṃ na tathā mānasamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:968_20: [SSS_285] mānasaṃ karma ca na janeṣūpaprayujyate nāpyupalabhyate 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:968_22: tallakṣaṇatvānmānasaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:971_2: kāyo duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ / atastaṃ nirodhayet / etatkāyaniroddhukāmena tatkarma prahātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:972_1: kasmāt / kecidāhuḥ- kāyaḥ prakṛtita utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:972_5: ato vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate karmata utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:972_8: padārthā nānāviprakīrṇajātaya iti jñātavyaṃ heturapi bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:972_9: yathā paśyāmaḥ alakasandukakodravādīnāṃ bhedaḥ tadbījamasamaṃ jñāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:972_12: kiñca sajjanāḥ śraddhadhante yat karmopādāya kāya upādīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:972_16: yadi karmopādāya śarīramupādīyate tadā tat nivartanīyam /
SA16hvsatssu:972_21: īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇatve tu na nivartayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:972_22: īśvarādīnāmaprahātavyatvāt / ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_1: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ padārthāḥ karmasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_5: ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyate na maheśvarādibhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_6: laukikāḥ svayaṃ jānanti padārthāḥ karmahetasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_10: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_11: janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto 'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:973_14: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_22: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_24: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:973_26: durgatiṣūtpannā bahavaḥ, sugatiṣūtpannā alpāḥ / cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu vadhādyakuśalacāriṇo bahavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:973_30: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:973_32: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_33: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:973_37: na tadā kāya upādīyate / ato jñāyate karma tasya mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_42: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:973_47: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo 'ṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:973_48: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:973_49: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate /
SA16hvsatssu:973_50: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:976_0: śāstramāha- uktāni karmāṇi / kleśā idānīṃ vakṣyante / malinacittasamudācāraḥ kleśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:976_1: (pṛ) kiṃ malamucyate / (u) yat saṃsārasantānasya pravartakaṃ tanmalinacittamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:976_4: pāpadharma ityapi, parihāṇidharmaḥ tirobhāvadharma paritapanadharma anupatanadharma ityādināmnāpyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:977_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:977_4: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:978_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:978_2: kiñcāha- aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:978_3: yathoktaṃ devatāpraśne- kiṃ nandati putraiḥ putravān /
SA16hvsatssu:979_1: atrocyate / rāgo nandyaṅgam / yathoktaṃ sūtre- vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:979_4: nandikṣayādrāgakṣaya iti / ato jñātavyaṃ rāgaḥ prītyaṅgamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:979_5: idaṃ tvanavadyam / kena tat jñāyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- samudayasatyaṃ yaduta tarṣaṇaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:979_6: kasyābhidhānaṃ tarṣaṇam / yat punarbhavalipsā / kiṃlakṣaṇamidaṃ tarṣaṇam / yat rāgaṃ niśritya vividhalipsā /
SA16hvsatssu:980_0: (pṛ) yadi tarṣaṇamapi nandiḥ, rāgo 'pi nandiḥ kasmāducyate rāgaṃ niśrityeti /
SA16hvsatssu:980_1: (u) ādyotpannaṃ tarṣaṇam / vivṛddho rāgaḥ / atastaṃ niśrityetyucyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- nandisambandho loka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:980_2: ato nandireva rāgaḥ / uktañca sūtre- nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve 'kuśalā dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:980_3: tatra rāga eva nandiḥ / daurmanasyaṃ dveṣaḥ / yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:980_4: ato 'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:980_9: kena tat jñāyate / tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:980_10: na jānanti nirodhaṃ, na jānanti āsvādaṃ, na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:980_12: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato 'duḥkhāsukhavedanāyāṃ sadāvidyānuśayaṃ rvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:983_1: saptānuśayānāmaṅgaṃ dvidhā bhavati- kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:983_4: bhavo nāma janma / asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:983_5: na tu kāmarāgamātram / kecidāhuḥ- kāmarāgamātraṃ kleśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:983_8: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[āpi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:983_10: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:983_16: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:983_19: yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vāmārgeṇa jigamiṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:983_20: ayamakuśalarāga ityucyate / yat svadravyaṃ na tyaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:983_21: tatkārpaṇyam / kārpaṇyaṃ rāga eva / vastuto 'sati guṇe astīti vaktumanyapreraṇamakuśalarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:983_24: sā bahurāgatā / yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:984_0: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:984_2: ādya ādyātmikapratyayaḥ / aparo bāhyapratyayaḥ / ūrdhvadhātudvaye rāga ekāntenādhyātmikapratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:984_4: saṃsthānarāgaḥ, sparśarāgaḥ, iryāpathapralāparāgaḥ, sarvarāga iti / rūparasagandhaśabdasparśarāgaḥ pañcakāmaguṇarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:984_11: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:984_12: yathoktam- sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:984_14: lābhaṃ pratītya viniścayaḥ / idaṃ grāhyamidamagrāhyamiti yaccittanirdhāraṇaṃ sa viniścayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:984_19: parigraho nāma upādānam / upādānaṃ pratītya mātsaryam /
SA16hvsatssu:984_23: madhyamaḥ, uttamaḥ, adhamādhamaḥ, adhamamadhyamaḥ, adhamottamaḥ, madhyamādhamaḥ, madhyamamadhyamaḥ, madhyamottamaḥ, uttamādhamaḥ, uttamamadhyama, uttamottama iti / rāgasya cāsya laukikāṅgāni daśa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:984_24: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:986_2: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati] /
SA16hvsatssu:986_3: tadā kāmarāga utpadyate / cakṣuḥ śrotrādidvārāsaṃvaraṇe kāmarāga [SSS_292] utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:986_8: yathā śuddhaṃ vastra [mapagatakalaṅkaṃ] samyaṅ malena dūṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:986_16: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:986_17: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:986_19: tadā sūtpādo 'yaṃ bhavati / strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:986_24: tadā kāmarāga utpadyate / yaḥ pravṛttakāmarāgaḥ [tat]kṣāntiṃ vedayan na parityajati /
SA16hvsatssu:987_0: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:987_1: ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:987_2: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo 'bhyastaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:987_6: yathā pānauṣadhādiḥ / śubhān manohāriṇaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān yaduta supuṣpitasarārāmaprasannasnigdhavāpīkūpanavameghataṭitsurabhivātavyajanāni labdhavataḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:987_7: pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:987_10: pāpī tu aviśuddheṣu / jātitaśca kāmarāgo [SSS_293] bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:987_14: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:990_0: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:990_3: jñānī tu duḥkhaṃ paśyati / duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajahāti / kāmopādāne nāsti tṛptiḥ / yathā madyapānaṃ tatparitarṣaṇamanuvardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:990_8: vyāpāda[gato] laghupāpaḥ, vastutaḥ sa [tato 'pi] laghuttaraḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:990_9: kāmaḥ punarbhavasya hetuḥ / yathoktaṃ- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ yāvanmahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:990_12: kiñcāha- vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ [tāni] kāmahetukāni /
SA16hvsatssu:990_13: tṛṣṇāyāśca kāyo heturiti / kiñcāha- kabalīkāre [bhikṣava] āhāre 'sti nandi asti rāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:990_17: yathā stryādiṣu / strīṇāṃ kāyacittamaśuci śakṛnmṛtsu [vidyamāna]vṛścikavat daṣṭvā dūṣayati /
SA16hvsatssu:990_19: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yathā śvā raktaliptamasthikaṅkālaṃ svādayitvā [sva]lālāyogānmanyate yanmadhura[mida]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:990_20: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:990_24: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:991_0: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle 'pi duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:991_1: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:991_3: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu /
SA16hvsatssu:991_5: yathāha bhagavān- kāmatṛṣṇāyāḥ pañcādīnavāḥ- alpāsvādo bahuduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:992_0: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:992_5: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:992_6: evaṃ cakṣurna rūpabaddhaṃ, rūpañca na cakṣurbaddham, kāmarāgastu tatra baddhaḥ / imaṃ bandhamavalambayato na vimuktirlabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:992_7: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pūrvā koṭirna [prajñāyate] avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:992_8: api coktaṃ sūtre- rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:993_1: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:993_2: kiñca sattvāścittapramodena kāmarāge pravartante yāvanmaśakapipīlikā[daya]ḥ sarve 'pi āhāramaithunayoḥ pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:993_3: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:993_8: rāgātsaṅgacchante / yathā śuṣkāḥ sikatāḥ salilayoge saṃyujyante /
SA16hvsatssu:993_10: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:993_11: asati rāge nāsvādaḥ / āsvāde 'sati saṃsāramāśu prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:993_13: kasmāt / yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante /
SA16hvsatssu:993_14: tasmāt vimuktirasukham / [yat] rāgāṅgaprahāṇaṃ tadeva sukhaṃ pariṇamati /
SA16hvsatssu:993_15: yathoktaṃ- yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:993_16: kiñcāha- yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:994_2: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:994_5: nāvavādamādatte / nādīnavaṃ paśyati / nāpi puṇyapāpamālocayati / unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:994_8: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:995_6: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so 'yaṃ tarati vai tadā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:997_0: kāmarāgasyedṛśā doṣāḥ santi / kathaṃ jñāyate kāmarāgiṇo lakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:997_1: (u) kāmarāgabahulaḥ strīrūpakusumagandhamālanṛttavādyagīteṣu pramudito veśyāgṛhapānagoṣṭhīgāmī mahāsamājanāṭakarasikaḥ sānurāgālāpānanditaḥ sadā paritoṣitacittaḥ prasannavadanaḥ sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ punarvyādhitacapalagātraḥ svadehādhyāsakta ityevamādi rāgabahulasya lakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:997_6: yathoktaṃ- rūpasukhino [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:997_8: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1000_4: kathamidam / (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā paryādīryate sarvo 'smimānaḥ paryādīryate samuddhanyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_6: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_7: tasyāyaṃ rāgaḥ prahīyate / yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_14: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_16: bhagavān mahābhiṣak / sabrahmacāriṇo 'nucarāḥ / saddharma auṣadham / ātmanā [SSS_298] yathoktavadācaraṇaṃ virecanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1000_18: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1001_0: (pṛ) yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubha[bhāvanayā] rāgaṃ nirvāpaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1001_1: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1001_4: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1001_5: aśubhayā audariko rāgo 'panīyata itīdaṃ bahūnāṃ jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_5: gurutaro dveṣa ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_7: madhyamadveṣa ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī [paraṃ] parihartuṃ necchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_10: adhamadveṣa ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī sadākliṣṭacittaḥ [sa]mrakṣa ityabhidhīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_11: avipakvendriya ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī cittagatamakuśalamatyaktvā punarvipākāyecchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_12: [sa] upanāha ityucyate / vipakvendriya ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai[rna] tyaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_13: yathā siṃho nadīṃ vigāhya [SSS_299] tattīranimittaṃ gṛhītvā āmaraṇaṃ na [tato] vinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_14: [sa] pradāśa ityucyate / āgraha ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_15: iyamīrṣyatyucyate / kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_16: [ayaṃ] saṃrambha ityucyate / roṣakalaha ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo 'pi punaḥ pratilomayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_17: ayaṃ dveṣa ityākhyāyate / krauryamityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_18: iyamakṣāntirityucyate / akṣametyarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_19: iyamapakīrtirityucyate / anāttamanaskatetyarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī sahavāsiṣu sadādhikṣepalolupo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_21: adānta ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1004_23: upāyāsasparśa ityarthaḥ / kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1005_0: dveṣo 'yaṃ dvividhaḥ- kadācitsattvamupādāya bhavati kadācidasattvamupādāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_3: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_4: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_5: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_6: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_8: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:1006_11: tadvirodhe dveṣa utpadyate / ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1007_1: (pṛ) dveṣasya ke doṣāḥ / (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1007_2: ataḥ suvimokaḥ / vastutastu durvimokaḥ / kintu rāgavanna ciraṃ cittamanuvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1007_3: dveṣo dvidhā santāpakaḥ / ādāvātmānaṃ santāpayati ante paraṃ santāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1007_10: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat /
SA16hvsatssu:1007_11: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro 'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1008_2: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo 'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:1009_5: (pṛ) kiṃ nāma kṣāntibalam / (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1009_10: nindāyāñca na nindāvipākaḥ / tāḍane ca na tāḍanavipākaḥ / yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1009_13: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1009_16: kasmāt / dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1009_19: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1009_20: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_2: (u) yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1010_5: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_7: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti,
SA16hvsatssu:1010_8: kasmāt dviṣāmi / yadi vastu satyaṃ / te puruṣāḥ svayameva mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ labheran /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_9: kasmādahaṃ dviṣāmīti / aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_12: kasmād dviṣyāmīti / yadi cāśubhanindāṃ śṛṇoti taddoṣamātmani bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_14: kāyaśca duḥkhabhājanam / ato nindānubhavitavyeti / kṣāntivihārī evaṃ cintayet padārthāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_18: kasmāt dviṣāmi / mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_20: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1010_22: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1010_26: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_0: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_1: kiṃ punastāḍananindāmiti / kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_2: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_3: kā punarnindā iti / idamācaran sadā saṃsārānnirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_4: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_5: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_6: so 'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā /
SA16hvsatssu:1011_8: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1015_3: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1016_5: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ- yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_2: yathābhūtavidyāyā abhāvāt / (u) maivam / tarupāṣāṇāni cācittakāni na pūrvāntādi vikalpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_3: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_5: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_7: na dharmāntaram / (u) maivam / yadyabhāvo 'vidyā / pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_12: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_16: [SSS_303] tathāvidyāpi / kusūlaṃ puruṣākāramapi puruṣagatyabhāvāt apuruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1017_17: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1018_7: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī,
SA16hvsatssu:1018_8: badhiro 'śabdaśroteti / viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1018_11: tadajñānam / mithyācittaṃ kleśaḥ / ayaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyayaḥ / arhataḥ samucchedānna santi avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1018_12: yadi na vidyā avidyeti / arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1018_13: yo 'vidyāvān na so 'rhan / [ato] jñātavyaṃ pṛthagasti avidyāsvarūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:1019_8: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1019_13: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1020_2: sarve dharmā akṣaṇikāḥ, nāsti punarbhavaḥ / śabda ātmā, sa ca nityaḥ, tṛṇavṛkṣādayaḥ sacetanā ityevamādimithyāgrahe sati avidyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1020_4: yaduta durmitrasaṃstavo 'saddharmaśravaṇaṃ mithyāmanaskāro mithyāsamudācāra [SSS_304] ityebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇairavidyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1020_8: evaṃ yatrāsti sattvakalpanā, tatrāvidyotpadyate / kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mithyāmanaskārapratyaye 'vidyotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1020_10: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1021_0: avidyāyāḥ ke doṣāḥ / (u) sarve vipattyupāyāsā avidyādhīnāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1021_2: tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma / tataḥ kāyānubhavaḥ / tatpratyayo vividhavipatyupāyāsānāṃ pratilābhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1021_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_1: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_2: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_9: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_10: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_11: sarvamiyamavidyā / asatāṃ mārgo 'kuśalahetuḥ / akuśalahetuḥ sarvo 'vidyā / [SSS_305] mithyādṛṣṭyā kṛtakarmaṇā bhūyasā narake patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1023_13: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1024_3: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1024_5: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1024_7: rāgādibhistu na tathā / rāgacitte nāsti krodhaḥ / krodhacitte nāsti rāgaḥ / avidyā tu sarvacitteṣu vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1024_10: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1024_15: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1025_2: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1025_3: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1025_4: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1025_5: caittā dharmā kṣaṇikāḥ, nimittagrahaṇādutpadyante / kṣaṇike rūpe mohānnimittaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1026_2: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho 'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:1026_3: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:1026_5: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1026_7: doṣaṃ doṣa iti na vijānāti / hitaṃ hitamiti na vijānāti / apariśuddho 'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe 'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_2: kasmātsūtra uktam- avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_4: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_8: kasmāducyate dvayamiti / (u) anyajñānasaṃjihīrṣayā / skandhadhātvāyatanādi bhāvayannapi avidyāṃ bhinatti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_11: ato dvayamityucyate / evaṃ rāgadveṣāvapi / laukikā bhūyasā ghaṭādipade bhrāntāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_12: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_13: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_14: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1027_15: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1028_0: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1028_1: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_2: iti / api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_4: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_5: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ [SSS_307] paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_6: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so 'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_9: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1029_10: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1032_1: ato 'nyaḥ punarasti na vā / (u) asti mānākhyaḥ / (pṛ) katamo mānaḥ / (u) mithyācittenātmana unnatirmāna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1032_2: māno 'yaṃbahuvidhaḥ / avara ātmani unnatirmānaḥ / sameṣu samatāmanyatāpi māna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1032_9: rūpavānātmā, ātmani rūpaṃ, rūpa ātmā iti darśanam, evaṃ yāvadvijñānamapi / iti viṃśatidhā pradarśanāt nimittapradarśanaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1032_11: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1032_12: na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskārā, na vijñānam, [nāpyanyatra vijñānādasmīti vadāmi] /
SA16hvsatssu:1032_13: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1033_3: (u) dhyānābhyāse 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1033_4: ato 'yaṃ māno bhavati / śrutacintāmayaprajñābalena ca sadā kalyāṇamitramupasadya [ta]tsamudācāravivekamabhirocayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_2: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_6: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_7: ataḥ samucchindyāt / kiñcādhimānī dharmasya mithyādarśane viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_8: ato nāsti tāttviko guṇaḥ / tadyathā vaṇik gabhīramahāsamudragato ratnābhāseṣvāsakto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_9: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1034_10: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1035_5: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato 'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_0: (pṛ) kathaṃ māna utpadyate / (u) skandhānāṃ paramārthalakṣaṇamajānānāṃ māna [SSS_309] utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_1: yathoktaṃsūtre- ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho 'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_2: sadṛśo ['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_3: evaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti / skandhānāṃ paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ jānatāṃ nāsti mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_6: tacchṛṅge gate na bhavati / kāyo 'śuciḥ navadvāreṣu malaprasrāvī /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_7: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_8: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve 'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1036_10: kathamutpādayenmānam / ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_11: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_14: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_15: kasmāt / śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1036_18: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_0: (pṛ) mānasya ke doṣāḥ / (u) mānātkāyo bhavati / kāyātsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_2: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_4: ahamiti nimitteṣu mahat / ato jñāyate mānātkāyo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_5: māno 'yaṃ mohabhāgīyaḥ / kasmāt / cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ahaṃ paśyāmītyāha /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_7: kasmāt / sarve lokā anityā duḥkhā anātmakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_8: kathamanena māno bhavati / ato rāgadveṣamohāḥ paramānītayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1037_12: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1038_1: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
SA16hvsatssu:1038_3: ato jñāninā nācaritavyāḥ / māno 'yaṃ sarvaguṇānāṃ vighaṭakatayā pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1041_0: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_0: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_1: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_2: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_3: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_4: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_6: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_7: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_8: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_9: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_11: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:1042_12: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:1043_0: atra brūmaḥ / sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1043_1: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1044_2: kasmāt / pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati [SSS_311] puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:1044_3: tadā mṛdādāvapi / dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1044_4: paścācchṛṇoti loke nāstīti / ataḥ saṃśayo bhavati / dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1044_11: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1044_12: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1045_6: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1045_12: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1045_14: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro 'nādirityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_0: (pṛ) vicikitsāyāḥ ke doṣāḥ / (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_1: kasmāt / sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_5: kiḥ punaḥ śālisasyādīni / [SSS_312] evaṃ cittaṃ vicikitsāprasṛṣṭamasadvastunyeva samādadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_7: kiñcāha bhagavān- vicikitsā nāma tamaso rāśiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_8: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_11: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_13: tadyathāha- aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_14: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_16: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_17: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1046_18: kasmāt / vicikitsābahulo naikāgracitto yathākālaṃ pāṇibhyāṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1047_0: (pṛ) nāstīyaṃ vicikitsā / kasmāt / vicikikitsā nāma caitasikadharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1047_1: caitasikāśca kṣaṇikāḥ / san na vicikitsā / asan api na vicikitsā / naikaṃ cittaṃ sat asaditi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1047_2: ato nāstīti jñāyate / (u) nāhaṃ vadāmi kṣaṇikeṣvasti vicikitseti /
SA16hvsatssu:1047_4: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1047_6: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1048_4: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_0: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_2: na tatrāsti doṣaḥ / tathātmāpi / skandhavyatirikta ātmāstīti brūvatastu doṣaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_4: tathāpīdaṃ duṣṭam / kasmāt / tīrthikā hi vadanti- ātmā nityaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_6: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_8: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_9: ityayaṃ doṣaḥ / ātmagrahaśca duṣṭaḥ / kasmāt / ātmabuddhau hi ātmīya [buddhi]rasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_10: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_17: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_20: yo na vivecayati / ko 'vakrāmati śūnya[tāyā]m / ātmadarśīnirvāṇabhīta ātmā na bhaviṣyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_21: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1052_23: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante /
SA16hvsatssu:1053_1: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1054_1: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1054_2: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1054_3: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1054_4: yadyanitya ātmā / tadā nāsti paralokaḥ / svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1054_9: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1055_2: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1055_3: na tu hetunā / hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
SA16hvsatssu:1055_6: yathā ghaṭādinimittam / ata ātmabuddhirutpadyate / sarvavedanāskandheṣu ātmabuddhirutpadyate na tu vedanāyām /
SA16hvsatssu:1055_9: vyāmohādātmamatirutpadyate / tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1056_0: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān /
SA16hvsatssu:1057_4: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1058_8: cetanāpi audārikī / cetanāyāmasyāmatītāyāmapi [tat] vijñānavānātmeti buddheriti jānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1058_15: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1059_1: (u) asti ca / yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadyāha kaścit yaccakṣurayamātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1059_2: tanna yujyate / kasmāt / cakṣurutpannavināśi / yadi cakṣurayamātmā / tadā ātmā utpannavināśī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1059_4: yadyucyate cakṣurātmeti / śrotrādayo nātmā syuḥ / tattu na [SSS_316] yujyate / yadi śrotrādayaḥ punarā[tmā] /
SA16hvsatssu:1059_5: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1059_6: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1060_0: (pṛ) nāstyātmeti yadvacanam / sāpi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / kathamidam / (u) asti satyadvayam / paramārthato 'styātmeti yadvacanaṃ sā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1060_2: lokasatyato 'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1060_3: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito 'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1060_5: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] /
SA16hvsatssu:1060_12: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_0: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_2: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_3: ime sarve mohajāḥ / kasmāt / ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_5: yadi nāstīti vadet / tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_6: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_15: saṃvṛtyāstīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato [SSS_317] nāstīti vacanamapekṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_16: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_17: iti / ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_19: asti tu saṃvṛtita iti / mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam- yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_20: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1061_22: vyañjanameva nānā / kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_23: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_24: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_25: yāvadavidyāyāḥ iti / ato jñāyate paramārthato na jarāmaraṇādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_28: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_32: hetupratyayānāmanirodhāt / yathā vṛkṣaḥ paraśunā chinno bhasmasātkṛtaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_34: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_35: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
SA16hvsatssu:1061_37: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_38: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1061_39: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1064_0: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1064_1: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1064_2: kasmāt / dṛṣṭaṃ khalu pratyakṣaṃ [yat] bāhyaṃ vastu samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1064_9: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ] yannāstīti sa ucchedavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_0: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_3: uktañca sūtre- ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni nirudhyante santyanyānīti śāśvatavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_5: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_6: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram- puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ jīvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_8: kiñcāha- kṣureṇa ca krakacena prāṇino hatvā [eka]māṃsapuṃñca kuryāt nāsti [tato nidānaṃ]pāpaṃ [nāsti pāpasyāgama] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1065_10: asti paralokaḥ yaḥ kārakaḥ sa eva vedaka iti yadvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_2: (u) yena hetunā bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_3: yena hetunā na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānamucchedadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_11: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ [yathā] kṣīṇāsravo 'rhan kāyasya bhedā [ducchetsyati vinaṃkṣyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_18: kasmāt / dharmāṇāṃ santatyotpādaṃ paśyata ucchedadṛṣṭi rnirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_22: ato jñāyate nocchedo na śāśvata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_23: kāyādanya upalabhyata ityato naikaḥ kāyena bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_25: pañcaskandhāḥ punaḥ santanyanta ityataḥ sattvo jāyate mriyata iti vaktameva na prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_26: santānena pravṛttatvādanya iti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_28: [SSS_320] ime skandhāste skandhāścānya ityabhidhānāt śāśvatavādo na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1066_29: svasantānapratyayabalena pravartata ityata ucchedavādo na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_0: vastutaḥ satsu dharmeṣu nāstīti cittotpādanaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_1: yathā vadanti na santi catussatyāni trīṇi ratnānītyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_3: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ, nāsti hutaṃ, nāstisukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_5: nāsti mātā nāsti pitā, na santi sattvā aupapātikāḥ, na santi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ samyaggatāḥ samyak pratipannā ya imaṃ lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtya pravedayanti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamitthatvāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_7: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_11: sukṛtaduṣkṛtakarmaṇāṃ [phalaṃ] vipākaḥ ihalokaśubhāśubhakīrtyādiḥ devakāyādayaḥ pāralauke vipākaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_12: ayaṃ loka iti vartamānaḥ / paraloka iti anāgataḥ / mātā pitā janakau / sattva aupapātika iti asmāllokātparalokagantā /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_13: arhanniti kṣīṇāsravaḥ / yadidaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_14: sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ jñānadarśanamajñānadarśanam- idaṃ sarvamahetukam /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_15: nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryam / nāsti ca teṣāṃ phalamityādi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_16: saṃkṣipyedaṃ brūmaḥ- yadviparyayacittaṃ sarvaṃ tanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_17: tadyathā anitye nityasaṃjñā, duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā, aśucau śucisaṃjñā, anātmani [SSS_321] ātmasaṃjñā anutkṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭasaṃjñā,
SA16hvsatssu:1069_20: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñā, bhāve cābhāvasaṃjñā ityevamādīni viparyayacittāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1069_21: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā[stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_4: na hi duḥkhavedako 'stīti / laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_5: yadi vā vadanti īśvarādihetukā na tṛṣṇāhetukā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_6: idaṃ nāsti samudaya iti / yena hetunā vadanti nāsti nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_8: idaṃ nāsti nirvāṇamiti / asati nirvāṇamārge kena prāpyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_10: idaṃ nāsti mārga iti / nāsti buddha iti / te vadanti dharmā apramāṇāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_12: atha vā manyante buddhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pūjyo nāsti puruṣa ityato nāsti [sa] buddha iti draṣṭavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_14: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_18: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_21: tasya kiṃ phalamasti / nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ, nāsti ca sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ [phalaṃ] vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_22: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_24: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1070_26: nāstyayaṃ loka iti / avayavaśaḥ pravibhajyamānā dharmā atyantābhāvatāṃ pratigacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_27: nāsti paro loka iti / maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_28: nāsti mātā pitā / te 'pyavayavaśaḥ pravibhajyamānāḥ prakṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_33: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1070_34: na sattvā aupapātikā iti / sattvadharmābhāvādayaṃ loka eva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1071_2: yadi kāyātmakaḥ / tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno 'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1071_3: hūyamāno bhasma bhavati / krimibhuktaḥ purīṣaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1071_4: ato nāstyaupapātikaḥ / akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1071_5: yadi cittātmakaḥ, tadā caittadharmaḥ / caittadharmaśca pratikṣaṇamutpattivināśī,
SA16hvsatssu:1071_6: na sthāyī / kimuta paradehaṃ prāpnuyāt / yadi cittavyatiriktaḥ tadā nātmamatiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_0: nāstyarhanniti / sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_2: tāpe śītaṃ prārthayate / ninditaḥ kupyati / satkṛtastṛpyati / ato nāsti kṣīṇāsravaḥ / sūtre kecidvadanti- nāstyarhanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_4: saṃkleśa iti / kāya eva saṃkleśaḥ / ato vadantyakāraṇamiti / jñānadarśanamajñānadarśanamapyevam /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_6: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_8: paśyāmaśca sarvān sattvān karmakāraṇatantrān na svatantrān /
SA16hvsatssu:1072_9: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ [nāsti] ca tatphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1073_0: anitye nityasaṃjñeti / yena kāraṇena kṣaṇika[vādaḥ] khaṇḍyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1073_2: vadanti ca dharmā nirudhyamānāḥ punaḥ paramāṇavo bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1073_6: āhuśca jīvo nityaḥ / śabdo 'pi nitya iti / ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1074_0: duḥkhe sukha[saṃjñe]ti / yena kāraṇena vadanti asti sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1074_3: aśucau śucisaṃjñeti / kāye 'bhyāsaṅgāt cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā śucisaṃjñāmutpādayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1074_6: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_0: anātmani ātmasaṃjñeti / skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_5: brahmā svayamāha- ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_6: kecidāhuḥ- yadi kaścitpañcakāmānāṃ sukhavedanāsampannaḥ ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_7: kecitpunarāhuḥ - yadi kaścidviraktaḥ prathamadhyāna[mārabhya]yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_11: utkṛṣṭe cānutkṛṣṭasaṃjñeti / sarveṣu sattveṣu buddhaḥ paramapūjyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_12: kecittasmin anutkṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādya vadanti- ayaṃ kṣatriyaḥ alpakālikaśikṣāmārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_13: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya[vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:1075_14: tadutkṛṣṭamiti na vadanti / santi saṅghe catuṣkoṭikāḥ pudgalā ityato 'nutkṛṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1076_3: śīladhāraṇa brahmacaryamātra āsajya devapūjādayaśca [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1076_6: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1077_0: bhāve 'bhāvasaṃjñeti / yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo 'pi abhāva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1077_1: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_1: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_2: sa āha- nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_3: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_4: kiṃ punaranāgatāni / evaṃ dūṣitasukṛtaduṣkṛtaḥ pumān samucchinnakuśalamūla ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_5: sa niyatamavīcau patiṣyati / yathoktaṃ ṣaṭpādābhidharme- krimipipīlikāhananaṃ puruṣahananād gurutaram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_6: sa mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ puruṣaḥ lokadūṣakaḥ satvānāṃ bhūyasāpakārāya pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_8: tena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ karma sarvamaśubhavipākāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mithyādṛṣṭikasya [bhikṣavaḥ] puruṣapudgalasya yatkāyakarma yathādṛṣṭisamāttaṃ samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma.
SA16hvsatssu:1079_10: .......yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_11: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat tiktakatvāya kaṭukatvāya asātatvāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_13: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya [SSS_325] amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya] saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079_15: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1080_1: asya puruṣapudgalasya nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtamityato na yataḥ kutaścitprativiratiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1080_4: yaśca vadati nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ veti sa sadā citte 'kuśalameva kāṅkṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:1080_7: nā[pi] saddharmaṃ śṛṇoti / tasya duṣkṛtacittaṃ sūtthānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1080_8: sukṛtacittaṃ durutpādam / duṣkṛtasya sūtthānatvātsukṛtasya kāraṇameva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_2: tathā ca pudgalo madhyamadeśa utpanna iṣṭāniṣṭavivekāya ṣaḍindriyasampanno 'pi na mārgapratilābhapravaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_7: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_8: na ca sa pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_11: kasmāt / samucchinnakuśalamūlasya hi yadā kuśalaṃ na pravartate tadanantaraṃ narakānnaiva vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_12: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:1081_15: evamayamapi / anyakuśalarahitatvādyāvad buddhā api na cikitsante /
SA16hvsatssu:1084_0: abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1085_1: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1085_2: tasya guṇañcātivakti / kasmāt / akuśale vastuni atyantakuśalasaṃjñāmutpādya vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1085_7: yathāndho ghaṭaśakale suvarṇasaṃjñāmutpādya cakṣuṣmatāṃ laghu hāsyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_0: yat kaścit bodhimupekṣamāṇaḥ snānādiśīlena viśuddhiprāptiṃ kāṅkṣate tat śīlavrataparāmarśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_5: (u) ye doṣā uktā dṛṣṭiparāmarśasya “nyūnaṃ vastu [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_7: yaduta śītoṣṇavedanā, bhasmabhūmitarukaṇṭakādiṣu śayanaṃ jalahradāgnipraveśo bhṛgupatanamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_11: sa tamasaḥ tamaḥ praviśati / yatastaṃ dharmaṃ samādadāno dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_12: ūrdhvamapi duḥkham / sa gurutaraṃ pāpañca vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1086_13: kasmāt / adharmaṃ dharmaṃ matvā saddharmaṃ vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_0: [ato] anācārādvirama / mā cara mithyāmārgam / kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_2: śatrurapi [SSS_327] na tathā pudgalaṃ glapayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_3: kasmāt / na hi śatrustathā pudgalaṃ paribhāvayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭayanugāmināṃ tīrthikācaritānāṃ nānāduḥśīlānāṃ nagnatānirlajjatābhasmarajaḥkāyatākeśolluñcchanādīnāṃ samādānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_7: sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_8: tat kasmāt / [ya] ekenānnadānapratyayena svarge janmalābhārho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1087_9: tasya puruṣasya mithyācāracāritvāt dānāya kāyajīvite satyapi na kiñcana hitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_10: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_11: [sā] kuhanā / lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_12: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_13: tannaimittikatā / yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti- tava pitā vyavasāyī tvantu neti /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_14: [tat] niṣpeṣikatā / yat dānena dānaṃ prārthayamāno vadati- idaṃ dānavastu amukātpatyantāllabdhamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_16: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_18: yat puruṣasya kāyasya jṛmbhaṇā adamanaṃ styānamiddhasya pratyayaḥ sā vijṛmbhikā /
SA16hvsatssu:1090_22: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_3: mānādikaṃ mohāṅgam / ato na pṛthagucyate / trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_4: na mānādi / sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāṃ maśakapipīlikāparyantānāmime trayaḥ kleśā eva cittavartinaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_5: naivaṃ madamānādiḥ / rāge sati dveṣo 'kuśalamūlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_7: mohastu dvayormūlam / kasmāt / yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_9: na tūktaṃ mānādijānīti / santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_10: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1093_11: yadyasti pṛthaṅ mānādiḥ / kasyāṃ vedanāyāmanuśayaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1094_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhavedanīyasparśaṃ labhamānasya bhavati prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1094_7: kasmāt / nahyayamārūpyadhātvāptānāṃ skandhānāṃ santānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1094_8: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1095_0: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme 'nuśerate ki vā sattve 'nuśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:1095_5: kasmāt tat jñāyate / yasya sattvasyāprahīṇaḥ so 'nuśayaḥ tasya so 'nuśayo 'nuśete /
SA16hvsatssu:1095_7: yadi dharme 'nuśayo 'sti / dharmāṇāṃ nityasattvādanuśayā nityānuśayāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1095_11: nedaṃ vastuto 'sti / tathārhanna syāt / anyeṣāṃ puruṣapudgalānāmanuśayo 'stīti [so] 'nuśayavān[syāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:1096_2: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vāprahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1096_7: ato jñāyate sattvamātre 'nuśayo na dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1097_2: kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyanuśayaḥ / [SSS_330] (u) pratyuktapūrvamidam- anuśayā dharmamupādāyotpannāḥ sattve 'nuśerata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1097_4: yadi sattveṣu nānuśayīran / kathametādṛśaḥ praśnaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1098_1: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1098_3: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1098_6: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1098_8: yathā vadanti- sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1098_11: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1099_3: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1099_4: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1102_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- traya āsravāḥ- kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1102_1: katame ime / (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1103_3: (pṛ) ime traya āsravāḥ; kathaṃ vadanti saptāsravā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1103_4: (u) vastuta āsravā dvividhāḥ satyadarśanaheyā [ye] āsravāṇāṃ mūlabhūtāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1103_7: te kleśā eva / bhagavānarthata āha- traya āsravāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1104_1: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho 'vidyaugha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1104_2: katama ime / (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1104_4: sarvā dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭayaughaḥ / avidyā avidyaughaḥ / (pṛ) ogheṣu kasmāt dṛṣṭyaughaḥ pṛthagucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1104_6: ata ogheṣu pṛthagucyate / cyutiṃ bahatīti oghaḥ / trīn bhavān badhnātīti bandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1105_6: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati- yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1106_0: (pṛ) catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1106_4: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1106_9: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1106_10: kecidāhuḥ- catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra 'thnantīti granthāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1107_0: (pṛ) pañca nīvaraṇāni- kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyakukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:1107_3: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1107_5: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1107_7: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_4: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_5: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_7: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_8: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_9: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_12: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya catvāro dharmāḥ pratyayāḥ- jñātivitarko janapadaḥvitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1108_14: imāni jananakāraṇāni / pratipakṣo 'pi samānaḥ / styānamiddhasya prajñā pratipakṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_16: nivāraṇamapi samānam / ime dve sāṃsargike nīvaraṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:1108_18: anīvaraṇāni vā bhavanti / kāmadhātvāptā akuśalā nīvaraṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1109_0: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1109_1: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt [SSS_333] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1109_2: asaṃsiddho narake patati / vicikitsā vairāgyasya vighnabhūtā /
SA16hvsatssu:1109_9: atikrame punarākṣipyate / anyāni trīṇi pṛthagjanatvaṃ nātikrāmanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1110_5: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām /
SA16hvsatssu:1110_6: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam /
SA16hvsatssu:1110_10: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1111_2: [tatra] āvāsamātsaryam- ahameva atra vasāmīti nānyān prayojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1111_5: lābhamātsaryamiti- ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1111_8: mānyān / anyān varṇayannapi mā māmatiricyatu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_3: ityayaṃ doṣakleśaḥ / sa vimukternaiva bhāgī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_4: kasmāt / sa sādhāraṇabhūtān dharmāneva na tyajati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_5: kaḥ punarvādaḥ [SSS_334] svīyān pañca skandhān tyajatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_10: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_12: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_13: āryagarbhācca parihīyate / triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_14: sajjanān dūrīkaroti / sajjanadūrīkaraṇādakuśalaṃ vinā na vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_21: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_23: gamanāyānucintayati / saṅghadeyaṃ gopayati / saṅghadeyeṣu ātmīyabuddhiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_26: pratigrahīturdānaṃ labhate / tadubhayaprahāṇāttasmin kule varcaḥ kuṭyāṃ bhūtatvāyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_27: lābhamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- sadā sambhārasambhavāya klamati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_30: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_32: ātmonnatyā parānavanamati / duryaśo 'ntardhāpayati iti / sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi- prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1112_33: pariṣadbhīrutā, bahujanavidveṣitā, sadā vyākulacittatā, ātmanaḥ sadaikākitā, avarakule janma ityevamādayo 'pramāṇāḥ pañcamātsaryāṇāṃ doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1113_0: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ- [ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate,
SA16hvsatssu:1113_1: dharme vicikitsate, śīle vicikitsate, śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate / yo bhikṣuḥ śāsturmahāpuruṣāṇāñca [SSS_335] varṇavādī,
SA16hvsatssu:1113_3: ayaṃ pañcamaḥ / śāstari vicikitsaka evaṃ cintayati- kiṃ śāstā mahān,
SA16hvsatssu:1113_4: kiṃ vā pūraṇādayaḥ iti / dharme vicikitsaka [evaṃ cintayati] kiṃ śāstuḥ pravacanamutkṛṣṭamuta vedasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1113_7: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti /
SA16hvsatssu:1113_8: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_3: sa ca bālo mūḍho 'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_4: ato vicikitsate / dharme ca nāsvādaṃ labhate / ataśca / vicikitsate / na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_6: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_8: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_9: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_10: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1114_11: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_0: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_8: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_9: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_12: [SSS_336] ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_13: pṛthagjanatā cāśraddheyā / asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1115_17: svaparahitañca karoti / saguṇeṣveva nābhiniviśate / kaḥ punarvādo 'kuśale dharme /
SA16hvsatssu:1116_1: (u) sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
SA16hvsatssu:1116_2: na kiñcillabhyam, aśubhena [pathā] mariṣyāmi, mahābhayārṇave patiṣyāmi, tadbhayasthāne na jñāsyāmyabhayasthānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1116_3: nāpi jñāsyāmi mārgaṃ, na dhyānasamādhīn lapsye, asakṛtkāyaduḥkhamanubhaviṣyāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1116_5: śatruḥ sadānusariṣyati, sarve mārgā vivṛtāḥ, durgateravimokṣaḥ, apramāṇadṛṣṭibhiḥ sadā vinibandhaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1116_7: anādiḥ saṃsāro nāntavān, akurvato na puṇyapāpapratilābhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1116_9: na saddharma karomi, naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1117_3: yathā vāvimukto vātajvaraḥ / yathā vā ṛṇī anudinamucchavasati /
SA16hvsatssu:1117_5: taptāyasaḥ kṛṣṇalakṣaṇam / yathā vā yavasyāḍkuraḥ / svayaṃdattadāsapatratvam / yathā vā praṇaṣṭasya vastunaḥ sākṣijanaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1117_8: yathā jvālā santanyate / evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1118_1: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1118_4: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1119_1: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1119_6: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1119_9: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1119_11: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_0: atrocyate / na yuktamidam / yaduktaṃ bālānāmasati rāge rāgānuśayo 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_4: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_9: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_10: tadapi aprahīṇānuśayatvāt / yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_13: virodhidharmapratilambhāt / yadbravīṣi- mārgaḥ kleśaiḥ saha naikakāliko 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1120_16: tadā arhantaḥ syuriti / prahīṇa[kleśo] 'rhan / teṣāntvaprahīṇa[kleśa]tvāt / yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1121_4: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1121_7: ādāne mithyājīvaḥ / vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1121_9: (pṛ) kena kuryājjīvitam / yathādharmabhikṣayā jīvet / na mithyājīvaṃ jīvet / kasmāt / aviśuddhacetasā saddharmaṃ praṇāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1121_10: mārgayogānavaṣṭambhāt / mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na [SSS_339] jīvanārtha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1124_0: tṛṣṇādīni navasaṃyojanāni / (pṛ) kasmād dṛṣṭiṣu dvidhā parāmarśa ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1124_3: tathāyamapi / evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1124_12: sa naihikaṃ sukhaṃ vindate, paratra ca mahadduḥkhamanubhavati /
