SA16hvsatssu:1124_19: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1125_2: tadṛṣṭiparāmarśasya balam / tadvalena ca saṃyojanāni dṛḍhāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1125_8: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1125_10: ato bhagavān vacanamāha / tatsaṃyojanadvayaṃ gurupāpakasya nidānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1126_3: durutsargañca bhavati / kasmāt / yaḥ kuśalacittaṃ nibhṛtaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1126_7: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1126_8: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śatrum / tatsaṃyojanadvayoḥ priyaviprayaniścitatvādatiduṣkaraḥ parityāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1129_3: (pṛ) daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1129_7: ato na yujyate / na ca san nyāyo bhavati / kenedaṃ jñāyate / [SSS_341] kiñcidakuśalacittakuśalaśraddhāsamanvitamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1129_9: tathā vīryādikamapi / ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1129_11: tadayuktam / yadā cittaṃ līnaṃ bhavati / tasmin samaye middhasamanvitaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1130_2: kathamidam / (u) tatrāpi santīrṣyādayaḥ / kenedaṃ jñāyate / sūtra uktam- mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu /
SA16hvsatssu:1130_5: uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1130_8: ......iti / ayaṃ pramādaḥ / ityādīni chidrāṇi santi / īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1131_0: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1131_6: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1132_0: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1132_10: kimidamakuśalam / (u) nedamakuśalam / kasmāt / varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1133_3: nandipūrvikā hi jātiḥ / āha ca- duḥkhasamudayastṛṣṇeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1133_9: evaṃ dveṣo 'pi / ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1134_6: nimittanirūpaṇā hi dṛṣṭiḥ / (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- īrṣyāmātsaryakaukṛtyamāyādayo bhāvanāheyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1134_7: kathamidam / (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:1134_8: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1134_14: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_0: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_1: (u) pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_5: kathamidam / [SSS_343] (u) sarve kleśā vastuto nirodhasatyadarśanakāle prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_10: pañcaskandhāḥ sanirodhāḥ, ātmā tvanirodhaḥ, mārga ātmadṛṣṭervirodhidharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_13: kasmāt / yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1135_16: hetau sati phalamasti / ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1135_20: idaṃ nirodhadarśanaheyam / anayā mārgo 'podyate- idaṃ mārgadarśanaheyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1136_3: (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya]trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1136_9: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1136_11: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1136_12: mātsaryasya rāgāṅgatvāt / evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_1: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye 'sarvatragānuśayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_2: kathamidam / (u) sarve sarvatragāḥ / kasmāt / sarveṣāṃ mithohetupratyayatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_6: yadi śṛṇoti duḥkhamiti, tadā vidviṣati / sa ca rāgo nirodhasatyālambanaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_14: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_16: kasmāt / rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano 'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_17: yathāha dīrghanakhasūtram- sarvaṃ kṣamata itīdaṃ saṃrāgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:1137_23: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_1: na pañcasu vijñāneṣu / kasmāt / ṣaṣṭhavijñānasya saṃjñopagatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_3: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_4: kasmāt / cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_5: tathā mānavicikitsādiṣvapi / (pṛ) sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_6: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_9: tathedamapi / manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:1138_10: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1141_0: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1141_5: kasmāt / sūtre bhagavānāha- tadyathā dakṣaḥ [SSS_345] karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi kṣīṇamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prajānāti idaṃ kṣīṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1141_6: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1141_7: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1142_0: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1142_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1142_3: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1142_5: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1143_4: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1143_8: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1143_9: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1143_11: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1144_3: kathamidam / (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1144_4: uktapūrvamidam yat nirodhadarśanapraheyāḥ [SSS_346] satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarve nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1144_5: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_4: evaṃ mārga[bhāvanayā]pi / kathamidam / (u) nirodhajñaḥ kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_5: ato bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate / (pṛ) [nanu] sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā srotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_10: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_15: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_17: akāyasvabhāva eva nirodhaḥ / yo rūpamakāyasvabhāvaṃ yāvadvijñānamakāyasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'tyantavisaṃyogabhāgbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1145_20: nānyopāyaiḥ / ato jñāyate 'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1146_12: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1146_13: yadā kleśān [SSS_347] prajahāti tadā mahāhitaṃ pratilabhante /
SA16hvsatssu:1146_17: kasmāt / kleśāḥ kāmanidānam / kleśānuyāyī kāyo bhavati / kāyānuyāyi duḥkham / ato duḥkhaviyogārthī kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya vīryamārabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:1149_6: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1149_7: no bhagavan iti / nāsti cānāsravaṃ karma / ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1149_8: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1149_9: śaikṣasya nāsti caryā / yathoktaṃ sūtre- śaikṣajanaḥ pratyāgataṃ nācarati,
SA16hvsatssu:1149_10: niruddhaṃ na karotīti / kriyālakṣaṇā hi caryā / caryaiva karmetyucyate / anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:1149_13: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_3: (u) na yukta[mida]m / kleśavāneva [SSS_348] [jāyate] yatra bhavalakṣaṇaṃ kvarodanādi jananakāle pratyakṣamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_4: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_5: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_9: kasmāt / na hi kaścinarakādau sukhaṃ kāmayeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_11: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_12: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_14: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1150_17: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1151_5: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1151_12: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1151_16: karmasaṃskārāḥ kṣetram / rāgatṛṣṇā salilam / avidyā avakiraṇam / ebhiḥ pratyayairāyatyāṃ kāyamupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1151_17: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1151_20: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1152_0: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1152_2: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1152_3: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1152_5: tathā dveṣādapi / ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1153_3: kleśāstu na tathā, aprajñaptito rūpādijanakāḥ / ato jñāyate kleśāḥ kāyapratyayā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1153_5: sarpādayo dveṣabahulāḥ, sūkarādayo mohabahulāḥ / jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1153_8: nedaṃ sambhavati / iti jñātavyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitahetunā bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1153_10: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1154_2: kasmāt / kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1154_3: sadā ca vimuktiheturahitaḥ / evañca na susthāne janma labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:1154_11: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1154_12: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1155_0: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1155_4: kasmāt / śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1155_7: hariṇāḥ śabdānu cāriṇaḥ / te sarve kāmāsaṅgānmriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1155_8: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1155_10: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1156_0: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1156_1: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_1: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_5: anātmabuddhau tu prajahāti / yathāha śāriputraḥ- viśuddhasaṃvara- pratilabdhamārgo mriyamāṇo 'bhinandati /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_6: tadyathā viṣakumbhe bhagne / ato [SSS_351] jñāyate kleśapratyayo 'yaṃ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_9: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_11: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_14: kasmāt / kāmatṛṣṇayā hi prārthayate / prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1157_20: upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1159_0: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1159_4: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1159_5: catasraḥ kāyavedanāḥ- kaścidātmaghātako na paraghātaka ityādayaścatasraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1159_8: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ- rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1159_11: vijñānakāle kleśābhāvāt / ato jñāyate kleśapratyayaḥ kāyo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1161_0: saṃsāro 'nādiḥ / kenedaṃ jñāyate / uktaṃ hi sūtre- karmapratyayāni cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:1161_1: karma tṛṣṇāhetukam / tṛṣṇā avidyāhetukā / avidyā ayoniśomanaskārahetukā /
SA16hvsatssu:1161_5: tattu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate kleśapratyayaḥ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1162_3: yaduta karmaṇaḥ / karmedaṃ kleśānāṃ hetuḥ / kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1163_1: eṣāṃ ka upayogaḥ / [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1163_9: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1163_13: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato 'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante /
SA16hvsatssu:1164_0: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1164_1: kasmāt / cakṣūrūpādayo hi na bandhā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1164_10: tadviparyaye bandhaḥ / ityādinā kleśādhīnaḥ kāyo bhavatīti pradarśitam /
SA16hvsatssu:1169_0: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:1170_0: (pṛ) katamā prajñaptiḥ / (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1171_1: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1172_0: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:1172_1: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1173_0: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1173_6: lokasatyasya ka upayogaḥ / (u) laukikāḥ sattvā lokasatyamupādāyopayojayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1173_7: kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathā citrito 'gnirityuktau janāḥ śraddadhante /
SA16hvsatssu:1173_8: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1173_10: lokaśca mayā vivadati / na [bhikṣavaḥ] dharmavādī [kenacilloke] vivadati /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_0: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_2: ato lokasatyamityucyate / satyadvaya ukte bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ suviśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_6: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_10: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_11: evaṃ jinaśāanamādāvagādhagabhīram- tadyathā mahāsamudraḥ kramaśo gabhīraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_12: ato lokasatyaṃ vadanti / yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_13: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_14: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_15: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_16: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1174_17: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1175_1: kasmāt / pañcaskandhāḥ santānena pravartanta iti nocchedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1175_2: kṣaṇikā iti na śāśvataḥ / śāśvatocchedavinirmukta iti madhyamā pratipat /
SA16hvsatssu:1175_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1175_4: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1175_5: ata ucyate lokasatyam / lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1176_2: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1176_8: iyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1176_9: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1176_10: na tadā doṣaḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
SA16hvsatssu:1177_0: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_2: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_4: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:1180_5: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_6: iti / ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_7: tadā mithyādṛṣṭirbhavati / pratilabdhaśunyatājñānastu nāsti mūlata āgatiriti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_9: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_10: yo 'yaṃ lokasatyato 'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1180_12: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_0: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_1: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_2: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_6: na sattvasya dūṣaṇam / yathā ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptyocyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_7: tatra na rūpādayo ghaṭāḥ / na rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭaḥ / evaṃ na rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ sattvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_12: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_13: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1181_14: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_0: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_2: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_17: kasmāt / yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_21: na tatrāsti rathaśabdaḥ / tathā ca rathakāraṇe nāsti rathadharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_28: na samādadhāti / yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_29: kaścidaśvakāyaṃ paśyāmīti / kaściccarma paśyāmīti / kaścidromāṇi vā paśyāmīti / kaścidvadati vīṇāśabdaṃ śṛṇomīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_40: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_41: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_42: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati /
SA16hvsatssu:1184_43: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_4: kasmāt / rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_11: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_19: rūpyata iti rūpalakṣaṇam / vedayata iti vedanālakṣaṇe puruṣa ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_20: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_29: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā /
SA16hvsatssu:1185_31: idaṃ prajñaptilakṣaṇam / rūpādi[sva]lakṣaṇaṃ nānyatragataṃ nāpi bahulakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_8: kasmāt / rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_10: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_11: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_12: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_13: (u) nedaṃ yuktam / rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_14: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_15: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_17: (pṛ) nirodhasatye 'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_18: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_19: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186_21: kasmāt / nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_1: yathā ghaṭādau / paramārthadharme tu na tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_4: yathā ghaṭādayaḥ / ataḥ kecidvadanti prajñaptisat caturmahābhūtasaṅgṛhītam /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_7: idaṃ prajñaptisat / yathā puruṣaḥ karotīti / puruṣasvabhāvaḥ karmasvabhāvaśca na paramārtha upalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_8: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_9: na paramārthasan / kasmāt / rūpādidharmāṇāṃ sākṣāddarśane na snehadveṣādisaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_11: ucchidyate vinaśyati ityādi, dāhyate [SSS_361] pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_14: kasmāt / prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_16: tat, guru laghu, dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ, mahadalpaṃ, ācāryaḥ antevāsī, pitā putraḥ ārya anārya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_17: paramārthastu nāpekṣikaḥ / kasmāt / rūpaṃ nānyapadārthamapekṣya śabdādīn sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1187_22: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:1188_3: nānātvaṃ, anirvacanīyatvaṃ, abhāva iti / ete catvāro vādāḥ sāvadyāḥ / ato jñāyate ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1189_2: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1189_4: ime catvāro vādā ayuktāḥ / ato jñāyate ghaṭaḥ prajñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1192_1: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1192_2: yadi ghaṭa ekaḥ, tadā na sambhavati / rūpādīni naikaikaṃ pṛthivīdhāturityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1192_6: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1192_7: tatsamavāyastu sādhayati / evaṃ rūpādīnyekaikaṃ na pṛthivīṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1192_8: tatsamavāyastu sādhayati / (u) na yujyate / kasmāt / tilakalāpaḥ prajñaptisan / ekatvādi tu paramārthadharme vicāryate /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_2: pṛthivī tu ekadharmaḥ / na catvāra ekaḥ syāt / yadi catvāra ekaḥ / eko 'pi catvāraḥ syāt / tattu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_3: laukikā vadanti- pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_4: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_5: anyadharmalakṣaṇenāvaśyaṃ pradarśyate- yathā amukasya puruṣasya kuṭīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_11: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_12: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_14: sa dṛṣṭāntastu na yuktaḥ / kasmāt / śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_17: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_18: yathā bhagavānāha- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1193_21: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam,
SA16hvsatssu:1193_23: tathāpi nāsti pṛthivī / bhavatāṃ sūtre uktaṃ- rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1194_2: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1195_1: kenedaṃ jñāyate / puruṣa evaṃ cintayati- pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1195_2: pṛthivīṃ rasayāmi, pṛthivīṃ spṛśāmi iti / yadi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:1195_3: na [SSS_363] syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1195_4: gandhādāvapyevam / vastutastu na rūpamātre pṛthivī jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1195_7: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1195_8: vanaṃ chindāmīti ca / guṇānāṃ sīmāni dravyāṇi anyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1195_9: tatra yadyasti kāraṇam / nānena sidhyati ekatvavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1196_1: tadapyayuktam / kasmāt / yathā pūrvamuktaṃ- śabdo rūpādivyatiriktaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ santānapravṛttaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1196_3: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1199_0: (pṛ) nānātvavāde ke doṣāḥ / (u) rūpādīn vihāya nāsti pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:1199_1: kasmāt / kena tat jñāyate / na hi rūparasagandhasparśān vihāya pṛthivībuddhirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1199_2: rūpādidharmeṣvevotpadyate / kasmāt / yathā anyat rūpaṃ anye śabdādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1199_7: ato nāsti pṛthivī pṛthak / (pṛ) nānyadharmamanapekṣya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_1: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_3: kena tat jñāyate / cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā jānīmo 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_4: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_7: ghrāṇenāpi mṛta jighryate / rasanayāpi mṛt rasyate / (pṛ) ghrāṇarasanābhyāṃ na gṛhṇāti ghaṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_8: kasmāt / na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_9: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_10: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_11: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ [SSS_364] jighrāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1200_12: mṛdaṃ rasayāmīti / yadi ghaṭa udgatamukhaṃ khanyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_13: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_14: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_15: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_16: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_19: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro 'madhuro vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_20: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_21: nedaṃ sambhavati / yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1200_22: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_5: tadā śabdādīnamapi paśyet / tathā cet śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi nāvaśyakāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_6: na tu sambhavati / ataścakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ na dravyaṃ gṛhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_8: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_10: kasmāt / kaḥ karoti ghaṭarūpam / saṃyogamātramidam / ato na rūpeṇa ghaṭopalabdhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_11: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1201_17: kasmāt / bhavatāṃ sūtre rūpamupādāya (=rūpahetukaṃ) indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1202_7: rūpamātramupalabdhikaram / (u) maivam / na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1203_2: yathā andho 'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko 'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1203_6: bhavatāṃ sūtre 'pyuktam- kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam- adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1203_7: tadapyayuktam / kasmāt / andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1203_9: na tatrāsti rūpopalabdhiḥ / gandhamāghrāyāpi agandhadharme jñānaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1204_2: vāyuśca dṛśyaḥ syāt / (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1204_3: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1204_7: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_2: kasmāt / na hetudṛṣṭāntau staḥ idamanirvacanīyamiti jñāpayitum /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_5: yathā rūpaṇalakṣaṇaṃ rūpam / na nānātvalakṣaṇam / kathamucyate 'nirvacanīyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_8: na śabdādi / ato 'sya nānirvacanīyatā / rūpaṃ rūpāyatanasaṅgṛhītaṃ na śabdādisaṅgṛhītam /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_12: evaṃ śabdādayo 'pi / dharmāṇāṃ kramaḥ saṃkhyā cāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_13: yadyanirvācyāḥ / tadā dharmā asaṃkhyāḥ syuḥ / kasmāt / prathamaṃ dvitīyamiti lakṣaṇabhedasyābhāvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1207_14: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1210_0: (pṛ) abhāvavāde ke doṣāḥ / (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1210_1: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho 'pi abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1210_2: vaktuḥ śrotuścābhāvāt / asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1210_4: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1210_5: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_2: yadi sarve 'bhāvāḥ / kaḥ saviśeṣaḥ syāt / mithyāsaṃjñayā saviśeṣā iti bhavatāṃ matam /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_6: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_8: padārthān jānātīti jñānam / nedaṃ jñānamabhāva iti vācyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_9: yadyatyantābhāvā iti / tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_11: ato jñāyate nābhāvā iti / ghaṭādayo dharmāḥ pratyakṣajñeyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_14: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_16: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:1211_18: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1214_4: ataḥ sarve dharmā agrāhyāḥ / agrāhyādabhāvā[tmakāḥ] / avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam /
SA16hvsatssu:1214_5: tanna yuktam / nāvayaveṣu buddhirbhavati / kasmāt / sthūlaghaṭādīnāṃ padārthānāmeva grāhyatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1214_10: ato na santyavayavāḥ / sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato 'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1214_11: kasmāt / avayavān nityaṃ smarato ghaṭabuddhirnaiva bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1214_15: ato nāvayavāḥ smaryante / ghaṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yannāvayavavikalpabuddhirbhavati saiva ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1215_1: kasmāt / sarvehyavayavā avayavaśo bhidyamānā aṇutāṃ yānti /
SA16hvsatssu:1215_6: kasmāt / yo vadati nāstyavayavī kevalamavayavāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1215_8: evañca lokasatyaṃ nāsti / bhavān paramārthaṃ śūnyatāṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1216_4: rūpādīnyapi abhāvātmakāni / kasmāt / na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1216_5: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:1216_6: ato rūpamagrāhyam / cakṣurvijñānaṃ na vikalpayati idaṃ rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1216_7: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1217_1: ato na nāsti vikalpakamiti / (u) cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā niruddhameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1217_4: adṛṣṭvā kathamanusmaret / yadyadṛṣṭvānusmaret / andho 'pi rūpamanusmaret / na vastuto 'nusmarati / ato manovijñānaṃ nānusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1217_6: ato 'nusmarati / (u) maivam / kasmāt / sarvāṇi caramacittāni cakṣurvijñānamupādāya samutpannāni anusmareyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1217_7: naiva vismareyuḥ / tasmādutpannatvāt / [SSS_369] na vastuto yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1217_9: yathākāśānusmaraṇam, rūpaghaṭādigrahaḥ / sarve 'pi padārthastucchā abhāvātmakāḥ mṛṣāgṛhītāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_1: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_4: yadyaprāpya paśyatīti / tadā sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_5: na vastutaḥ paśyati / ato jñāyate nāprāpya paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_7: (u) ko nāma jñānagocaraḥ / (pṛ) yasmin kāle cakṣuḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_8: [sa]jñānagocaraḥ ityucyate / (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1218_11: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1219_1: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati / śrotrādīnyapi paśyeyuḥ / caturmahābhūtasāmyāt / evaṃ rūpamapi [paśyet] / cakṣurvijñānaṃ syāt sāyatanaṃ nirāyatanaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1219_2: ubhayathāsti doṣaḥ / tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1219_3: tadā sāyatanam / yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1219_4: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo 'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1219_6: tadā sāyatanaṃ bhavati / sāyatanatve sāvayavam / evaṃ sati bahubhirvijñānairekaṃ vijñānaṃ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1219_8: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1222_1: kasmāt / cittaṃ hi kṣaṇikam / śabdo 'pi kṣaṇikaḥ / yathā vadanti puruṣa iti / aya [mekatva]vādo na śrāvyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1222_3: “ruṃ” śrutvā śṛṇoti ṣam / iti nāstyekaṃ vijñānamakṣaratrayagrāhakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1222_5: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1222_7: samāhitacittastu na śṛṇoti / samāhitacittena tattvaṃ jñeyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1222_8: ataḥ śabdo na śravaṇīyaḥ / śabdo 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1223_2: ato nāsti śrotram / śrotrābhāvāt śabdo nāsti / śabdakāraṇaṃ nāstītyataḥ śabdo nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1223_5: kasmāt / ye dharmā vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, na te saṃśliṣyante / ye na vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ teṣāṃ svataḥ saṃśleṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1226_0: na gandho grāhyaḥ / kasmāt / na hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1226_5: kintu gandhaṃ gṛhṇātyeva / (u) maivam / yathā kaściccampakavṛkṣamalabdhvā mohāccampakabuddhimutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1226_7: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1226_8: tasmānnāsti gandhaḥ / tathā raso 'pi sparśo 'pi nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1226_9: kasmāt / sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1229_1: kasmāt / manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1229_4: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1229_5: svātmānaṃ [vā] jānīyāt / (u) na [kaścit] dharmaḥ svātmānaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1230_2: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:1233_1: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1233_3: ubhayathā cāsti doṣaḥ / yathā dvayorhastayoḥ pūrvamasan śabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1233_4: dadhihetau pūrvamasat dadhi, dadhi utpādayati / śakaṭahetau pūrvamasamat śakaṭaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1233_5: śakaṭamutpādayati / ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1234_0: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1234_4: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1234_6: yadi [SSS_372] hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1234_7: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1234_8: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1235_1: ato nāsti phalam / yadi hetau satkāryam, tadā notpadyeta / kathaṃ sadutpadyeta / yadyasat / tadapi notpadyeta / asatkathamutpadyeta / (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1235_3: tasyaivābhāvāt / yadi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva / kathaṃ karaṇīyaḥ / tasya sattvāt / (pṛ) kriyamāṇaḥ kriyata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1235_4: (u) nāsti kriyamāṇam / kasmāt / yaḥ kṛtabhāgaḥ sa kṛtakoṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1235_6: ato nāsti kriyamāṇam / yadi ghaṭaḥ kriyāvān, atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanno vā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1235_7: atīto na kriyāvān / niruddhatvāt / anāgato na kriyāvān asattvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1236_4: hetuḥ kāryasya pūrvaṃ vā, kiṃ vā paścāt, kiṃ vā samakālam, sarvathā na yujyate / kasmāt / yadi pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryam /
SA16hvsatssu:1236_5: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1236_9: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1236_10: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe 'nyonyahetuke /
SA16hvsatssu:1237_0: hetuphale ime yadyekaṃ, yadi vā nānā / ubhayathāsti doṣaḥ / kasmāt / yadi nānā / tadā tantūn vihāya paṭaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1237_2: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_0: yadyasti phalam / syāt svakṛtaṃ parakṛtamubhayakṛtamahetukṛtaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_1: sarvamidamayuktam / kasmāt / na kaściddharmaḥ svātmānaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_2: yadyasti svarūpataḥ / kiṃ svātmakriyayā / yadi nāsti svarūpataḥ / kaḥ karoti svātmakriyām / na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ [SSS_373] kurvantam /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_3: ato nāsti svakṛtan / parakṛtamayuktam / kasmāt / cakṣūrūpayorvijñānotpattau vṛttyabhāvāt na parakṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_6: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati- āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1238_8: ubhayakṛtamapyayuktam / svakṛtaparakṛtadoṣasattvāt / ahetukṛtamapi na yuktam / hetāvāsati phalamapi nāstītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1239_2: yadi kriyācittapurvakam / garbhe 'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1239_3: īśvarādayo 'pi na kurvanti / pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇo 'pi nāsti kriyācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:1239_4: karmedamatītagatam / kathaṃ kriyācittaṃ bhavet / ato na karmaṇo 'pyasti cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:1239_5: yadyakriyācittapūrvakamiti / kathaṃ parasya duḥkhakṛt duḥkhaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1239_7: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati- evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1239_8: evaṃ na kartavyamiti / yadi nāsti kriyācittam / kathamayaṃ vibhāgo bhavet / ataḥ sacittapūrvakamacittapūrvakaṃ sarvamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1242_0: uttaramucyate / yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti- sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1242_1: tanmatamayuktam / kasmāt / pūrvamevoktaṃ mayā- yadi sarvamabhāva[rūpa]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1242_2: śāstramidamapyabhāvarūpam / nāpi sarvadharmeṣu ityādiśūnyatādūṣaṇamaprativadannapi śūnyatāṃ sthāpayasi /
SA16hvsatssu:1242_8: sattvavastu, karmapratyayatāvastu, dhyānaniṣṭhāvastu, tathāgatavastu iti / idamasarvajñaḥ puruṣo 'bhyūhya na nitīrayituṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1242_11: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1243_0: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham /
SA16hvsatssu:1243_1: yathā ca bhagavatopadiṣṭam / tattathaiva bhaviṣyati / (u) bhagavān sarvadharmānupadiśannapi na sarvākāramupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:1243_2: vimuktyarthatvābhāvāt / tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_1: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_2: upadeśe 'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_4: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_5: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ- vastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_6: jñātustu asti / ajñātuḥ punarnāsti / yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
SA16hvsatssu:1244_7: mayādṛṣṭatvāt / na cādṛṣṭatvādrūpāṇi na santīti sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1244_8: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate /
SA16hvsatssu:1245_1: tathāgatastu āha- santi pañca skandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1245_2: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1248_3: kathaṃ tasya nirodha iti / (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1248_4: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1248_5: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo 'vināśadharmo 'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1248_6: te śūnyā ityucyante / na tu skandhāneva na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1248_8: kasmāt / yogāvacaraḥ saṃskṛtālambanacittaṃ prahāya asaṃskṛtālambanacittaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1249_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1249_2: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1249_3: (u) astīdaṃ vacanaṃ, na tu vyavadānā[rthaka]m / yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1249_6: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1250_3: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati /
SA16hvsatssu:1250_5: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1250_7: tathā idamapi / bhagavān rādhamāha- sattvaṃ tathā vibhida,
SA16hvsatssu:1250_8: vidhama, yathā nopatiṣṭhati iti / kiñcāhaikaṃ sūtrama- rūpaṃ rādha tathā vibhida,
SA16hvsatssu:1250_10: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_0: bhāvanā ca dvividhā- śūnya[tā]bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_2: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_3: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_4: yat dharmān na paśyati / idaṃ nairātmyamityucyate / uktañca sūtre- nairātmyajñānalābhī samyagvimucyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_9: (u) na santi vastutaḥ / santi tu saṃvṛtitaḥ / kasmāt / bhagavānāha- saṃskārāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santi māyāvat nirmitavat /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_10: na tu paramārthataḥ / paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam- ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_11: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1251_12: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_2: (u) sattvānāṃ kṛta ucyante / santi kecit pañcaskandheṣu samutpannaparamārthasaṃjñāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_3: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_4: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
SA16hvsatssu:1252_5: kārakastu nopalabhyate iti / (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_7: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_8: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_10: tasya jarāmaraṇam iti / ya āha- sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
SA16hvsatssu:1252_12: idamekārthakam, vyañjanameva nānā / yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_13: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_15: tat pañcaskandhakhaṇḍanam / kiñcāha- jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ madhyamā pratipadityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_20: uktañca sūtre- yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:1252_21: yo dharmo 'māyā, sa eva paramārthaḥ iti / sarve saṃskṛtadharmā vipariṇāmitvāt māyā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1253_1: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_2: na skandhā iti / yadi skandhāḥ paramārthasantaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1255_4: vastutastu na tathā / ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_5: skandhanirodhaśca satyam / ato jñāyate skandhā na satyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_6: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo 'pi satyamiti vaktum /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_9: tathā yo 'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_12: skandheṣu cāsti asmīti / yathāhānandaḥ- dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_14: kṣemakaḥ pratyāha- na khalvāyuṣmanto rūpamasmīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_16: evaṃ yāvadvijñānamapi / api ca me āyuṣmantaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu [SSS_378] asmīti adhigatam /

SA16hvsatssu:1255_21: nāpyanyatra tebhya puṣpam / evameva na rūpā dīni asmīti [vadāmi] /
SA16hvsatssu:1255_24: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_1: yadi vastusat nimittam, kimarthaṃ nānusmarati / na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1256_2: parantu nānusmaryata iti / yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte 'vatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_3: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_6: ataḥ skandhāḥ sarve śunyāḥ / phenasūtre bhagavānāha- yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_16: kasmāt / paśyāmaḥ khalu cakṣuṣā phenamapacīyamānamabhāvatāṃ yāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_17: tathā budbudādīnyapi / ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1256_22: ye niḥsvabhāvaṃ paśyanti, anyalakṣaṇābhāvāt te duḥkhacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_0: śūnyatā ca vimokṣamukham / śūnyatā ceyaṃ na kevalaṃ sattvaśūnyatātmikā /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_6: yathāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_7: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_11: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_12: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1257_13: nirodhaścābhāva ityucyate / ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve 'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1260_4: (u) sthānadvaye [nirudhyate] (1) acittakasamādhimupasampannasya (2) anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭhasya santānasamucchede vā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_1: śāstramāha- etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ) kasmāt na samudācaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_3: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_4: asati niśraye na vartate / evamātmacitte niśraye sati karmakleśānāṃ samudayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_5: asati tu na samudayaḥ / anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_7: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1261_9: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1262_2: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1262_3: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1262_4: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:1262_5: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_0: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_2: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_5: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_6: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi / saṃsāre 'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_7: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1263_8: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_1: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_4: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_5: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_7: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_13: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1264_15: nūtnaṃ tu karma na karoti / yathāgnirindhanānāṃ bhasmībhāve śāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1269_1: mārgasatyam- āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ samyak dṛṣṭiryāvat samyak samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1269_2: āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ saṃkṣipya dvividhaḥ (1) samādhiḥ parikaraśca (2) jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1270_4: yadi bahuvāraṃ na bhāvayati tadā kṣiprameva vikṣipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_0: (pṛ) uktaḥ samādhihetuḥ / idānīṃ kasya samādhirhetuḥ / (u) ayaṃ yathābhūtajñānasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_2: yathoktaṃ yogāvacaraḥ samāhitacitto viśuddhacitto vinīvaraṇacittaścittaratho 'calacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ dukhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāmimārgamāryasatyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_5: kiṃ punarlokottaraṃ hitam / ato jñāyate laukikaṃ lokottarañca hitaṃ samāhitacittenaiva labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_10: [SSS_383] vidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye anvageva hrīḥ apatrāpyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1271_12: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ satkuśalaṃ samādhimupādāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1274_0: (pṛ) uktaṃ bhavatā cittasyaikatrāvasthānaṃ samādhilakṣaṇamiti tatra samādhiścittañcaikaṃ uta bhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:1274_1: (u) na te bhinne / kecidāhu- samādhiścittañca bhinne /
SA16hvsatssu:1274_6: evamanavasthā bhavati / tattu na sambhavati / yadīyaṃ samādhiḥ prakṛtito 'vasthānamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:1274_14: ato jñāyate na yuktamiti / cittasyaikāgratetyukte nānyadharmaḥ prakāśito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1274_15: yathā pūrvamuktam- yatra cittaṃ sukhi bhavati tasminnālambane 'vatiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1275_5: tasya kālasya dvividhaṃ nāma samādhiriti prajñā ceti /

SA16hvsatssu:1275_13: sa vādo na yuktaḥ / sāsravānāsravā yadi vimuktiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1276_2: cittaṃ kiñcitkālamavasthāya yadi parīttamālambanaṃ paśyati[tadā] parīttetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1276_3: anye dve api tathā / samayavaśātrividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1276_8: yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇaṃ dravayati tāpayati secayati kāle ca sthapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1276_9: yadi sadā tāpayati / tadā dravībhavati / sadā secane ghanībhavati / sadā sthapanesphūryate / evaṃ yogāvacarasya cittamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:1276_14: dandhaḥ [kaśayā]tāḍyate / dāntaḥ parityajyate / evaṃ yogāvacarasya dāntaṃ cittamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_0: samādherasyāstrividha upāyaḥ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ samādhivyutthānopāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_2: ayaṃ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ / samādhisthito na calati / ayaṃ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ / yathādharmaṃ samādhervyuttiṣṭhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_4: (u) yogāvacaraḥ svacittalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇan evaṃ pragṛhṇan evaṃ vyuttiṣṭhan evaṃ parityajan samādhāvavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_5: tathā nirgacchati ca / (pṛ) sākṣādeva samādhigrahe ka upayoga upāyasya /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_7: yathepsitañca na vindate / avataritumicchan vyutiṣṭheta vyutthātumicchan punaravataret /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_8: itīdṛśā doṣāḥ santi / lābhaṃ hāniṃ manyeta / hāniñca lābham / yathā kiñcidviśuddharūpaṃ kiñcitprakāśarūpañca dṛṣṭvā vadeta- mahāhitaṃ labdhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1277_9: anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamityādyanusmarataḥ cittaṃ na sukhi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1278_10: alpakuśalo bahuprajñaḥ, bahukuśalo bahuprajñaḥ, alpakuśalo 'lpaprajña iti / eṣutṛtīyo yogāvacaro 'vaśyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1278_11: caturtho nāvaśyaṃ labhate / prathamadvitīyau yadi dāntau samau tadā labhete /
SA16hvsatssu:1281_2: kimidam / (u) ekāṅgabhāvana iti yat samādhiṃ bhāvayati na prajñām /

SA16hvsatssu:1281_7: sa āryaḥ samyagityucyate / kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathā sthaviro bhikṣurāha- yogāvacaraḥ samādhinā cittaṃ bhāvayan prajñāmupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1281_8: prajñayā cittaṃ bhāvayan samādhimupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /

SA16hvsatssu:1281_10: svabhāvo nāma yaḥ prahāṇasvabhāvaḥ viyogasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1282_0: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- ekāṅgabhāvana iti yadi samādhimupādāya raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:1282_2: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti yat rūpañca paśyati raśmiñca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1282_3: āryaḥ samyaksamādhiriti yat śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ pratilabdhaḥ samādhiḥ [SSS_386] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1282_4: kathamidam / (u) raśmimātraṃ paśyati na rūpamiti nāsti kiñcana sūtram sūtre kevalamuktam- ahaṃ prakṛtito raśmimapaśyaṃ rūpamapyapaśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1282_5: idānīṃ raśmirvinaṣṭaḥ, rūpamapi na paśyāmīti / bhavatā ca vaktavyaṃ kena kāraṇena raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpam ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1283_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyato 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1283_2: (u) yadi yogāvacaro na paśyati sattvaṃ nāpi dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:1283_5: ayaṃ śūnya evānimittaḥ / śūnye ca nāsti praṇihitaṃ kiñcana /
SA16hvsatssu:1283_7: atastrayo 'pyekārthakāḥ / (pṛ) tathā cet kasmāt traya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1283_9: śūnyaṃ bhāvayan hitaṃ labhate yaduta nimittaṃ na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1284_0: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yaḥ samādhiḥ śūnyānātmākāreṇa bhavati ayaṃ śūnya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1284_1: ya ākāro 'nityato duḥkhato hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayato mārgato yathāvadācarato niryāṇato bhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:1284_8: hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayata ākāra iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:1284_9: tat tathaiva syāt / kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- yatkiñcitsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti paśyan nirvidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1284_11: kasmāt / praṇidhānaṃ hi tṛṣṇāṅgam / yathāsūtramuktam hīnaṃ madhyamaṃ praṇidhānaṃ na mārga āsaktijanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1284_13: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhānnirodha ityucyate iti jñātavyam /

SA16hvsatssu:1285_2: ayaṃ śūnyaśūnya ityucyate / apraṇihitena pañcaskandhān nirvidya apraṇihitena punarimamapraṇihitaṃ nirvedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1285_3: ayamapraṇihitāpraṇihitaḥ / animittena pañcaskandhān praśāntān dṛṣṭvā animittena punaranimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1286_0: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- traya ime samādhayaḥ sāsravā iti /

SA16hvsatssu:1287_2: kasmāt / yogāvacareṇa hi sāsravāṇāmanāsravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodho 'dhigantavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1290_5: [sā prathamā bhavanā /]kenedaṃ jñāyate / bhagavānāha- dvitīyadhyānaṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāmne saṃvartate anyadharmāya saṃvartate yathā piṇḍapātāya śrāvastyāṃ praveśa iti /

SA16hvsatssu:1303_1: kasmāt / avyāpādo maitrī / na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1303_2: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1303_3: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:1303_5: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti /

SA16hvsatssu:1304_3: tathā karuṇā muditāpi / ataḥ sūtra uktam- rāgapratighaprahāṇāyopekṣāṃ bhāvaya iti /

SA16hvsatssu:1305_11: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi /
