SA16hvsatssu:1345_3: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_5: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_6: [tadā] kāyasākṣītyucyate / yadyubhayaṃ labhate / tadā ubhayato vimukta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_7: kasmāt / kleśā eko bhāgaḥ / dhyānasamādhyāvaraṇadharmā aparo bhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_9: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_10: (u) vyañjanamekam / arthastu nānā / anupūrveṣu nirodhaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_20: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_21: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1345_22: iti / eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_0: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_6: sūtreṣvastīdṛśo vibhāgaḥ / yadyāha- kaṇṭhato yogāvacaraḥ [SSS_403] kṣayanirodhalābhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_7: tadā [sa] kṛtakaraṇīya iti / jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_11: (u) sarve labhante / na tu samāpadyante / ye dhyānasamādhīn sākṣātkurvanti te samāpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_13: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_17: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_19: ityādi / kasmāt / taṭidupamasamādhicittaṃ vajropamaṃ tattvajñānaṃ kleśān bhinatti /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_22: kecidāhuḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catvāro 'rūpasamādhayaḥ sarve dhyānamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1346_24: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_3: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_6: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_7: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1347_9: asti vijñānānantyāyata(na)svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_17: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_19: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1347_20: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1348_1: yogāvacara[ścintayati]- yatkiñcanamanaskāraḥ yatkiñcanakṛtakaraṇam sarveṣāṃ nirodhaḥ śreyāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:1349_0: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1349_1: (u) sūtra uktam- vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1349_3: dvitīyasvabhāvo 'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1349_5: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1349_7: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1350_1: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1350_3: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_0: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_2: evaṃ saṃjñī ca bhavati / idaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_3: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_4: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_5: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_6: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_9: ṣaṣṭhaṃ pītāni paśyati / saptamaṃ- raktāni paśyati / aṣṭamaṃ- avadātāni paśyati / yogāvacara evamapramāṇāni rūpāṇi paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1353_10: kasmāt / na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:1354_0: (pṛ) ka idaṃ pratilabhate / (u) ime bhagavataḥ śrāvakā nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:1354_3: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1354_6: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_0: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_1: prathamaṃ dhyānam- yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmairvivicyākuśalai [SSS_406] dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_6: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_7: śrotreṇa śabdaṃ na śṛṇoti, ghrāṇena gandhaṃ na jighrati,
SA16hvsatssu:1357_8: rasanayā rasaṃ na rasayati, kāyena na sparśānanubhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_11: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_12: kathaṃ tajjānīmaḥ / vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_13: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_15: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:1357_17: yathoktaṃ mahānidānasūtre- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1358_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- savitarka savicāraṃ vihāraṃ viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1358_5: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1358_8: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1359_1: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1359_2: yadi vitarkavicāravivekaḥ, dvitīyadhyānasya ko bhedaḥ / uktañca sūtre- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
SA16hvsatssu:1359_4: yadi prītireva sukham, tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1360_1: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1360_6: aṅgaṃ nāma kāraṇam / bhāga eva kāraṇam / yathāryamārgāṅgāni sañcitāni kāraṇānityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1360_9: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1360_10: imau vitarkavicārau / ato jñāyate vitarkavicārau prathamadhyānasya kāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1360_12: ato na tau kāraṇam / dhyānadvayasamanantarañca na vitarkavicārau bhavataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1361_3: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe 'pi sahetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1361_5: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame 'pi pīḍita ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1361_7: sukhavedanaiva prītiḥ / kintu vibhajyocyate / praśrabdhito 'pi sukhaṃ pṛthagucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1361_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre- praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_0: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_1: (u) kālataḥ pañcocyante / yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_7: paścātparaṃ prītirityāyate / [SSS_408] kālabhedāt / na hyasti pṛthak praśrabdhidharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_8: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_10: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_12: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ- tathāhi- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1362_13: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1363_0: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1363_1: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1363_2: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1363_3: kathaṃ vāco heturasti, vāk ca niruddhā bhavati / yadi mataṃ vitarkavicārau yadyapi vartete /
SA16hvsatssu:1364_2: na prathamadhyānam / ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1364_5: uktañca sūtre- prathamadhyānasya śabdaḥ kaṇṭaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1364_6: ato nāha tūṣṇībhāva iti / (pṛ) prathamadhyānasya kasmāt śabdaḥ kaṇṭako bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1364_7: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:1364_11: na tathā dvitīyadhyānādeḥ / kasmāt / prathamadhyāne pañcavijñānānāmavyupaśabhāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1367_0: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1367_4: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye 'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1367_8: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1367_11: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1367_25: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1368_0: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne 'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1368_1: adhyātmaṃ samprasādanamiti / dvitīyadhyāne nibhṛtaścittasamādhānādvikṣepaḥ sadā nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1368_5: cetasa ekotibhāvaścetasa [SSS_410] ekasmin mārge viharaṇaṃ dhyānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1369_2: ata āha samādhijamiti / (pṛ) prathamadhyānagataprīteḥ dvitīyadhyānagataprīteśca ko bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1370_2: yasyānāsravaṃ cittam / tasya nāstyātma[saṃjñā] / ātmano 'sattvānnāsti prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_6: yadi nāstyanāsravā prītiḥ / nāstyanāsravā praśrabdhiḥ nāstanāsravaṃ sukhamityapi bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_11: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_12: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
SA16hvsatssu:1371_13: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_17: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_18: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_20: asti ca praśrabdhiḥ / na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto 'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_22: ato 'styanāsravaṃ sukham / na tu prītiṃ pratītya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1371_25: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha- asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1372_0: yasya nāstyātmā / na tasyāsti prītiḥ / yadyarhato 'sti prītiḥ / daurmanasyamapi bhavet / vastutastu nāsti daurmanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1372_2: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye 'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1372_4: ko doṣaḥ / (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1372_10: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1373_1: uktaṃ hi sūtre- prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1373_2: idānīṃ prītirapi nāsti / kimasti punaḥ / (u) iyaṃ prītiḥ prītervirāgādityādi nānāsravaṃ dhyānamāha /
SA16hvsatssu:1373_6: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1374_0: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:1374_1: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:1374_5: vyavahāragatasya tvasti / aśaikṣasya sarvadā nāsti / (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1374_7: (u) anātmacittameva sukham / [SSS_412] yogāvacaraḥ pratilabdhānātmacitto viparyayaṃ vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1374_9: na pṛthagasti prītiḥ / kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1377_0: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_2: prītiśceyaṃ saṃjñāvikalpajā, cañcalā pravṛttilakṣaṇā / prathamata ārabhya duḥkhānuyāyinī /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_3: hetunānena virāgaḥ / yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_4: prītijaṃ sukhañca mandam / prītivirāgajaṃ sukhaṃ gabhīram /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_5: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_6: prīteḥ saṃjñāvikalpajatvāt / sukhaṃ na saṃjñāvikalpajamiti sadā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1378_7: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1379_1: sa tu śītaṃ sukhaṃ manyate / yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1379_3: yogāvacaro 'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1379_5: yadi dharmavivikto bhavati / na tadā śītaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1379_10: yathā vipriyavivekaḥ / yathā bhagavān kauśāmbibhikṣuvivikta āha- ahaṃ sukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1380_4: ata upekṣaka ityucyate / smṛtaḥ samprajānan iti / prītyādīnavādetadubhayaṃ sadopanīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1380_11: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:1380_16: smṛtimān sukhavihārīti / puruṣo 'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1380_19: smṛtyā sāhacaryāt nocyate / sukhamiti paramasukham / ata āryā ācakṣanta upekṣaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1381_1: kasmādāha- upekṣāsukhamiti / (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1381_9: tasyābhāvāt sukham / yogāvacarasya tṛtīyadhyāne samāhitacittavṛttitvena saṃjñāvikalpasyābhāvāt sukhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1384_0: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1384_2: kasmādatrocyate / yadyavaśyaṃ vaktumiṣṭam, vaktavyaṃ pūrvameva prahāṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:1384_9: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate /
SA16hvsatssu:1385_3: tat sukhamityucyate / tṛtīyadhyānakasukhaviviktasya caturthadhyānasya lābhānna sukhamiti gaṇyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1386_0: upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhamiti / atropekṣā pariśuddhā / anīṣaṇatvāt / triṣu dhyāneṣvasti īṣaṇaṃ yadidaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1386_3: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:1387_12: tena kevalamucyate / uttamaguṇamupekṣāṃ prāptasya nādhamaguṇo manaskāro 'pekṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1388_2: ato nocyate samprajanyam / (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1388_3: sukhavedanāyāḥ kāmāṅgatvāt / na ca [sā]nāsravā / (pṛ) tṛtīyadhyāne svabhūmidoṣavirodhāyocyate samprajanyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1388_7: ato vaktavyaṃ samprajanyam / atra kāmadoṣo 'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1389_3: kenedaṃ jñāyate / yadā cittaṃ sūkṣmaṃ, tadā śvāso 'pi sūkṣmaḥ / caturthadhyāne cittamacalamityata āśvāsapraśvāsau niruddhau /
SA16hvsatssu:1389_5: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1389_9: ataḥ śvāso niruddha iti / tadayuktam / kasmāt / annapānarasapravāhaḥ kāyamabhivyāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1389_10: yadi romakūpāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ, na samudācaret / vastutastu na sambhavati / ato jñāyate caturthadhyānacittabalameva śvāsanirodhakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1390_2: uktaṃ hi sūtre- sukhavedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1390_7: tadā na kampate / tatrāvaśyamasti khalu sūkṣmo vātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1393_0: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1393_5: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1393_6: ato hetoḥ samatikrāmati / sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikrāntasya [SSS_416] pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1393_8: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1394_0: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1394_3: iti / idamayuktam / kasmāt / pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1394_4: kasmāt pṛthagucyate / rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:1395_4: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1395_5: ato jñāyate kāyo 'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_1: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_2: kasmāt / karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati- sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_6: (u) ayaṃ rūpamavalambate / rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre- āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_8: tato bhīto nivartate / yathā tāpāt carmacchedaḥ / nirvāṇamanusmarataścittaṃ tatra suprabuddhaṃ bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1396_10: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto 'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:1397_11: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam- ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1397_12: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1397_14: rūpāṇyālokena jñāpyāni / ata ālokaṃ pratītya rūpābhāvo jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_0: tamasyapi ākāśaṃ jñāyate / andho hastenāpi ākāśaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_4: rūpamidañca sapratigham / ākāśamapratigham / ānyādiḥ rūpāṇyatyantaṃ kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_5: natvākāśam / yadyākāśaṃ kṣīyate, kimātmakaṃ bhavet / (pṛ) rūpasyotpādesatyākāśamastameti /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_7: (u) tatra rūpamutpannam / nānena rūpeṇa yatkiñcit kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_8: kasmāt / rūpābhāvo hyākāśam / nahyabhāvaḥ punarabhāvaḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_9: ato na rūpākāśaṃ kṣapayati / bhavānāha- ākāśaṃ rūpamiti / na tatrāstikāraṇaṃ yenedaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1398_12: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt- yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_0: (pṛ) yadyākāśaṃ na rūpam / ko dharma idaṃ bhavati / (u) abhāvadharma ākāśam / yatra[rūpaṃ] nāstīti vacanam tatrākāśaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_1: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- ṣaḍ dhāturayaṃ puruṣakāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_5: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_6: yathā nāma rūpāśritam, rūpañca nāmāśritam / ākāśantvanāśritamato 'bhāvadharma iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_8: tadapi na yuktam / kasmāt / rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_10: [yat] bhavānāha- na hi śaśaśṛṅga madṛśyamarūpamapratighamityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_14: nāstīti vaktavyam / (u) cittantu karma karoti yadālambanamupādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:1399_15: ākāśamakarmakam / abhāvamātreṇa kṛtakāstitālābhādabhāvadharma iti jñāyate ato 'yaṃ samādhiradita ākāśamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:1400_2: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- arūpasamāpattayo nirodhālambanā api ayaṃ anumānajñānabhāgīyaṃ nirodhamātramālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:1401_4: yathā kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cābhijñābalādanyasmin rūpe anyasmin citte sthito 'pi na cyavate /
SA16hvsatssu:1401_5: tathā tatrāpi / (pṛ) ākāśānantyāyatanasamādherākāśāyatanasya kṛtsnāyatanasya ca ko bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1401_9: yadi samādhiḥ, samādhiṃ vinā yadi saṃkleśaḥ yadi vā vvavadānam sarvamākāśānantyāyatanamityākhyāyate ? /
SA16hvsatssu:1404_0: sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya [anantaṃ vijñānamiti] vijñānānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1404_4: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi ākāśaṃ pratītya rūpaṃ paribhedayan [ākāśa]mapi parijihīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:1405_0: vijñānānantyāyatanamiti yogāvacaro vijñānenānantamākāśamityavalambamānaḥ tadā anantaṃ vijñāna[mapi ālambate] /
SA16hvsatssu:1406_1: tatpariśramanirviṇṇo vijñānaṃ paribhidya tatparijihīrṣayā ākiñcanyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1407_1: saṃjñā ca duḥkhopāyāyāsāya bhavati rogato gaṇḍataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1407_2: yasya saṃjñā nāsti sa punarmūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1407_5: yogāvacaraḥ saṃjñāṃ vipadaṃ āsajñikaṃ sammohaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1408_1: tadayuktam / [SSS_420] kasmāt / yadi rūpadhātau cittaṃ niroddhumalaṃ bhavanti kasmādārūpyadhātau nālam /
SA16hvsatssu:1408_4: idānīṃ punaścittaṃ nirudhyate rūpacittayoryugapannirodhaṃ paśyata utrāsasammohaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1408_10: tathedamapi / yadi phalamasamucchinnam, [tadā] phalastha iti nāma / yathā nirmitagataṃ rūpam nirmitacitte punaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1408_11: ato nātyantaṃ nirudhyate / ato rūpadhātau na cittanirodho vaktavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_0: asaṃjñi samāpattau ca na cittaṃ nirudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_1: kasmāt / yogāvacaro 'vaśyaṃ cittanirvedāt cittavirāgāt cittaṃ nirodhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dīrgharātraṃ [hyetat bhikṣavaḥ] aśrutavataḥ] pṛthagjanasya adhyavasitaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam etanmama eṣo 'hamasmi eṣa ma ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_7: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- tīrthikāḥ trayāṇāmupādānānāṃ samucchedaṃ nirodhamupadiśanti nātmavādopādānasya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_9: yathā markaṭopamasūtram [aśrutavān] pṛthagjanaḥ kāyaṃ virajyeta na cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_10: varaṃ [bhikṣavaḥ aśrutavān] pṛthagjana imaṃ cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāya[mātmata] upagacchet na tveva cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_11: tatkasya hetoḥ / dṛśyate 'yaṃ [bhikṣava ścāturmahābhautikaḥ] kāya [ekamapi varṣaṃ] tiṣṭhan.
SA16hvsatssu:1409_13: yacca khalu [etadbhikṣava] ucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyayena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_14: tadyathā [bhikṣavaḥ] [SSS_421] markaṭa [araṇya upavane caran] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_15: tāṃ muktvā anyāṃ gṛhṇāti / ekameva bhikṣavo yadidamucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_16: tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyāyena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_17: ] tatra śrutavān [bhikṣavaḥ] āryaśrāvakaḥ pratītya samutpādameva sādhukaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1409_20: sarve tīrthikā avikalpapratyayajñānatvāt na cittaṃ nirodhayitumalam /
SA16hvsatssu:1410_4: pṛthagjanānāñca dharmo [yat] uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratītyāvarāṃ bhūmiṃ vijahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1410_6: kintu samādhibalena sūkṣmasaṃjñāmabhimukhīkṛtya cittasya prabodhāt vadati nāsti saṃjñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1410_8: [sa cāsaṃjñītyucyate /] yathā alpajño 'jña iti / yathā vā alpadaśano 'daśana iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1410_9: yathā vā sammūrchābhraṣṭacetanāḥ suṣuptāḥ krimayaḥ śītibhūtamakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1410_11: tathā tatrāpi vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi saṃvṛtito 'saṃjñītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1413_0: sarvaśonaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1413_3: (u) uktaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ dhyānasamādhiṣu santi vitarkavicāraprītisukhādayo dharmā iti ato nocyate sarvaśaḥ samatikramyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1413_5: ato 'rūpeṣvapi na vaktavyaṃ sarvaśaḥ samatikramyeti (u) ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpanno rūpacittādvimucyate,
SA16hvsatssu:1413_8: vyañjanameva nānā iti / ārūpyasamāpattiṣu ca cittaṃ susthiram /
SA16hvsatssu:1413_11: (pṛ) yat sahaivoktaṃ asti kaṇṭako yaduta rūpasaṃjñā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1414_4: ata uktadoṣo labhyate / yat bhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ navānupūrvikeṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodha iti tat virudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1414_6: kleśānāṃ kṣayarūpā vimokṣeṣu vartate kleśānāmakṣayarūpā anupūrvaṃ [vihāre]ṣu vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1414_10: tedevārhatphalam / arhatphalañca sarvasaṃjñānāṃ punaranutpādako vyupaśama eva /
SA16hvsatssu:1414_11: atra saṃjñānāṃ vyupaśame 'pi anyasaṃyojanānāṃ sattvāt punaranutpādikā na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1415_5: yadi nāsti tadbalam, tadā nirodhasamāpattirnedṛśaṃ mahābalaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1415_7: yathā caturthadhyāne cittacaittān nirundhya āsaṃjñike praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:1415_11: niruddhacittameva nirodha ityucyate na punaranyo 'sti dharmo nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1415_12: ato jñāyate imā navabhūmīrvihāyāpyasti cittanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1416_5: saṃjñākārāṇāṃ prajñaptigatatvāt prajñaptiśca dvividhā- hetusaṃghātaprajñaptiḥ dharmaprajñaptiśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:1416_8: ataḥ saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau sarvanirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1417_1: kasmāt / kleśānāmasti bhāgadvayam- tṛṣṇābhāgo dṛṣṭibhāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1417_3: saṃjñāto dṛṣṭibhāgaḥ / kāmadhātau rūpadhātau ca veditaṃ pradhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1417_7: saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau ca sarvacittacaittānāṃ nirodha ukto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1417_11: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi tatra tatra (?) sūtre- cittaṃ khalvadhipattiḥ dvividhānāṃ kleśānāmāśrayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1417_13: iti / ato vaktavyaṃ cittameva / citte cokte sugamam / ato bhavaduktirna [saṃbhavati] /
SA16hvsatssu:1418_2: (u) aṣṭavimokṣāḥ sarve kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharantīti vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1418_5: na tu śrotā prajānāti / tathedamapi / acittadharmatvāt iyaṃ kāyena sākṣātkarotīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_1: na tat yujyate / kasmāt / samāpattimimāṃ samāpannaḥ sattva [eva] bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_2: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi sattvo 'cittaka ityato 'yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_3: uktañca sūtre- āyurūsma vijñānamime trayo dharmāḥ sadāvyabhicāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_8: sparśādayo 'pi niruddhāḥ / ato nāstyāhāraḥ / cittañca cittādutpadyate / citte 'smin niruddhe nānyaccittamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_11: nānyatra[gataṃ] nirudhyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpeṇa kāmān samatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_14: cittameva cetanā manaskāro bhavatītyavaśyaṃ nirodhena taṃ samatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:1419_19: cittanirodho hi maraṇam / yadi niruddhaṃ cittaṃ punarjāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_0: atrocyate / yadbhavānāha- nāstyacittakaḥ sattva iti acitta[tā] sāmye 'pi maraṇe 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_1: yathā sūtre paripṛcchati- yo 'yaṃ [bhante] mṛtaḥ [kālakṛtaḥ] yaścāyaṃ [SSS_425] saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_2: anayoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam / pratyāha- yo 'yaṃ [gṛhapate] mṛtaḥ [kālakṛtaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_5: tasya cittamātraṃ niruddham, āyurūṣma tu kāyād vibhaktaṃ vartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_9: na tu sa tarupāṣāṇasamaḥ / yadbhavānavocat- trīṇi vastūnyavyabhicārīṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1420_11: arūpadhātāvastyāyuḥ, asti vijñānam, natvasti ūṣma / nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya cāstyāyuḥ astyūṣma,
SA16hvsatssu:1420_12: natvasti vijñānam / asmin sūtre 'pyuktam vijñānaṃ kāyādvibhaktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_7: yathā cakṣū niruddhaṃ sat na tadvijñānaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_9: tathedamapi / yanmanaḥ yacca manovijñānam ime dve mithaḥ pratisambandhinī /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_11: ato 'hetuḥ / yadavocaḥ santānasamuccheda eva cittaṃ nirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_12: tadayuktam / trividho hi nirodhaḥ- rūpanirodhaḥ cittanirodhaḥ kadācidrūpacittobhayanirodhaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1421_13: kadācidrūpasya nirodho na tu cittasya yathā nirodhasamāpattisamāpanne /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_15: yadavocaḥ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno na mṛta ityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_18: ayaṃ bhedaḥ / puruṣasyāsya ca āyurūṣma pratītya cittaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_19: na tathā mṛtasya / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yadi niruddhaṃ cittaṃ punarjāyate,
SA16hvsatssu:1421_21: tadayuktam / kasmāt / nirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭasya pūrvakarmavedyāni āyurūṣmavijñānāni niruddhāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_22: na punarutpadyante / asya tu āyurūṣmaṇoranirodhe pūrvakālīnaṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_23: yathā nirodhasamāpattivarga uktam- nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni kāyajīvitañca pratītya punarvyuttiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1421_24: ataścittaṃ punarutpadyate / nirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭasya cittaṃ paraṃ na punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1422_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodhasamāpattervyutthitasya cittaṃ nirvāṇabhāgīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1422_4: tadāśritya prajñāpi mahatī / prajñāmahimnā dāyako viśiṣṭaṃ vipākaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1422_7: tathedamapi / imāṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannasya bahulasaddharmavāsitacittatvāt mahāphalamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1422_8: yathā sukṛṣṭe kṣetre sasyamavaśyaṃ bahulaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1422_15: anye saṃvṛtisatye vartante / puruṣo 'yaṃ sadā saraṇadharme vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1424_1: asyāḥ samāpattervyutthito nirvāṇālambana ityataḥ prajñaptisaṃjñayā viviktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1424_2: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasya dānapateḥ satkāraṃ bhuṅktvā apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya [SSS_427] viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1424_5: idamucyate 'pramāṇam / ato dṛṣṭa eva vipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1424_6: kiñca aṣṭabhirguṇai ralaṅkṛtamidaṃ puṇyakṣetram- samyak dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1424_7: nirvāṇālambanaṃ cittaṃ anyāni cāṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1425_1: tatkatham / (u) yathoktavat etatsamāpattervyutthitasya paramaśāntyādayo guṇā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1425_2: neme guṇā laukikāḥ syuḥ / (pṛ) nirodhasamāpattirdharmāṇāṃ pratirodhārthā /
SA16hvsatssu:1425_6: tāpāpagame punarbhavati / tathedamapi syāt / (u) tathā cet nirvāṇamapi cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1425_7: kasmāt / nirvāṇaṃ pratītya hi nānye skandhāḥ samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1425_10: yogāvacarāṇāmīdṛśo dharmaḥ syāt nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanne praṇihitānugamanāccittaṃ na pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_0: (pṛ) imāṃ samāpattimevānupūrvaṃ samāpadyata iti kimanupūrvameva vyuttiṣṭheta /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_3: (pṛ) sūtra uktamnirodhasamāpattervyutthitaṃ cittaṃ prathamaṃ trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti- aniñjyaḥ [sparśaḥ] animittaḥ [sparśaḥ] apraṇihitaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_4: kasmādevam / (u) asaṃskṛtālambane citte vidyamānaḥ sparśaḥ aniñjyaḥ animittaḥ apraṇihita iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_5: śūnyata evāniñjyaḥ / saṃskṛtālambanasya cittasya laghutvādastīñjanaṃ yadrūpavedanādīnāṃ grahaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_6: śūnye[sati] animittam / animitte [sati] rāgādi kimapi nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1426_8: ata ucyate vyutthāne trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1427_2: kathamidam / (u) na sāsravam / yogāvacara etatsamāpattisamīpsayā prathamata eva sarvān saṃskārān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1428_0: sūtra uktam- [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyamānasya bhikṣornaivaṃ bhavati] ahaṃ [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhaṃ samāpadye iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1428_7: tadā na samāpanno nāma / ataḥ sūtramāha [atha khalvasya] pūrvameva tathācittaṃ bhāvitaṃ bhāvati [yat tat tathātvāya] upanayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1429_1: tadā asaṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā kamupakāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1429_2: (u) dīrghakālaṃ bhāvitatvāt samāpattidārḍhye jñānadarśanaṃ suniścitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1429_3: yathā saṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ paśyato 'pi nāsti kṣaṇikādanyat /
SA16hvsatssu:1432_1: yogāvacaraḥ parīttanimittaṃ gṛhītavān adhimuktibalena tat vipulayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1432_2: kasmāt / samāhitacittabalāt tattve 'vatarataḥ sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1433_2: (u) dīrghakālaṃ tat bhāvayan sadā pṛthivīnimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1433_4: (pṛ) yoginā dṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivīnimittaṃ dravyataḥ pṛthivī na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1433_5: (u) adhimuktibalāt darśane pṛthivī bhavati na dravyato bhavati pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:1433_6: (pṛ) nirmāṇabalāt bhūyamānaṃ nirmitamapi kiṃ na dravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1433_7: (u) nirmitaṃ samādhibalātsiddhamityataḥ kṛtakaṃ vastu yaduta prabhā aptejādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1434_0: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- aṣṭakṛtsnāyatanāni caturthadhyānamātre vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1434_1: tat katham / (u) yadi vartanta kāmadhātau triṣu dhyāneṣu ca ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1434_2: antime dve kṛtsnāyatane pratyekaṃ svabhūmau bhavetām /
SA16hvsatssu:1434_3: tāni ca daśa sāsravāṇi / ālambanākampitvāt / (pṛ) ākāśaṃ kiṃ rūpapratighalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1434_4: (u) yogī adhimuktyā ca cakṣuḥśrotrādyākāśalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1435_0: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- sarvapṛthivīsamādhiṃ samāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahameva pṛthivī,
SA16hvsatssu:1435_4: kathamidam / (u) yadi kāmadhātvāptapṛthivyādi sarvamālambate ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1435_6: tatra kaḥ punardoṣo 'sti / kiñcāyaṃ samādhiradhimuktito 'bhūtamālambanaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1435_10: sarvaṃ tat paribhedārtham / (pṛ) vastuto nāsti khalu sarvaṃ pṛthivī ityādīni /
SA16hvsatssu:1435_13: tatrātmadṛṣṭeḥ samudbhavāt / aśubhādibhāvanā yadyapi na paramārthasatyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1436_2: vijñānaṃ grāhakam / ato vijñānaṃ bhāvayati na vedanādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1436_3: vedanādi ca cittasya prabheda iti pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA16hvsatssu:1436_4: kiñca yogī na paśyati vedanādi sarvatra vyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:1439_0: anityasaṃjñā, duḥkhasaṃjñā, anātmasaṃjñā, āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñā, sarvaloke 'nabhiratisaṃjñā, aśubhasaṃjñā, maraṇasaṃjñā, prahāṇasaṃjñā, virāgasaṃjñā, nirodhasaṃjñā [cetidaśa saṃjñāḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_0: (pṛ) na yuktamidam / keciddharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā api nānityāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_1: yathā tīrthikānāṃ sūtramāha- triṇāciketasya kartā śāśvate pade jāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_2: brahmakāuyikāśca śāśvatāḥ / (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane 'pyuktam śakro devānāmindraḥ kratuśataṃ kṛtvā punaḥ patatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_3: uktañca gāthāyām- śakrādayaḥ śatasahasrādhikānāṃ kratūnāmanuṣṭhātāro 'nityāḥ kṣīyanta itri /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_12: na punaranyo mārgo 'stīti / “aṇoḥ puruṣasyāṇurātmā, mahato mahānātmā sadā kāye śete /
SA16hvsatssu:1440_13: ya imamātmānaṃ na veda / tasya vedādāvadhīyānasyāpi na kaścanopakāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_2: kasmāt / bhavatāṃ śāsane hyuktam- brahmā sahāṃpatirapi guṇānāṃ [prakarṣāya] sadā kratuṃ yajamāno vrataṃ dhatte iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_4: kasmāt puṇyaṃ karoti / śrūyate ca bhavatāṃ granthe vacanam- asti brahmaṇaḥ [sahāṃ] patermaithunarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_5: sati ca tasmin dveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśā avaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_7: evaṃ pāpī kathaṃ nityaṃ vimokṣaṃ pratilabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_8: na ca sarva ṛṣayo devān yajante /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_10: yadīdaṃ nityaṃ, tadā sarvathā tadācareyuḥ / sarve ca padārthā anityāḥ / kasmāt / yāni pṛthivyaptejovāyavo bhūtāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_12: kālaśca cakravatpravartate / ato jñāyate 'nityānīti / śīlasamādhiprajñādyapramāṇaguṇasampannā mahānto dīpaṅkarabuddhādayaḥ pratyekabuddhā mahāsammatādayaḥ kalpādyā rājānaḥ sarve 'pyanityāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_13: kaḥ padārtho nityo bhavet / api ca bhagavānāha- yatkiñcitsamudayadharma,
SA16hvsatssu:1441_14: sarvaṃ tat vyayadharma iti / yathoktaṃ gomayapiṇḍisūtre- atha khalu bhagavān parīttaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- nāsti kiñcidīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ [yat rūpaṃ] nityaṃ dhruvaṃ [śāśvataṃ] avipariṇāmadharma [śāśvatasaṃjñam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1441_15: asminneva sūtre punarvistaraśa uktam- śakrabrahmacakravartirājānāṃ [ye] phalavipākāḥ [te sarve] 'pi atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1443_6: ko [SSS_432] vā neṣyāt / sukhavedināṃ sadā saṃvāsaṃ priyaṃ vā vastutastu vidvān sarvathā vimuktimeva prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1443_7: ato jñāyate samudayadharma na nityaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1443_8: atha punarvaktavyaṃ samudayadharma sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ muhūrtamapi na tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1444_1: (u) kleśān vināśayati / yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_1: yathā kaścit subhikṣakālo na dīrgha iti budhyan maithunarāga āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_2: kusumaṃ nāticiraṃ navaṃ bhavatīti jānan sukhāyāśu tadupabhuṅkte /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_3: parasya [dayitājanasya] surūpaṃ na nityaṃ bhavatīti jānan maithunarāgaṃ drutataraṃ vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_7: yāvattiryañcaḥ anityamiti jānanto 'pi na kleśān bhindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_15: yaśca dharmo 'nityaḥ, so 'nātmā ityanityamanātma ca bhāvayato yogino nātmabuddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_18: anityasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan svaparakāyaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ maraṇa[dharma] ca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_19: kathaṃ rāgamutpādayet / yogī prārthitaṃ sarvamanityaṃ vipralopanamiti anuyāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_20: tadā tucchaṃ bhavati / tucchatvāt na kāmarāgamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_21: yathā kaścidvālakaḥ śūnye hastaḥ tuccha iti jñātvaiva na [tatra]saṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_23: yathā kaścit bhaṅguratvāt bhājane na pramudyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1445_24: yathāpi ca kācinnārī amukasya puruṣasyāyurna saptadinānyeṣyatīti śrutvā [vadati] satsvapi subhikṣakālārjavabahumānadhanaprabhāvabaleṣu ko vā prīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1446_2: tadā sa bāhyaṃ vastvanityaṃ paśyan śocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1446_6: vidvāṃstu duḥkhahetau sthita eva na duḥkhaṃ nirodhyamiti jñātvā tyajati duḥkhahetuṃ yaduta pañcaskandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:1446_7: ayaṃ yogī ābhyantaraskandhān paribhettuṃ anātmasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1446_9: anātmapratilābhī kiṃ punaḥ prārthayīta anityasajñyapi na kiñcitprārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1447_2: ata uktaṃ sūtre- ekāgreṇa cittena pañcaskandhānanityān bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1447_3: ya ādhyātmikān skandhān aparibhidya bahirdhā vastu anityaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1447_6: iti / anityamiti paśyatāmapi na nirvedavirāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1447_8: eṣāṃ satyapi anityajñāne na sādhubhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1447_15: tathedamapi / ata ucyate- ekāgracittena anityamiti samyambhāvanā kleśān vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1448_1: sati tattvajñāne na bhavanti kāmādayaḥ kleśāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1448_9: yadi dharmā anityāḥ, kathaṃ tata uddhatasaṃjñāmutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1448_10: dharmā anityā iti jñānānna moha utyadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1451_2: pratyutpanne vastuto duḥkhaṃ yadasiśastrādi tad duḥkhaduḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:1451_4: idaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkham / śūnyānātmajñānalābhino yaccittaṃ bhavati saṃskṛtadharmāḥ sarve viheṭhanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_2: kasmāt / na hi duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayitā kāmaprītiṃ sevate /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_6: dharmā anityā anātmakā api na duḥkhajanakāḥ tadā naiva tyājyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_7: duḥkhatvāttu tyājyāḥ / duḥkhatyāgādvimucyate / sarve sattvā atitarāṃ bhītā bhavanti yadidaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_8: yadi taruṇo vṛddho vā pāmaraḥ paṇḍito vā āḍhyo daridro vā jānāti idaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_10: sarve yogacāriṇaḥ puruṣā nirvāṇe śāntopaśamasaṃjñotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1452_12: kenedaṃ jñāyate / ye sattvāḥ kāmadhātvāptaduḥkhopadrutā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1453_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat rūpaṇamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma,
SA16hvsatssu:1453_3: kenedaṃ jñāyate / sattvānāṃ paramārthato duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñotpādāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1453_5: ato bhagavānāha- ye duḥkhaṃ budhyanti teṣāmahaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ vyākaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1453_11: anayā saṃjñayā ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāre yātāyātānāṃ mānasaṃ kliśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1454_6: duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayato mano na catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu sukhaṃ viharati sarvatra duḥkhadarśitvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1454_7: yathā mugdhāḥ śalabhāḥ sukhasaṃjñayā pradīpe patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1457_0: yogī sarve dharma bhaṅgavipariṇāmalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1457_1: yasmin rūpe āttmatayābhiniviśate idaṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharma /
SA16hvsatssu:1457_3: tathā vedanādīnapi / yathā kaścit girinirjharānuvāhito yatkiñcidavalambya tadvihāya mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_2: pṛthagjanā ātmasaṃjñayā paramārthato duḥkhe na duḥkhaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_3: anātmasaṃjñayā tu atyalpe 'pi duḥkhe tadupaghātaṃ budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_5: kasmāt / ātmasaṃjñayā hi ātmā naśyediti bibhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_6: yadi paramārthaṃ [SSS_436] jānāti tadā hāyapati duḥkhamanātmakaṃ vināśyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_7: tadā samudācaratyupekṣā / anātmasaṃjñayā ca nityasukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_9: tadā ātmā na bhavet, ātmīyamapi na bhavet, sadā duḥkhamevāsti iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:1458_10: nāstyātmātmīyamiti cintayato dharmeṣu vinaṣṭheṣu na duḥkhamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1459_2: idaṃ vastu ātmano hitamityataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1459_4: anenātmaivābhimānajanakaḥ / ahamāyuṣo 'nte kariṣyāmi na kariṣyāmiti dṛṣṭivicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1459_8: cittaviśuddhyā ca kāñcanaṃ loṣṭaṃ candanamasidhārāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nindāñca samaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1460_1: yathā strīrūpe rāgaḥ / tatsarvamanātmasnehāt / nairātmyamanusaranneva puṇyapāpaṃ sañcinoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1460_4: svakāye puruṣasaṃjñāṃ parakāye ca strīsaṃjñāmutpādya [tatra] abhiniviśate /
SA16hvsatssu:1460_6: tallakṣaṇaiva prajñaptiḥ / ato na nairātmyaṃ kāmacittajanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1463_2: kāmadhātau yāni santi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tāni annapāna maithunarāgaṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1464_1: yathā kalpādau sattvāḥ svargādāgatya loke 'smin upapādukā abhūvan /
SA16hvsatssu:1464_4: evaṃ krameṇa jarāvyādhimaraṇaśālinaḥ yāvadvatsaraśataṃ bhūyasā duḥkhaiḥ pīḍitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1464_5: āhārābhiniveśavaśāt sarve te tādṛśemyaḥ phalemyaḥ praṇaṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1464_6: ata āhāraṃ yoniśo bhāvayet / annapānābhiniveśānmaithunarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1464_7: tato 'nye kleśā bhavanti / tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma kurvanti akuśalakarmataḥ trīn doṣān vardhayitvā devamanuṣyāṇāmapakurvanti /

SA16hvsatssu:1596_12: vipaśyanā avidyāmapanayati / yathoktaṃ sūtre- śamatho bhāvitaścittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1597_0: (pṛ) yadi śamatho vipaśyanā cittaṃ bhāvayati prajñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1597_2: kasmānniyama ucyate / śamathaścittaṃ bhāvayan rāgaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1597_7: śamitāccittājjāyate prajñā / ata ucyate vipaśyanā prajñāṃ bhāvayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1598_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śamatho bhāvito rāgaṃ prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1598_2: kena tat jñāyate / rūpādiṣu bāhyakāmeṣu rāgo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1598_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī nirāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ labhamānaḥ sāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ jahāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1598_5: yaduktamavidyāprahāṇamiti, tadātyantikaprahāṇam / kena tat jñāyate / avidyāprahāṇāddhi rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante nirudhyante nāvaśiṣyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1598_10: iti / asti ca dvidhā vimuktiḥ sāmayikavimuktiḥ akopyavimuktiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1599_3: (u) neyamanāsravā vimuktiḥ / kasmāt / samayavimukto hi yat adhikabalena kañcitkālaṃ saṃyojanāni vighnayati nātyantaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1600_2: yadi sa āsravān vināśitavān, nātmānaṃ hanyāt / ato jñāyate samayavimukto nānāsrava ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1600_7: ato māraḥ śaikṣo vivṛttakāyaskandhaṃ mṛta iti ācaturdigantaṃ tadvijñāpanāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramya bhagavantametadavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:1602_1: atha khalu bhagavān [māra iti viditvā ta]mavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:1604_12: nāsti tu kaścit [kevalaṃ] śamathaṃ spṛṣṭvā rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1604_13: tathā cet tīrthikā api rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1604_14: vastutastu na tathā / ato jñāyata idaṃ vighnībhūtaprahāṇamātramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1605_4: tat katham / (u) yogīyadi samādhiṃ pratītya kṣayamālambya prajñāmutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1605_11: yadi smṛtyupasthānādīni nirvedhabhāgīyāni spṛṣṭvā cittaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1605_13: sarve ca yogino dvāvimau dharmau niśritya cittaṃ nirudhya vimuktiṃ spṛśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_3: (u) pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu kāyikaṃ karma pratikṣaṇavināśyapi bhāvanāvaśādvibhinnakauśalaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_4: bhāvanāvaśāt ciraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravartyamānaṃ sat sukaraṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_5: tathā vācikaṃ karmāpi / anuvihitāvṛtti āvṛttyā ca praguṇīkṛtaṃ dṛḍhībhūtañca susmaraṇaṃ bhavati yathādhyayanādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_6: mānasaṃ karma ca kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyamiti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_7: yathāgnirjanyaṃ vikārayati / āpaḥ śilā bhedayanti / vāyuḥ padārthān vidhamati / evaṃ kṣaṇikadharmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃhatānāṃ balamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_9: yathā kaścit punaḥ punarmaithunacittaṃ bhāvayan bahūn kāmānabhinirvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_10: tathā dveṣamohāvapi / yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo yadvastucittaṃ manasi karoti sa tatra pratipannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1608_12: evamanyau dvau vitarkāvapi / iti / ato jñāyate cittamidaṃ kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1609_0: bhāvanā nāmopacayaḥ / dṛśyante dṛṣṭe sarve dharmāḥ sopacayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1609_1: yathoktaṃsūtre- yogī khalu ayoniśo manasikārāt kāmādīnāsravānanutpannānutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1609_2: utpannān vivardhayati / yadavarānmadhyamutpādayati / madhyāduttamamutpādayati / tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḷaṃ nāḷāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto 'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1609_4: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1609_6: tathāpi tadvāsanābalamasti / ato jñāyate kṣaṇikā dharmā api bhāvayitavyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_0: (pṛ) tilaṃ vartamānadharmaḥ / vāsito gandha āgantukaḥ / avidyamānaṃ cittaṃ kṣaṇikajñānenāgatya bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_1: kathaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhavet / (u) nāsti kaścidvidyamānadharmaḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā iti pūrvameva sādhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_2: ato nāsti dūṣaṇama / yadi dharmā akṣaṇikāḥ, na bhāvayitavyāḥ / svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_6: jñānantu na cittamāpnoti / ato nāsti bhāvanā / (u) pūrvakarmadṛṣṭānte pratipāditamidam /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_10: ato 'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_11: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye 'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1610_14: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadūrdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_2: avāsitaṃ vā / yadyavāsitaṃ jāyate, naiva bhavedvāsanāvat / yadi vāsitaṃ jāyate / punaḥ ka upayogaściravāsana [kriya]yā /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_5: idaṃ tu vāsitaṃ jāyate / bhavānavocat- ka upayogaścirakālavāsanayeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_6: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ- agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_9: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_11: raktavarṇaṃ naivotpadyeta / yadi dvitīyakṣaṇe raktavarṇaṃ jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1611_13: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1612_0: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1612_2: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1612_4: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1612_6: evaṃ cittamapi / samāhitaprajñā sūkṣmetyataḥ kramaśo bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1614_2: ātmacetanayā sarva, sarva pāke kālamapekṣate // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1615_1: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1615_2: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:1615_4: naiva draṣṭuṃ śakyate / teṣāṃ dainandina upacayaḥ kleśānāṃ gaṇanā /
SA16hvsatssu:1615_5: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1615_6: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:1616_4: (u) sarvasyātītabhāvitvāt / ato jñāyata upacitā bhāvanā kramiketi /
SA16hvsatssu:1616_6: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam /
SA16hvsatssu:1617_6: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya]vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1617_9: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1617_13: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_1: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto 'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_3: bhikṣuṇyo bhadantamānandamavocan- vayaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantyaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_4: sūtre ca bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_5: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_6: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_8: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:1618_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1619_11: mā parikhedo janayitavyaḥ / yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno 'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1619_12: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt- mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko 'nuprāpta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_2: ahaṃ mārgasamāpattipratyayasampannaḥ yat manuṣyadehaprāptiravikalendriyatā puṇyapāpavijñātṛtā vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ na bhāvanāphalavipākamanuprāpsye /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_3: vīryasamācaraṇamamoghameva / ato na parikhidyate / [SSS_484] kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_6: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_7: alpīyasī prajñāpi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo 'ndhakāramapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_9: ato na parikhidyate / dīrghakāye 'pi dussādhanā yat samādhisamāpattiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1620_10: yadi samādhiṃ samāpadyate / tadānye guṇā acireṇa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1621_0: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante 'nuprāptaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1621_12: ataḥ sujanaiḥ saṅgaccheta / idaṃ mahate 'rthāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1621_13: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:1621_14: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo 'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet /
SA16hvsatssu:1622_0: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1622_1: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati- śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1622_2: mamāpīdānīṃ santi / kimarthaṃ na samāpadya iti / yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan /
SA16hvsatssu:1622_4: yogī prajānāti- kleśā durbalāḥ prajñā balavatī /
SA16hvsatssu:1622_6: yathoktaṃ- bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1623_1: kiñca yogī cintayati- ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1623_2: ata idānīṃ nānuprāpnomi / idānīṃ na prayate paścātpunarnānuprāpsyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1623_3: ato bhāvanāmārabhate / sadā samādhibhāvitvāt cittamekatra pratitiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1623_5: api ca yogī cintayati- yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi /
SA16hvsatssu:1626_1: tattvaṃ yat śūnyānātmatā / tasya prajñā tattvajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1626_2: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1626_3: kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- yathāsiḥ parikṛntati /
SA16hvsatssu:1626_4: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1626_5: nānyadharmeṇeti vadanti / nātattva[jñāne] na kleśān samucchedayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / saṃjñayāpi hi kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_2: yathoktaṃ sūtra- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_4: iti / (u) maivam / prajñayā yaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedaḥ [sa eva] saṃjñayetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_5: [SSS_486] asti bhagavato dvividhaṃ vacanaṃ- paramārthavacanaṃ saṃjñāvacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_7: ayaṃ maitrīdharmaḥ paramārthato na saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_8: jñānamātraṃ samucchedayati / yathoktaṃ- jñānāsiḥ sarvān kleśān samucchedayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_9: ato jñāyate maitrī saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayatīti saṃjñāvacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_12: yat anityaṃ rūpaṃ anityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_13: anityā vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā, vijñānamanityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_14: iyaṃ prajñaiveti / kiñcāha- āryaśrāvakāḥ samāhitā yathābhūtaṃ prajānantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1627_18: tattvajñānameva kleśān samucchedayatītyataḥ prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]miti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1628_0: yogī paśyati vai loke sarve devāśca mānuṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1629_0: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1629_2: sa tattvajñānī bhavati / ato jñāyate prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]m iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630_0: āha ca bhagavān sūtre- yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1630_1: tasyālpīyān lābho vinaṣṭaḥ / yasya prajñā vinaṣṭā, tasya mahīyān lābho vinaṣṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630_3: prajñā tūttamo lābha iti / āhaca- pradyotānāṃ candrasūryapradyota alpīyān prajñāpradyoto 'gra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630_10: ataḥ sā tattvamiti / bhagavato daśa balāni jñānamayāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1630_11: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1630_16: kasmāt / prajñaptirhi loka eva / prajñapteratikrāntaṃ lokottaram /
SA16hvsatssu:1631_0: (pṛ) bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate / kasmāt / uktaṃ hi sūtre- kiṃ vijānāti vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1631_4: iti / ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:1631_7: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve samyak dṛṣṭī laukikī lokottareti /
SA16hvsatssu:1631_8: puṇyapāpādyastitva [samyak dṛṣṭi]laukikī yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā /
SA16hvsatssu:1632_1: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_0: uktañca sūtre- mithyācāriṇaḥ susthāne janma bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_3: ataḥ susthāne jāyate / iti / daśasu kuśala[karma]patheṣvapi samyagdṛṣṭiruktā /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_5: āha ca bhagavān- trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā,
SA16hvsatssu:1633_6: cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñā / śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā laukikī /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_10: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_13: na vipaśyanākuśalāḥ / kecidvipaśyanākuśalāḥ na santaraṇakuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_17: bhagavān svayamāha- dharmajñānamanvayajñāna paracittajñānañca laukikaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1633_19: api cāha- dharmāṇāṃ sthitijñānaṃ nirvāṇajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1634_0: atra pratibrūmaḥ / yadyasti sāsravā prajñā / idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ sāsravānāsravayoḥ pravibhaktaṃ lakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1634_1: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1634_3: ko vā na bhave pātakaḥ / idaṃ prativaktavyam / apratibrūvāṇasya nāsti sāsravānāsravayorlakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1634_4: yadbhavatoktam- asti laukikaṃ cittamaprajñaptyavalambanaṃ yadviṣayādīnāṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1634_5: tadayuktam / kasmāt / āha khalu bhagavān- pṛthagjanāḥ satataṃ prajñaptimanudhāvantīti /

SA16hvsatssu:1635_5: yat pūrvānte 'jñānamaparānte 'jñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntājñānaṃ karmaṇyajñānaṃ karmavipāke 'jñānaṃ pūrvāparakarmavipākājñānaṃ ityādi tatra tatra yathābhūtasyājñānamadarśanamanabhisamayaḥ tamaḥ saṃmohaḥ [avidyā]ndhakāraḥ iyamucyate 'vidyā iti /
