SA16hvsatssu:1636_3: kasmāt / [SSS_489] prathamābhi sambodhikāla eva sarvaprajñaptilakṣaṇānāṃ vidhvastatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1636_7: (2) mānajaḥ, (3) kriyārthaja iti / tribhyaḥ kriyārtho bhavati / pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1636_8: ayaṃ vādo dṛṣṭijaḥ / śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti- ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1636_9: yathā kṣemakasūtra uktam / kriyārthaja iti yadarhataḥ / yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha- iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1636_10: bhagavān tadvivṛṇvannāha- ayamatyantasamuddhatamānendriyaḥ pradagdhahetupratyayaḥ kathaṃ sābhimānaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1637_0: (pṛ) yadyalaukikī prajñā / dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1637_2: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1637_5: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1637_6: āha ca- caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_2: kasmāt jñānaṃ bhavati / yadi hetupratyayān vinopadiṣṭaṃ jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_4: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1640_7: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_11: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_12: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_15: strī śīlaṃ malinaṃ karoti / supārā jaladhārā sukhā / dharmavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1640_16: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_0: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_1: kimidamanāsravam / (u) yadanāsravaṃ cittaṃ tat prajñaptiṃ vidhamati /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_2: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_8: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_9: kasmāt / anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1641_11: ato yo dharmo 'nityo 'nātmā, sa duḥkho 'pi iti prajānan akuśalānnirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1642_2: yadduḥkhaṃ tadānātma iti / ato 'nityasaṃjñā duḥkhasaṃjñā sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1643_1: (u) sūtra uktam- anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1643_4: kasmāt / ātmavādī hi paralokasādhanāyāha- ātmā nitya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1643_5: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1643_7: tat nopapadyate / cakṣuṣa utpādopi vyayo 'pi prajñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1643_9: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_6: ko doṣo 'sti / (pṛ) pṛthagjanānāṃ citte na syādiyamanāsravā /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_8: kathamidanāsravaṃ bhavet / (u) pudgalo 'yaṃ na vastutaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_14: kenedaṃ jñāyate / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre- jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_15: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_16: iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpasya samudayaḥ / iti rūpasyāstaṅgamaḥ / iti vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni yāvadastaṅgamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_19: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me 'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_21: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_25: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1644_26: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_0: (pṛ) iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpasya samudayaḥ iti rūpasyāstaṅgamaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1645_1: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_7: sa yadi na sādhayati / na sa pratipannako bhavati / sādhayanstu śaikṣajano 'timātrapūtivedaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_8: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_11: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_12: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti- amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1645_14: kathamārocayeyuḥ / jñātavyaṃ sa viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1646_0: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:1646_1: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1646_4: sa bāhyaḥ pṛthagjana iti / yasya santi sa ābhyantara iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1646_5: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1646_10: sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ / sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ / teṣāṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti / atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_1: ubhāvapi pratipannakau / kaḥ pravibhāgastayoḥ / (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_2: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_3: na tu nirodhaṃ paśyati / sa saṃjñāpratipannakaḥ / kasmāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti- kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_5: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_6: yo dharmo 'nityaḥ, tad duḥkham / duḥkhasyāsya samudayo 'pi duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_8: evaṃ yāvanmano dharmā api / yadīdaṃ duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate / anyāni duḥkhāni na sambhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_9: na punaḥ santāno bhavati / yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati- idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_10: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_12: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_13: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1647_14: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati- mamāpyevaṃ bhavati- rūpamanityaṃ [vijñānamanityaṃ rūpamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:1647_15: vijñānamanātmā, sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ, sarve dharmā anātmāna iti / atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati,
SA16hvsatssu:1647_16: na prasīdati, na vimucyate [paritarṣaṇā / upādānamutpadyate / pratyudāvartate mānasam / atha kastarhi ma ātmeti /] na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1648_0: kiñcāha- yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa śraddhā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1648_2: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1648_5: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_4: idaṃ padamatidurdarśam / bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho 'bhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_5: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_6: sūtramidamanta āha- yogina evaṃ bhavati- yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_7: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_8: tadanityajñānam / anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1649_9: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_1: tadayuktam / kasmāt / sūtre hi bhagavatoktam- caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_4: iti / jñātavyaṃ catussatyadarśanāt phalapratipannako bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_5: na nirodhamātradarśanāt / kiñcāha bhagavānuttamadharmo yaduta catvāryāryasatyāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_7: āha ca- ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_9: ye hi kecit srotaāpattiṃ sakṛdāgāmitāmanāgāmitāñca lipsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_11: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_15: dharmacakrapravartane coktam- idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata vidyodapadyata bodhirudapadyata iti,
SA16hvsatssu:1652_17: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- avadātavasane hrade prakṣipte sati rūpaṃ [yathā] vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_18: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_19: kiñcāha pariśuddhacittaḥ samyak bhāvayati- duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvanmārgasatyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_20: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_23: na nirodhasatyamātrama / bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_26: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_27: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1652_28: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_0: atrocyate / yat keṣāñciduktaṃ- catussatyānāṃ pratilābha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_1: sarvaṃ [tat] skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam- yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_2: kiñcāha bhagavān- rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ yathābhūtamāsvādamādīnavaṃ nissaraṇaptaprajñāyānuttaraṃ mārgamaspṛśamiti na vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_4: nagaropamasūtre coktam- yadā mama na jñānamabhūt- [iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_5: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_6: na [SSS_496] tadā vadāmi- adhigato mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1653_7: iti / evamādi [vacanāni] dṛṣṭvā yadi [vadāmaḥ] ayameva darśanamārgādhigama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_4: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ- catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_6: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_14: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_15: ato jñāyate na catussatya[darśana]mātreṇa mārgādhima iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_16: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_19: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam- jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_20: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1654_22: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1655_6: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo 'dhigamyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1655_10: satyaṃ tadviparītam / sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtamṛṣāgrahā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1655_11: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1655_12: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1656_1: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_0: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_1: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_2: sa vastuto nāsti / iti / yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_3: ato na punastaṃ paśyati / yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_5: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale 'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_6: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_7: evaṃ bhāvayitāpi śūnyaḥ / [tasya] jñānadarśanamapi aviśuddham pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhādarśatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_8: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1657_9: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1658_2: nirodhalakṣaṇasākṣātkurvatastu saṃskṛteṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā na [SSS_498] vyavasthitā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1658_3: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1658_4: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1658_6: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1659_2: kasmāt / nirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭavat eva duḥkhasaṃjñāyāḥ sampannatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1659_3: (u) na paścātprahīyeran / yasmin samaye nirodhasya nirodhalakṣaṇamadhigatam,
SA16hvsatssu:1659_5: paścāttu abhimukhībhavati / yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1659_7: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1659_10: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati,
SA16hvsatssu:1659_11: na tu nirodhasatyamātram / (u) tatrāsti mārgānulomyena caritam /
SA16hvsatssu:1659_12: kimiti / anityasaṃjñayā anātmasaṃjñāsampannatvāt idaṃ duḥkhamiti darśanamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_0: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_2: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_4: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_5: atastrīṇyāha / (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_8: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati- kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_9: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_10: bhikṣava āhuḥ- bhagavanmūlā hi [SSS_499] no bhagavan dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1660_12: bhagavānāha- rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1661_0: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1661_1: kasmāt / satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti- ayamātmā nityo vānityo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:1661_4: yadyātmā nityaḥ / tadā na karma, na vipākaḥ, duḥkhavimokṣaḥ / na mārgabhāvanayā nirvāṇamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1661_5: yadasyā dṛṣṭeḥ prādhānyam / sa eva dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ / [tasyā eva] yatprakarṣalābhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1661_6: sa eva śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ / ātmadṛṣṭau tṛṣṇā / paradṛṣṭau dveṣaḥ / ātmana uccadarśanameva mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1662_2: (u) tayoḥ prādhanyāt / dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1662_8: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:1662_10: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1662_11: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1662_13: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1665_2: kasmāt / āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_7: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_12: (u) yat bhavānāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_13: na tat niyamena bhavati / ālambanaṃ vināpi jñāmutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_15: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_19: atītānāgatāśca asaddharmāḥ, kasyālambanāni syuḥ / ātmādhyavasānamātrasya pratiṣedhādevamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_20: yadi vijñānāni bhavanti / tāni sarvāṇi ābhyāṃ dvābhyāmeva bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_21: na caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ / kiñcit vijñānaṃ dvau pratyayau vinotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_23: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1666_26: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_4: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_5: yadyasantaḥ, kiṃ tajjñānamutpādayati / śaśaśṛṅgakūrmaromāhipadādiṣu na jātu jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_13: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_14: yaḥ prakṛtito 'san / kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto 'pi sattvākhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_15: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_16: na tu cittāntaram / anena puruṣeṇa pūrvaṃ taddharmanimittamupāttam /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_17: tasmin dharme niruddhe 'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_18: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1667_19: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_3: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti- idaṃ vastu tathā syāt,
SA16hvsatssu:1668_5: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_6: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_8: smṛtibalācca jānanti / yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_14: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_17: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam /
SA16hvsatssu:1668_18: nāpi pratyaṅgavijñānena / asatyapi pratyaṅgaṃ puruṣajñāne ekakṣaṇaṃ [ta]jjñāne puruṣajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1669_0: bhavānavādīḥ- dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1669_2: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte 'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1669_4: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1670_0: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1670_1: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_0: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_2: natvanāsrava[ālambana]m / kasmāt / tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam- atha nirvindate duḥkha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_9: yadānātmā tadduḥkham iti / bhagavānāha yadbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ tatprajahata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_13: vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā, vijñāna[manātmā] anātmīyam / tadasmābhiḥ- prahātavya]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_14: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu khalu bhikṣava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_16: uktañca sūtre- yatkiñcit [bhikṣavo] rūpamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre 'ntike vā sarvaṃ jānāti nātmā nātmīyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_17: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_18: āha ca- rūpaṃ nātmā, vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā vijñānañca nātmā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_19: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_20: kiñcāha bhagavān- atra niṣaṇṇaḥ kaścinmūḍho 'vidyāṇḍagato 'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati- yadi rūpaṃ nātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:1671_21: vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā, vijñānañcanātmā / kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1671_23: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_3: āha ca- daśa śūnyatāḥ sarvadharmālambanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_6: sarve dharmā anātmāna iti / yadanātmajñānaṃ tad duḥkhasatyālambanameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_8: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_9: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_10: āha ca- ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ [SSS_504] paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1672_11: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_1: sarvasaṅgrāhakamiti yathā bhagavānāha- aśaṃ sarvajña iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_5: yathā ca tathāgatavarge uktam- tathāgataḥ sarvatyāgī sarvajayī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_6: śīlādayo dharmā na tyājyāḥ / kintu akuśaladharmānuddiśyāha- sarvatyāgīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_7: ajeyyā anye buddhāḥ / anyān sattvānuddiśyāparamāha- sarvajayīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_11: na tu viśeṣalakṣaṇajña iti / bhagavāṃstu sāmānyaviśeṣajñaḥ sarvajña ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1673_12: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1674_1: vinaye ca sandṛśyate / dharmatāñca na vilomayati / sa dharma upādeya iti / kiñcāha- ya āha idaṃ buddhavacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1674_2: sa suvyañjanaḥ / na svarthaḥ / vidvān tatra svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1674_8: idantu neyārthaṃ sūtram / kasmādekasmin vastuni sarvamiti vacanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1674_13: ayaṃ sarvabhuk iti / ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1675_6: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:1675_8: sarvā śūnyatā anāsravā / (pṛ) uktaṃ hi dharmamudrāsūtre- śūnyatā laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:1675_9: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:1675_10: (pṛ) atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:1675_13: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1676_0: yadbhavānāha- sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1676_1: evaṃ hi syāt- yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1676_2: yathoktaṃ darśanavarge- yo duḥkhaṃ na paśyati,
SA16hvsatssu:1676_3: sa ātmadarśī bhavati / yo yathābhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyati,
SA16hvsatssu:1676_4: na sa punarātmānaṃ paśyati / iti / yathābhūtamiti yadanātmadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1676_5: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_0: asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_1: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_3: kenedaṃ jñāyate / uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_5: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_6: api [SSS_506] coktaṃ sūtre- pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_8: yadi māyā vastusatī, na māyeti bhavati / nāstītyapi na nirvaktuṃ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_11: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1679_13: tathā pañcaskandhā api, naikaḥ [tādṛśaḥ] paramārthiko dharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1680_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mṛṣā nāma yat tucchakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1680_4: satyaṃ nāma yathābhūtamiti / nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1680_5: (pṛ) yadbhavatoktaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ [śūnyavihāra] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1680_8: (u) sāsravo 'nāsravaśca (pṛ) sūtra uktam- yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1680_10: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1681_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1681_4: evaṃ vidvānapi iti / kāya evopādānaskandhaḥ / (pṛ) yadi sarve skandhā upādānaskandhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1681_6: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1681_8: ityayaṃ pravibhāgaḥ / skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1682_3: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānañca paśyati śūnyamanātmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1682_9: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1682_10: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:1685_1: (u) ubhayamekātmakameva / nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ / samyagdarśanaṃ dvividhaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_2: kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ, pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_7: nājñāsyāmīndriyam / ato kṣāntirna jñānam / uktañca sūtre- yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_9: pariniṣpannā tu jñānam iti / yā kṣāntiḥ, apariniṣpannā vipaśyanā [sā] /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_10: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_15: ataḥ kṣāntirna jñānam / (u) yā kṣāntistadeva jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_19: kṣantavye kābhiratiḥ / parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_21: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_23: uktañca sūtre- [evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_25: kiñca bhagavānāha- duḥkhajñānaṃ samudaya[jñānaṃ] nirodha[jñānaṃ] mārgajñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1686_26: na tvāha kṣāntiriti / ato jñāyate jñānameva kṣāntiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1687_0: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1687_3: tadayuktam / na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1687_10: kathaṃ kṣamate / bhavānavocat- kṣāntikāle na viniścayo 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1687_16: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1687_17: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_1: (u) kiṃ kāraṇam / (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_2: ato jñānaṃ na dṛṣṭiḥ / (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_3: yadi bhavato mataṃ samyag [SSS_509] dṛṣṭiḥ samyag jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_5: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_6: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1688_8: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo 'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata[stata] samyag jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1689_6: yadi bhavatoktavat bhavati / tadā kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ na sāmīcī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1690_5: ato na dṛṣṭiḥ / (u) tatra vitarkavicārābhāvāt na vikalpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1690_6: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:1690_7: tadayuktam / kasmāt / bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1690_12: idamapi na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt / pañcavijñāneṣu nāsti yathābhūtajñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1690_14: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_4: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_5: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_6: kathamidam / (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_7: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_9: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1691_10: kathamasti pravibhāgaḥ / (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_0: tisraḥ prajñā, śrutamayī prajñā, cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñeti / sūtrādi dvādaśāṅgapravacanādutpannā śrutamayī /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_3: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_4: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_5: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_6: iti / api cāha- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_9: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_10: iti / kiñcoktaṃ saptasamyagjñānasūtre- yat bhikṣu dharmaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_11: [iyaṃ] śrutamayī prajñā / yadarthaṃ prajānāti [iyaṃ] cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_13: iyaṃ bhāvanāmayī prajñā / iti / yathā ca rāhulaḥ pañcopādānaskandhanikāyādīnadhīte /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_14: iyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā / yadviviktadeśe tadarthaṃ cintayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_15: iyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā / paścātsambodhikāle bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_16: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_21: katamāḥ pañca / aśrutaṃ śṛṇoti / śrutaṃ paryādāpayati / kāṃkṣāṃ vihanti / dṛṣṭiṃ ṛju karoti / cittamasya prasīdati / iti / aśrutaṃ śṛṇoti / śrutaṃ paryādāpayati itīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_22: kāṃkṣāṃ vihanti / dṛṣṭiṃ ṛjukaroti itīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_25: vācā dharmamadhīte / iyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā / manasā mīmāṃsate / iyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā / paśyan abhisameti / iyaṃ bhāvanāmayī prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_30: iyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā / [tasmin dharme] yadarthapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1694_31: iyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā / tasya yat pramodyādi jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_0: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_1: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_4: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ [SSS_512] pravrajati /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_5: śīlaṃ dhatte / indriyāṇi rakṣati / iryāpatheṣu samprajanyakārī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_6: viviktadeśe cintayati / pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya prathamadhyānādīnupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_8: iti / tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_9: iyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā / śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_10: iyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā / pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya yāvadāsravakṣayamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1695_11: iyaṃ bhāvanāmayī prajñā / kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ samyagdṛṣṭirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1697_0: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1697_8: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_1: kati rūpadhātau / kati ārūpyadhātau bhavanti / (u) kāmadhātau sarvā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_2: yathā hastaka upāsako 'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_8: [SSS_513] kathamidam / (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_9: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_10: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_13: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_14: tathā karuṇādāvapi / (pṛ) kāmadhātāvaśubhādibhāvanā nātyantaṃ kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_17: nāśubhādinā / (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_18: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_22: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1698_23: na dauṣṭhulyādiriti / yadi sannapi na kleśān samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1698_25: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1699_2: yayoktaṃ sūtre- cittasamādhānaṃ mārgaḥ cittavikṣepo 'mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1699_7: kāmadhāto tu nāsti / (pṛ) rūpadhātukamārgeṇa vairāgyamanuprāpya tadantarā mriyamāṇo rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1699_8: yathā āṇirāṇiṃ nissārayati / (u) kiṃ nāma vairāgyam / (pṛ) kleśaprahāṇaṃ vairāgyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1699_10: na kāmadhātukena / (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_0: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_1: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_5: sarve 'pi kleśā na syuḥ / kasmāt / sarve hi kleśāḥ pratītyasiddhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_11: pṛthagjano 'yamarhan syāt / vastutastu [tasya] kleśā naikāntaṃ kṣīṇāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_12: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_13: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_15: arhan nābhinandati jīvitaṃ, nābhisantrasati maraṇam / ayaṃ [pṛthagjano] 'pi evaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_17: tathāyamapi syāt / arhato 'ṣṭau lokadharmā na cittamavapātayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1700_19: vītarāgatvāt / vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1701_2: kathaṃ tatrotpadyeta / sūtre 'pyuktam- asti vītarāgastīrthika iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1701_3: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1701_5: arūpeṇa rūpaṃ vijahāti / nirodhena smṛtyupasthānāni vijahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1701_6: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo 'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1701_7: tanna yujyate / bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1702_0: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
SA16hvsatssu:1703_0: ayameva vītarāgo nāma / tīrthikānāṃ prahāṇantu maraṇaprahāṇādanyat /
SA16hvsatssu:1703_2: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1703_4: mahāvipākaṃ vindate / vacane samāne 'pi tadarthastu vibhinnaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1703_5: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_2: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_7: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_14: na kāmadhātukasamādhim / (u) na yuktam / atikramya saptaniśrayāniti vacanena prathamadhyānaṃ tadāsannabhūmiścātikrāntaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_15: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_18: asyāpi nāsti kāraṇam / susīmasūtre coktam- pūrvaṃ khalu dharmasthitijñānaṃ pañcānnirvāṇajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_20: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1704_23: yadyāsannabhūmiṃ vedayate / sa eva dhyānasamānadoṣaḥ / sūtre cāsannabhūmiriti vacanaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:1705_8: yadi nāstyāsannabhūmiḥ / kathaṃ rūpamupādadyāt / uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1706_2: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1706_5: tadā cittamabhiramate / āha ca- yogino yadākuśalavitarko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1706_9: idaṃ caramabhavikam / yogī yadi kāmadhātukamārgeṇa kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1706_15: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1707_5: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:1710_7: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_1: katamā imāḥ / (u) akṣareṣu, [SSS_518] yā pratisaṃvit / iyaṃ dharmapratisaṃvit / ruteṣu pratisaṃvit niruktipratisaṃvit /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- janapadaniruktau nābhiniveśeta yogī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_7: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_9: kiñcidubhayavat iti / kiñcinnobhayavat iti / idaṃ trividhaṃ jñānaṃ niruktyupāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_11: iyamarthapratisaṃvit / yathāha- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1711_13: kaścidubhayopāyaḥ / kaścinnobhayopāyaḥ / ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:1712_8: na śaikṣajanā iti / nāyaṃ tathā niyamaḥ / śaikṣā api aṣṭavimokṣān vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1713_0: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:1713_5: aśaikṣāṇāṃ kevalamanāsravā / pratilābhe tu sarvā yugapadvindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1716_3: yathā jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1716_4: asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1716_5: eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ sadā sthita ityato dharmasthitijñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_1: kasmāt / yataḥ asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_7: tatra kimasti [avaśiṣṭam] / (pṛ) dravyasat nirvāṇam / tat kena jñāyate / nirodhasatyaṃ hi nirvāṇam / duḥkhādīnāṃ satyānāṃ vastusattvāt nirvāṇamapi vastusat /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_13: api coktam- santi dvidhaiva dharmāḥ saṃskṛto 'saṃskṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_16: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye vidyante saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā nirodho nirvāṇaṃ teṣāmagramākhyāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_17: āha ca- rūpamanityam / rūpanirodhe nirvāṇaṃ nityam /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_18: evaṃ yāvadvijñānamapi / sūtre coktam- nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_19: yadyasan dharmaḥ / katamaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ / bhagavān bahudhātukasūtra āha- vidvān saṃskṛtadhātumasaṃskṛtādhātuñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_22: sarveṣu sūtreṣu nāsti kiñcinniyataṃ vacanaṃ nirvāṇamasaddharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1717_23: ato jñāyate yannirvāṇamasaditi tat bhavataḥ svasaṃjñāvikalpa eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_0: ucyate / yadi skandhānāṃ viyoge 'pi punarasti dharmāntaraṃ nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_2: yadi nirvāṇaṃ sat / tadā vaktavyaḥ asti svabhāvaḥ ko 'yamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_5: kimasallakṣaṇaṃ bhavati / yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī rūpalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati yāvaddharmalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_6: sūtre ca tatra tatroktam- sarve dharmā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_11: yadi nirvāṇaṃ dharmaḥ tadā nāsti svabhāva iti darśanaṃ nopalabdhuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_13: yathā yatra ghaṭo 'sti / na tatra ghaṭasya vināśadharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1718_14: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1719_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadidaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate anyadduḥkhaṃ notpadyate na punastatsantatirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1719_2: idaṃ sthānaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ śiva yaduta [SSS_521] sarvapratinissargaḥ kāyikacaitasikarāgātyantavisaṃyogo nirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1719_4: anyaddaḥkhaṃ notpadyata iti vacane ko dharmo nirvāṇādanyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1719_7: ajātā na jāyate / tasmin samaye kṣayo nāma / ko dharmaḥ punarasti kṣaya ityabhidhīyamānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1720_5: tathā no cet cīvarakṣayādirapi pṛthak dharmaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1721_5: [tat] nirvāṇaṃ bhavati / yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1721_7: (u) na nāsti nirvāṇamiti / kintu nāsti dravyadharma[rūpam] /
SA16hvsatssu:1721_8: yadi nāsti nirvāṇam / tadā sadā sarvatra jātimaraṇamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1721_9: na kadācinmokṣasamayaḥ / yathā asti ghaṭabhaṅgaḥ vṛkṣasamucchedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1721_12: kasmāt / asti duḥkhanirodha ityato 'styajāto 'bhūto 'kṛtako 'saṃskṛta ityādivacanaṃ sarvamapratihatam /
SA16hvsatssu:1722_0: araṇājñānamiti / yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha /
SA16hvsatssu:1722_8: nedaṃ niyamena tathā / etajjñānabhāvitacittasyārhato nāsti [raṇāspadaṃ] kiñcit /
SA16hvsatssu:1723_1: (pṛ) tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1724_0: prāntakoṭikajñānamiti / yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_0: asti ṣaḍabhijñājñānam / ṣaḍabhijñāḥ- kāyarddhiḥ dviyacakṣuḥ divyaśrotraṃ paracittajñānaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirāsravakṣaya[jñāna]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_2: vihāyasā gacchati / āvirbhavati / tirobhavati / sūryācandramasau parāmṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_4: īdṛśaṃ karma kāyarddhiḥ / (pṛ) kathamidaṃ setsyati / (u) yogī dhyānasamādhīnāṃ samyak bhāvanayā vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_7: idamayuktam / yadyayaṃ yogī parahitāya nānānirmitaṃ pradarśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_8: kasmāttadavyākṛtaṃ bhavet / kecidāhuḥ- kāmadhātukacittena kāmadhātukanirmitaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_10: tadapyayuktam / cakṣurādyapi evaṃ syāt / kāmadhātukavijñānena kāmadhātukarūpameva paśyedityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_12: ko doṣo 'sti / kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānābhijñayā brahmalokaṃ gacchati yāvaccaturthadhyānābhijñayā rūpaparyantaṃ gacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1727_20: yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpe vā ārūpye vā pūrvatanīnamupapattyāyatanaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_3: prajñā tu naivam / (pṛ) sūtra uktam- ālokalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan jñānadarśanaṃ sādhayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_5: (u) maivam / api cāha- divyaśrotraṃ na prajñāsvabhāvamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_7: ato na prajñāsvabhāvam / divyacakṣuḥ pratyutpannaṃ rūpamālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_8: na tathā manovijñānam / divyacakṣurvibhaṅge coktam- jñānaṃ sattvakarmavipāka[bhūta]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_12: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam /
SA16hvsatssu:1728_13: (u) tārakāpramāṇasadṛśam / (pṛ) andhasya katham / (u) cakṣurāyatanena sahaiva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_0: yogī tat paracittaṃ vetti / yat paracittajñānam /(pṛ) kasmānnocyate paracaitasikajñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_4: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_5: tadayuktam / neme vadanti kāraṇaniyamam- anena kāraṇena sajātīyamevālambanaṃ jānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_7: tadapyayuktam / kiñcidanāgatālambanam / yathā kaścidavitarkasamādhimupasampannaḥ prajānāti asmāt samādhervyutthite evamevaṃ vitarko bhaviṣyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_9: tadayuktam / yadi prajānāti / ko doṣaḥ / āha ca- pratyekabuddho mārgasatyadarśanagatatṛtīyacittaṃ jñāsyāmīti saptamaṃ cittameva paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_15: tat sarvaṃ brahmā prājānat / kiñcaikasmin samaye manasyacintayat- rājā bhūtvā [SSS_525] yathādharmaṃ lokaṃ vineṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_17: devā api jānanti- ayamarhan yāvadayaṃ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_19: tadyathā bhagavati parinirvāṇābhimukhe sati anirūddho bhagavatopasampannān dhyānasamādhīn yathākramamajānīt /
SA16hvsatssu:1729_21: ida mayuktam / bhagavān hi pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛtyā] ārūpyaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1730_1: (u) ālambane sati jānāti / yadi cittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, rūpālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1730_2: ityādi / (pṛ) tathā cet paracittaṃ sarvadharmālambanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1730_3: (u) evameva [syāt] / yadi na jānātyālambanaṃ, katamat cittaṃ jānīyāt / yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhavataścittamevamevamiti prajānāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1731_1: vipākapratilabdhaṃ, bhāvanāpratilabdhamiti / nimittajñānamiti yathā aṅgamantrādinā jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1732_4: kena tat jñāyate / yathā śāriputraḥ bhagavantaṃ pratyāha- ahamatītānāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ cittamajānannapi teṣāṃ dharmaṃ jānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1732_5: śuddhāvāsā devāstathāgatacittaṃ jānantītyato bhagavantamupasampadyāhuḥ- atītatathāgatānāṃ bhagavan iryāpatho 'pyevamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1733_0: (pṛ) pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛti]vibhaṅge kasmāduktaṃ saha nimittena saha jātyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1733_1: (u) anusmṛtirviśadetyata evaṃ nimittasaṃjñāmavocat amukaḥ pudgalaḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1733_3: jātirnāma gotram / yathāhuḥ- idaṃ tava kulaṃ iyaṃ tava jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1733_4: jātiṃ nimittañca militvā vadatītyato jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:1734_4: kasmāt / asti hi pudgalasya aṣṭamahāsahasrakalpān jānato 'pi nāstīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:1734_5: ato mithyādṛṣṭirutpadyate / yadi ta āgataṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1735_1: tadayuktam / yadi kṣaṇakrameṇānusmarati / ekasminneva kalpe vastu durvijñeyaṃ sarvataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1735_2: kiṃ punarapramāṇakalpe (pṛ) sūtre kasmāduktam- ahamekanavatikalpānāgatya nāpaśyaṃ [kimapi] dānamapacīyamānaṃ vinā vipākena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1736_4: atītaṃ na nimittam / athāpyanusmarati / prajñāviśeṣameva smṛtiriti brūmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1737_7: tatrāmoṣaṇaṃ durlabham / ataḥ kuśalaṃ karmāpekṣyate / kecidvadanti- idamatītaṃ saptādhvaparamamanusmaratīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1737_8: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ / kaścit pratyadhvamavihiṃsanadharmasubhāvitatvāt suciraṃ viprakṛṣṭañcānusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:1738_6: kena dharmeṇa sākṣātkaroti / (u) uktameva pūrvaṃ dhyānasamādhīn gabhīraṃ bhāvayan ṛddhipādān sākṣātkarotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1739_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1739_2: kecidāhuḥ- dānādayaḥ kuśaladharmā api āsravakṣayasya nidānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1739_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogino dānaṃ kṣīṇāsravaśūnyānātmajñānaṃ sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_5: dvitīyajñānādinā ka upayogaḥ (u) nimittāni niruddhānyapi punarutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_8: tathā sati nārhanmārgaḥ / (u) astyavasthā / yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_9: asti kaścit kālaḥ [yadā] stanyaṃ pratiruddhapayaḥprasūti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_10: tadā avadhirbhavati / nimittamapyeyam / yathā ca tapte 'yasi kṛṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ niruddhaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_13: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:1740_18: kintu na doṣajanakāni / yadi kiścit cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāmanaskāreṇa mithyā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1741_0: (pṛ) kimanātmaśūnyajñānam / (u) yadyogī pañcasu skandheṣu prajñaptaṃ sattvaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1741_9: tatsarvaṃ nirodhadharma / teṣu dharmeṣu virajo dharmacakṣuḥ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1741_14: prākṛtā ajñā vadanti- te vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1741_15: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti- te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi /
SA16hvsatssu:1741_17: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- yo yogī saptabhirupāyaistribhirarthāvalokanaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'smin dharme kṣipramāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_1: kimidaṃ jñānam / (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_2: kasmāt / asamāhitacitta evaṃ vicārayati- yadidaṃ rūpam,
SA16hvsatssu:1744_3: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ rūpanirodhagāminī pratipat,
SA16hvsatssu:1744_7: (u) yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_9: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_10: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_11: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva- anityā duḥkhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_14: (u) trividhāḥ śikṣate- pūrvaṃ śrutamayīṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_16: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1744_18: kasmāt / yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo [SSS_529] nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1745_0: (pṛ) katamā aṣṭa kṣāntayaḥ / (u) yatkiñcit jñānaṃ prajñaptividāraṇam,
SA16hvsatssu:1745_2: (pṛ) yogino 'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1745_5: kasmāt / pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1745_6: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti- atra vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1745_7: paścādabhimukhīkaroti / tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyānvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1745_8: ataḥ sūtra uktam- [evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_0: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni prāpnoti yaduta kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñānaṃ] yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamavyākṛtaṃ [jñāna]m /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_1: kathamidam / (u) na sarvo 'rhan sarvān dhyānasamādhīn prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_6: katamā prāptirnāma / yathā kaścidāha- granthaṃ jānāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:1748_8: tathedamapyasti / (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_10: (u) sūtre tūktam- asminnantarāle samāpadya paścāttāṃ samutpādayediti /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_12: (pṛ) yadi [SSS_530] rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_14: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_15: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1748_17: yadi prāpyamiti, anāgataṃ sarvaṃ prāpyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_3: kasmāt / yasya dvitīyadhyānādi niśritya samyak dharmaniyāmāvakrāntirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_6: tadānāgate 'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_7: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_9: so 'nāgate prītiṃ prāpnoti / evamādayo dharmāstadā na syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_11: yadi ca nāsti anāgata[dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_14: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvānuprāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1749_15: kasmāt / phalāni sarvāṇyabhimukhīkāle prāpnuyāditīdaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_0: ucyate / yat bhavatoktam- aṅgaiḥ samanvita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_1: idamabādhitam / kasmāt / śīlādyaṅgāni kramaśaḥ prāpyante naikakālamiti brūmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_2: ato nāsti dūṣaṇam / yaduktaṃ bhavatā keṣāñcitprāptistajjātīyātā[mapi] /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_4: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_6: tathedamapi / (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_10: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_12: (u) yadi nāsti viśeṣaḥ / kimavadyaṃ bhavati / yathā sampannaphalo 'pi yogītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_13: tathedamapi / pudgalo 'yaṃ punarviśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prāpnotītyato 'sti pravibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_14: ato nāsti doṣaḥ / yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_16: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1750_17: tathe damapi / ato jñāyate nāstyanāgatasya prāptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_0: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_4: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_5: uktañca- anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_6: kasmāt / ete hi vadanti- satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_9: cintanāmārge tu bhāvayati / mārgānvayajñāne na sāṃvṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_12: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_13: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_17: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_19: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1751_22: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1754_4: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva /
SA16hvsatssu:1754_8: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bālaḥ pratyutpannaṃ dharmaṃ bahumanyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1754_10: kiñcāha- pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1755_9: kasmāt / dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:1755_10: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:1756_0: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kāma[sampratiyukteṣu] saṃskāreṣu [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] hetau [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] nirodhe [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānaṃ [kāmasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ] prahāṇāya mārge [yadanāsravaṃ] jñānam,
SA16hvsatssu:1756_1: idamucyate dharmajñānam / rūpārūpyasampratiyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ [SSS_533] saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yadanāsravaṃ jñānam,
SA16hvsatssu:1756_3: kathamidam / (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- atītae 'nāgate caivaṃ prajānīhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1756_5: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yogī anusmaret- ahamidānīṃ dṛṣṭarūpeṇopadruto bhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:1757_0: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi /
SA16hvsatssu:1757_1: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi /
SA16hvsatssu:1757_2: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ /]
SA16hvsatssu:1757_3: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathoṣṇa eva // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1759_1: asya ca yuktirasti / kasmāt / yogī hi atīte 'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1759_6: yadīdaṃ dharmajñānam / rūpārūpyasampratiyuktāḥ saṃskārā api santyatītā anāgatāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1759_11: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti prāptiraprāptirityato 'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1759_14: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_6: kasmāt / yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_8: anyat jñānaṃ sarvamupāyaḥ / (pṛ) kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirodho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_9: (u) vedanāḥ dukhaṃ paśyati / tatrātmamatirutpadyate / atastāsāmapi nirodhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_10: yathoktam- adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_11: iti / (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1760_12: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_2: (pṛ) idamasamāhitaṃ cittam, kathaṃ jñānaṃ janayati / (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_4: yadanityaṃ tadānātma iti / kasmāt / cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāmutpādo 'sti vyayo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_5: yadyayamātmā, ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_10: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_11: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1761_14: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_0: (pṛ) kimucyate kṣayajñānam / (u) sarvāṇi nimittāni kṣapayatīti kṣayajñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_3: yathoktaṃ sūtre- abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_4: śaikṣāḥ prajānanti / abhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramātmeti / taccittamatyantaṃ prahīṇamiti kṣayajñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_5: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti- bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_7: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_12: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:1762_14: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1763_9: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto 'pi na vimukta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1763_12: na punarutpatsya iti / tathā śaikṣo 'pi / arhan aśaikṣamārgaṃ prāpto [yat] prajānāti kṣīṇā[me]jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:1763_13: tat kṣayajñānamityucyate / uṣitaṃ brahmacaryamiti śaikṣacaryāparityāga ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1763_14: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti- asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1763_15: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt,
SA16hvsatssu:1763_16: [SSS_536] na tu śaikṣā iti / yathā kaścit jvarārto[jvarā]nudgamakāle 'pi jvarītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1764_1: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1765_2: tatra jñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam / anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ tattvajñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1765_4: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- sarve sattvāḥ samaṃ jñānasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1765_5: kathamidam / (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1765_6: sa prāpnoti nānyaḥ sattvaḥ / jñānākhyāyāḥ prāpitvāt / sarve sattvāḥ saṃjñāprayogamātraṃ vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1768_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1768_1: jarāmaraṇasamudaye jñānaṃ, jarāmaraṇanirodhe jñānaṃ, jarāmaraṇanirodhamārge jñānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:1768_7: kenedaṃ jñāyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre- [tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1768_8: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1768_14: iti / dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1768_16: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1769_1: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1769_9: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1770_1: kathamidam / (u) na [yuktam] / kasmāt / na tatrocyate duḥkhākāraḥ / ato na [tat] duḥkhajñānam / (pṛ) idaṃ kasya jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1770_3: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1770_6: na satyadvāram / ato na tasya duḥkhākāro vaktavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1770_8: lakṣaṇasāmyāt / (pṛ) atra kuto nocyate āsvādādīnavanissaraṇādīnāṃ jñānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1773_0: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti [jñānam] /
SA16hvsatssu:1773_5: vipariṇāmadharma, viyogadharma, vyayadharma iti jñānam / yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityapyevam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1773_6: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1774_0: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1774_3: (u) niyamārtham / yathā dānaṃ puṇyasya hetuḥ / śīlenāpi puṇyaṃ vindate / yathoktam- dhṛtaśīlo deveṣūtpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1774_5: kecidahetukā jātiriti / ato niyama ucyate / (pṛ) kasmādatīte 'nāgate 'dhvani punarniyama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1774_6: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1774_7: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1775_1: anyannāma nirvāṇajñānam / jarāmaraṇasantānakaratvāducyate- anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kṛtakaṃ pratītyasamutpannam /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_0: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_2: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_4: ityādi nidānajñānāni apramāṇaśatasahasrāṇi santi yaduta [SSS_540] cakṣurvijñānamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_6: karmaṇaḥ tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ / tṛṣṇāyā avidyā pratyayaḥ / avidyāyā ayoniśomanaskāraḥ pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_9: āhārāṇāṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ / pañcakāmaguṇānāṃ kabalīkārāhārādayaḥ pratyayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1776_15: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam /
